Gbassay is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Gbassay was born in Makama, an outskirt of Makeni City, thirty-nine years ago. She is married to a teacher. Gbassay sells market food – margi (used to give sauce a sweet taste), pepper, fish, gara lappers (locally dyed cloths) etc. 

With the help of this loan, Gbassay and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Gbassay will use her share of the loan (800,000 Sierra Leonean Leones) to buy the above mentioned items in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy market food – margi (flavor enhancer), pepper, fish, gara lappers (locally dyed cloth), etc.

loans.name: Sok's Group

texts.en:
Sok is 35 years old and lives in Dambae district, where a common business is growing cassava. She and her husband have been planting this kind of crop to support the family for ten years. Their children get sick very often, which is a burden on the family. 

Sok received her first loan from VisionFund in 2011. She is now leading a group of three members to apply for another loan, after her first loan was successfully repaid. As a leader, Sok will use her portion to spend on her plantation, like paying for labor fees. 

She hopes this loan will enable her to grow the crops with a good yield and then sell the products at a good price, so that she can better feed her family and especially so that she can reserve enough money for when her children fall sick.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees.

loans.name: Ghana Star Bakery Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the “Ghana Star Bakery” group. These are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 1,200,000.00 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) for each in the group in order to invest in their businesses. 

Maseray is the leader of this group. Maseray is thirty-seven-years-old, married with four children who are attending primary school. Maseray sells gara cloths (locally dyed cloths). With the help of this loan, Maseray will invest in her business by buying materials like ink, caustic soda, powder, white cotton cloths, etc., in order to produce a large quantity of gara cloths for sale.

loans.use: to buy materials (ink, caustic soda, powder, white cotton cloths, etc.) in order to produce a large quantity of gara cloths for sale.

loans.name: Go Try Group

texts.en:
Dauda is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Dauda was born in Yoni village, fifty-five years ago. He is married to a businesswoman and the couple has five children, three of whom are attending primary schools and two in secondary school. 

Dauda has been selling  new school bags and second-hand bags for twenty-four years. This is the second loan that Dauda and his group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to further expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Dauda will use his share of the loan (500,000 Sierra Leone Leones) to expand his business. He will buy school bags in a large quantity to add to his business.

loans.use: to buy school bags in large quantity to add to his business.

loans.name: Wendkouni Group

texts.fr:
Mr YACOUBA est le représentant du groupe WEND KOUNI. Il est marié et père d’un (01) enfant. Son enfant a deux (02) ans. Il a deux (02) personnes en charge.

Il est gérant d’une boutique depuis trois (03) ans. Il s’approvisionne au marché de toecin. Ses clients sont essentiellement les hommes et les femmes du quartier.

Il veut s’acheter cinq (05) carton de savon, trois (03) paquets de macaroni, un (01) bidon d’huile, trois (03) lots de patte dentifrice, du thé et du nescafé.

Il veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité. Il ambitionne acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Mr YACOUBA is the representative of the WEND KOUNI group. He is married and has one child, who is 2. He take care of 2 people.

He has been running a shop for 3 years. He buys his supplies from the market in toecin. His clients are mainly men and women from the neighborhood.

He wants to buy 5 boxes of soap, 3 packs of macaroni, 1 drum of oil, 3 packs of toothpaste, tea, and nescafé.

He wants to use the profits to strenghten his business. His goal is to buy a parcel of land.

loans.use: to buy 5 boxes of soap, 3 packs of macaroni, 1 drum of oil, 3 packs of toothpaste, tea, and nescafé.

loans.name: Cristian León

texts.es:
Cristian es un joven emprendedor que desde muy temprana edad viene trabajando en el negocio de sus padres el cual es una salsamentaria y gracias al cual ha adquirido una gran experiencia. Cristian tiene 21 años de edad y tiene un hijo de 6 meses de nacido, por lo que trabaja fuertemente en el negocio de sus padres para generar los ingresos necesarios con el cual pueda sostener los gastos que se generan en su hogar donde convive con su pareja y su hijo. Cristian quiere emprender un proyecto personal el cual es una distribuidora de gaseosas, y así aprovechar la experiencia adquirida en el negocio de sus padres, sin embargo, debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para su surtido inicial, Cristian busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de pacas de gaseosa para iniciar su propio negocio de distribución de gaseosas.
De esta manera podrá tener su propio negocio y así progresará por su propia cuenta, generando mayores ingresos para su hogar y ofreciéndoles mayores oportunidades económicas y mejor calidad de vida a su pareja y su hijo de 6 años. Además, Cristian espera que en un futuro pueda tener un gran hogar con su pareja y su hijo y poder tener muy buenas oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Cristian is a young entrepreneur who began working at a very early age. He acquired a great deal of experience by working at his parents' delicatessen. Cristian is 21 years old and has a six-month-old son. He works hard at his parents' business in order to generate the necessary income to help pay the household expenses of his partner and their son.

Cristian wants to embark on his own project of becoming a soft drink distributor. He will take advantage of the experience he acquired while working in his parents' business. However, he does not have sufficient capital to help pay for his initial inventory. Cristian views this loan as an opportunity to buy cases of soda to start his own soft drink distribution business. By having his own business, Cristian will be able to make progress, generate more household income, and provide better financial opportunities and a better quality of life for his partner and their son. In addition, he hopes to have a nice home in the future where his partner and son can experience good economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy cases of sodas in order to start his own soft drink distribution business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and a sewing machine to increase production and fulfil all of her customers’ orders.

loans.name: El Manantial Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Manantial” se encuentra ubicado en una comunidad mazahua. Para llegar al lugar de reunión se tiene que recorrer un largo camino a pie ya que no entra el trasporte hasta ese lugar. El nombre del grupo se eligió hace tiempo, las integrantes lo adaptaron porque algunas de ellas ya estaban una asociación anterior con el mismo nombre. A pesar de no conocer con exactitud porqué se eligió ese nombre en un inicio, todas piensan que es porque el lugar en donde viven hay muchos manantiales pequeños donde las personas van a traer el agua para beber o para lavar.

Doña María, un miembro del grupo, comenta que tiene 51 años de edad y está casada con el señor Fernando, quien todas las tardes se dedica a raspar el maguey para hacer el tradicional pulque. Hace mas de 30 años  que están juntos; ellos formaron una familia, pero solo 2 de sus hijos siguen viviendo con ellos y aunque ya no estudian, siguen dependiendo de dicha pareja.

Doña María se dedica a la crianza de borregos, actividad en la cual ya tiene 30 años. También tiene una tienda de abarrotes, la cual abrió hace 20 años aproximadamente. Explica que la crianza de borregos la adoptó ya que su mamá le dio dos borreguitos que ella tuvo que cuidar, fue entonces que aprendió todo lo relacionado con el engocio y decidió iniciar la actividad. La tienda la puso posteriormente ya que sus hijos y esposo la motivaron para iniciarla y ellos mismos le ayudaron económicamente.

Esta vez está solicitando el crédito para comprar 5 borregos y surtir su tienda de abarrotes para la cual tiene planeado comprar productos enlatados, refrescos, golosinas, pan, huevo, leche, etc. Doña María está muy contenta y agradecida con el crédito ya que le servirá volver a surtir su tienda (desde hace tiempo le faltaban varios productos). 

En sus actividades, María no tiene dificultades ya que sus borregos están en muy buenas condiciones y la tienda está mejorando poco a poco. La meta que tiene doña María es arreglar su tiendita ya que solo tiene maderas para colocar su producto y es techado, le gustaría tener su tienda colada y estantes grandes para sus productos. También le gustaría tener más borregos, todo esto para que su calidad de vida mejore. Además María explica muy contenta que siempre invierte nuevamente sus ganancias en los negocios, pero también obtiene para los gastos del hogar y para los pagos de su crédito.

Doña María y el resto del grupo están muy contentos y agradecidos con Kiva y Vision Fund (FRAC) pues podrán invertir en sus actividades (venta de ganado). Las personas que conforman el grupo son: Elvira, Lourdes, Romualda, Gloria, Paulina, Camila y Olivia.
texts.en:
The group "Manantial" (Spring) is located in a Mazahua community. In order to get to their meeting place, the members must travel a long distance on foot since it is impossible for any form of transportation to reach this site. The name of the group was chosen a long time ago. The members adopted this name because some of them previously belonged to another group with the same name. Even though they do not know the exact reason why they chose this name, they all believe that it is because the place where they live has many small springs where people can draw water for drinking and bathing.

Doña María, a member of the group, says that she is 51 years old and married to Sr. Fernando. Every evening, she scrapes the leaves of the agave plant in order to make traditional "pulque" (a fermented beverage). María and her husband have been together for more than 30 years. They formed a family, but only two of their children are dependents who continue to live with them even though they are no longer in school.

Doña María has been raising sheep for 30 years. She also has a grocery store that she opened approximately 20 years ago. María explains she began raising sheep when her mother gave her two lambs to care for. It was then that she learned everything about the business and decided to start one of her own. The store was established later on after her children and husband convinced her to start it. They also help out financially.

This time María is requesting a loan in order to buy five heads of sheep and to restock her grocery store with canned goods, soft drinks, candies, bread, eggs, milk, and other items. She is pleased and grateful that the loan will help to replenish the inventory of her store since she lacks various products. In her activities, María has no difficulties with her sheep since they are kept in very good conditions and her store is improving gradually. Her goal is to remodel her store since it only has planks of wood for displaying her products and a roof. She would like for her store to have larger shelves for storing her products. María would also like to have more sheep so that she can improve her quality of life. Overall she is very pleased because she is always able to reinvest her earnings in her businesses. She is also able to pay for the household expenses and cover her loan payments.

Doña María and the rest of her group and very happy with and appreciative of Kiva and Vision Fund (FRAC) because they will be able to invest in their various livestock activities. The other members of the group are Elvira, Lourdes, Romualda, Gloria, Paulina, Camila, and Olivia.

loans.use: to buy five heads of sheep and merchandise for her store.

loans.name: David Orlando

texts.es:
David es una persona muy trabajadora que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida, para lo cual el apoyo de su esposa y sus 3 hijos siempre ha sido incondicional. Anteriormente, David vivía en el municipio de San Luis, Antioquia, pero debido al conflicto de violencia que allí había se vio obligado a desplazarse hacia la ciudad y allí comenzar de nuevo con su vida. En un principio las oportunidades eran muy pocas, pues no conseguía apoyo de ninguna parte para poder conseguir un trabajo y comenzar a generar los ingresos para su hogar, pero un día decidió montar su propio negocio de venta de ropa y actualmente esta es su fuente de ingresos. David trabaja en la zona del centro y durante muchos años insistió en que le concedieran el permiso para trabajar en la calle; hace aproximadamente 5 años le concedieron el permiso y desde entonces trabaja en un punto fijo lo que le ha permitido que sus clientes lo logren referenciar más fácilmente. En su negocio tiene muy buenas ventas, principalmente debido a que ofrece prendas de vestir que están a la moda, y es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar prendas de vestir para dama para afrontar la temporada de madres y así mejorar sus ventas.
De esta manera podrá aprovechar una gran temporada en el año y así podrá generar mayores ingresos para su hogar y poco a poco seguir saliendo adelante y superando las adversidades que le presenta la vida. David sueña con poder algún día tener un local propio y no tener que seguir trabajando en la calle, pues cuando llueve debe tapar el negocio y sus ventas son casi nulas.
texts.en:
David is a very hard-working person who has had to overcome great adversities in his life, for which he has always had the unconditional support of his wife and three children.  David used to live in the town of San Luis, Antioquia, but due to violence in the area he had to move to another city and begin a new life.  At first, there were very few opportunities and he did not receive support from anyone toward finding a job and earning an income for his household.  But one day he decided to set up his own business selling clothing, which is how he currently earns a living.  

David works in the center of town and for many years kept requesting a permit to work as a street vendor.  Approximately five years ago they gave him the permit and since then he works at a fixed location which is easy for customers to find.  His business has a good sales volume, mainly due to the fact that he sells very fashionable apparel.  He is requesting the loan to buy women's clothing for the Mother's Day season, so he can increase sales.

This will allow him to take advantage of this time of year to generate more income for his household and, little by little, get ahead and overcome life's adversities.  David's goal is to have his own shop and not have to work in the street anymore, as the rain causes his sales to drop considerably.

loans.use: To buy women's clothing for Mother's Day season to increase sales.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y seguir progresando junto a sus hijos. Separada de su esposo y madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 6 hijos, Mercedes tiene como única fuente de ingresos una tienda general la cual atiende desde hace aproximadamente 11 años, y gracias a la cual pueda ofrecer en su hogar una buena calidad de vida a todos sus hijos. Gracias a que su atención siempre es la mejor ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes de su barrio, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas, sin embargo, presenta la dificultad de no contar con mucho capital para poder surtir bien su tienda y seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes una buena variedad de productos; es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para surtir su tienda y así ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor variedad de productos.
Gracias a esto su negocio podrá salir adelante y así sus hijos podrán gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Mercedes espera que con mayores ingresos su condición económica mejore y sus hijos puedan tener una mejor estabilidad económica en el hogar.
texts.en:
Mercedes has had to overcome many adversities in life, but her determination to work and get ahead has always allowed her to rise above the difficulties and continue progressing with her children.  She is divorced from her husband, and as the single mother of six children, is the head of household.  Mercedes' only source of income is the general store she has been running for approximately 11 years, thanks to which she has been able to provide her children with a quality household.

Because of her good customer service she has attracted many customers in the neighborhood, which means her sales volume is high.  However, she does not have much working capital to stock her store well and offer her customers a wide variety of products.  So she is requesting a loan to buy more products for the family shopping basket so the customers will have more variety.

Thanks to this business she will be able to get ahead and give her children a quality lifestyle.  Also, Mercedes hopes that an increase in income will improve her situation so the children will have a more stable economy at home.

loans.use: To buy essential shopping basket goods for his store so he can offer more variety.

loans.name: Maria Leticia

texts.es:
Maria es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a esta condición ha logrado salir adelante junto con su familia brindándole una buena calidad de vida y mejores condiciones económicas. Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos de quienes manifiesta son su mayor motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio todos los días, y es por esto que gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio ha logrado sacarlo adelante y lograr posicionarlo entre sus clientes. Hace aproximadamente 4 años montó una papelería con el ánimo de contribuir económicamente para los ingresos de su hogar, pues el salario que gana su esposo no es suficiente para poder sostener todos los gastos que se generan en su hogar. Gracias a esto ha logrado mejorarles la calidad de vida considerablemente a las personas de su hogar y por esto quiere seguir sacando su negocio adelante y seguir ofreciendo buenos productos a sus clientes; es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de papelería para surtir su negocio y así seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes productos de buena calidad.
De esta manera podrá tener en su negocio una mejor atención para sus clientes y así poco a poco seguirá creciendo para que su familia también tenga mejores condiciones económicas. Su sueño es sacar su negocio adelante y tener unas mejores condiciones económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Maria is a very hard worker who, because of this, has been able to get ahead with her family, giving them a quality lifestyle and better economic conditions.  She is married and has three children who are her greatest motivation to work hard every day, which she has done successfully, making her business one of the most popular among her customers.

Approximately four years ago she opened a paper goods store in order to contribute economically to the household income, since her husband's salary was not enough to cover the household expenses.  Thanks to this, she has been able to improve her family's lifestyle and wants to continue getting ahead and offering customers good products.  She is requesting a loan to buy stationery products for her business so she can offer her customers quality items.

This will allow her to improve customer service and continue growing, little by little, so her family enjoys better economic conditions.  Her goal is to be successful and improve her economic situation.

loans.use: To buy stationery products for her business so she can offer quality items to her customers.

loans.name: Maria Estella

texts.es:
Maria es una persona muy trabajadora que ha logrado superar muchas adversidades en su vida para continuar progresando junto a su familia, para lo cual sus 3 hijos y su esposo han sido fundamentales en el apoyo que le han brindado y así tiene la motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio todos los días. Maria tiene una tienda general desde hace aproximadamente 30 años, en la cual ofrecen productos de la canasta familiar, gaseosas y snack, y esta ha sido la fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Anteriormente la tienda la atendían entre Maria y su esposo, pero hace un tiempo su esposo viene sufriendo de graves problemas de salud por lo que es ella quien se hace a cargo de la atención de la tienda. Gracias a su tienda general Maria ha logrado ofrecerles a sus 3 hijos una buena educación y una buena calidad de vida, por lo que siempre busca cuidarla y que siempre crezca, es por esto que ahora que sus ventas vienen aumentando considerablemente, busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar productos de la canasta familiar, gaseosas y snack para surtir su tienda y así seguir aumentando sus ventas.
De esta manera su tienda podrá seguir creciendo y así sus ingresos aumentarán considerablemente, por lo que su familia podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Maria is a hardworking individual who has had to overcome many adversities in her life so that she could continue making progress alongside her family. Her husband and three children have been instrumental in providing the support and the motivation she needs to work diligently at her business every day.

Maria has managed a general store for approximately 30 years. She offers basic household products, sodas, and snacks. Her store is a source of income by which she is able to maintain the household expenses. Maria and her husband previously managed the business together, but some time ago her husband suffered serious health problems and she was left in charge of looking after the store. Thanks to her business, Maria has been able to provide her three children with a good education and a good quality of life. She is always looking after and growing her business, and now her sales have increased considerably. This loan gives her the opportunity to buy household products, sodas, and snacks so that she can restock her store and continue increasing her sales.

With the help of this loan, Maria's business can continue to grow and her earnings will increase considerably. Her family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and have better opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to purchase household products, sodas, and snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy family shopping basket products to increase variety and sales.

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita trabaja desde hace aproximadamente 18 años en su negocio de venta de comidas, y gracias a este ha podido contribuir económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar donde convive junto con su esposo y su hija. Margarita se encuentra muy agradecida con su negocio, pues este le ha permitido mejorarles la calidad de vida en su hogar y además de esto le ha permitido brindarle a su hija el acceso a una carrera universitaria, la cual espera seguir acompañando económicamente hasta que culmine sus estudios. Debido a la fuerte temporada del invierno, Margarita ha visto como sus clientes se ausentan debido a la falta de una protección para la lluvia, pues la mayor parte de su negocio está sobre la calle; es por esto que con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación Margarita busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un parasol y surtir su negocio con insumos que requiere para la preparación de sus comidas.
De esta manera su negocio podrá estar cubierto de la lluvia y así sus clientes no se ausentarán tanto, pues actualmente cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes, pero la lluvia hace que sus ventas no sean igual de grandes. Además, Margarita espera que con mayores ingresos su familia tenga la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y su hija pueda seguir estudiando su carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Margarita has been selling food for approximately 18 years, and thanks to her activity she has been able to economically contribute to the expenses of her household, which she shares with her husband and her daughter. Margarita is very grateful for her activity, as it has helped her improving her standard of living, on top of giving her the necessary means to pay for the university education of her daughter, whom she hopes to continue supporting until the girl completes her studies. During the harsh winter Margarita has noticed that her customers come less to her stall as it lacks protection from the rain, as the largest part of her shop is directly on the street. For this reason, and in order to improve this situation, Margarita is requesting a loan to buy a parasol and to supply her shop with ingredients she needs to prepare her dishes.
Thanks to the parasol her shop will be protected from the rain, and therefore her customers will not stay away that much: she has many customers, but the rain affects her sales, making her earn less. Margarita also hopes that a better income will help her family reach a better standard of living as well as allow her daughter to continue attending university.

loans.use: To buy a parasol and ingredients for her shop.

loans.name: Loreley

texts.es:
Loreley se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido garantizar una buena educación, es por esto que debido a que el salario de su esposo no es suficiente para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar un negocio con el cual pudiese generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Fue así como entonces decidió montar una venta de productos de uso personal a través de catálogos donde sus principales clientes son familiares, amigos y vecinos, aunque en los últimos meses ha venido aumentando la cantidad de clientes considerablemente gracias a los referidos que le han hecho. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, y los buenos precios en sus productos, Loreley hoy cuenta con un gran negocio el cual les permite tener en su hogar una mejor estabilidad económica que poco a poco les permite progresar financieramente, y es por esto que siempre busca cuidar su negocio y que este esté creciendo. Con el ánimo de ofrecer a sus clientes un nuevo producto que han lanzado, Loreley busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para comenzar a ofrecer a sus clientes unos nuevos productos que han sacado.
De esta manera seguirá ofreciendo siempre buenos productos a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá seguir teniendo una gran fidelidad en su clientela, además de que así sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente y su familia podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Su sueño es llegar a poder abrir un local donde ofrezca sus productos y pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Loreley is married and has two children for whom she has always wanted to provide a good education.  Since her husband's salary is not enough to cover household expenses, she decided to set up her own business and generate an income to help out with the family economy and giving them a better lifestyle.  She started selling personal care products by catalogue to relatives, friends and neighbors who have become her main clients.  Lately, she has attracted more clients through referrals.  Thanks to the good customer service she provides and the low prices of her products, Lorely now has an active business that allows her to give her household a more stable economy, and little by little improve the family's financial situation.

In order to offer her customers the new personal care products that have been launched, Loreley is seeking a loan to begin selling these new products.

This means her customers will have access to good products which will maintain their loyalty and increase sales considerably so her family can lead a better lifestyle.  Her goal is to open a shop for her products and generate employment for people most in need of a job.

loans.use: To buy personal care products.

loans.name: Jhon Albeiro

texts.es:
Jhon es un joven emprendedor que desde muy temprana edad viene trabajando fuertemente como empleado, pues las condiciones económicas en su hogar se lo exigen para poder contribuir con ingresos que ayuden a sostener los gastos que se generan. Desde muy pequeño, Jhon ha tenido que atravesar por fuertes adversidades en la vida, las cuales ha logrado superar con el acompañamiento de su familia y las ganas de salir adelante que siempre lo acompañan. Jhon vive con su abuela y su hermana y trabaja como empleado para una empresa, pero considera que su salario no es justo a lo que le deberían pagar; es por esto que quiere montar su propio negocio para trabajar fuertemente como independiente y así generar mayores ingresos para su hogar, y así poderles mejorar la calidad de vida a su abuela y su hermana. Con la finalidad de montar una tienda general, Jhon busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar con los que pueda iniciar su tienda general.
De esta manera podrá entonces trabajar por su propia cuenta y así progresar económicamente. Además, espera que con mayores ingresos la situación económica en su hogar se mejore y así su abuela y su hermana tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Jhon sueña con llegar a tener una gran tienda y en un futuro poder generar empleo para las personas de su familia.
texts.en: Jhon is a young entrepreneur who from a very young age has been working hard as an employee. The financial conditions of his home require him to contribute income to help pay for the expenses that are generated. Since he was very small, Jhon has had to go through strong adversity in his life, which he has been able to overcome with his family and with the will to get ahead that he always has. Jhon lives with his grandmother and his sister and works for a business. He thinks his salary isn't what he should be paid, and that is why he wants to open his own business to work hard independently and make more income for his home, thus offering a better quality of life to his grandmother and sister.  With the purpose of opening a general store, Jhon is seeking a loan to afford him the possibility of buying basic family basket products with which he can open his general store. This way he will able to work for himself and progress financially. In addition, he hopes that with more income the financial situation in his family will improve and his grandmother and sister will have a better quality of life. Jhon dreams of having a great store and in the future being able to generate jobs for the people in his family.

loans.use: to buy basic family basket products with which he can open his general store.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Don Arturo, esta casado, tiene 51 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos y vive con su esposa en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras.
El negocio de Don Arturo es la venta de Leche y sus derivados como ser, mantequilla, queso, cuajada, requesón. También se dedica a la venta de leña, pero su principal negocio es la compra y venta de ganado en la zona sur de Honduras.
Esta solicitando la cantidad de 15,000.00 lempiras para la compra de ganado para cría y destazo del mismo,  de esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, por lo tanto sus ingresos serán mejores.
Entre los sueños de Don Arturo esta la idea de terminar su casa ya que no esta terminada por falta de recursos económicos, pero con el apoyo de este tipo de créditos el y su familia tendrá un mejor estilo de vida. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Arturo is married and 51 years old. He has 2 children and lives with his wife in their own home in the Valle department in southern Honduras. 
Arturo's business is selling milk and dairy products such as butter, cheese, curds, and cottage cheese. He also sells firewood, but his main business is buying and selling cattle in southern Honduras.

He is asking for the amount of 15,000.00 lempiras to buy cattle to raise and butcher. This way he can have better sales in his business and his income will improve. Among Arturo's dreams is the idea of finishing his house, since it is unfinished due to a lack of financial resources. With the support of this type of loan, he and his family will have a better quality of life.  
 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012

loans.use: to buy cattle to raise and butcher for his business.

loans.name: Rosa Aracely

texts.es:
Doña Rosa, esta casada, tiene 39 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos y vive con su esposo en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Doña Rosa es la venta de tortillas, refrescos y nacatamales. También se dedica a la venta de leña en su casa de habitación en la zona sur de Honduras.
Doña Rosa esta solicitando la cantidad de 8,000.00 lempiras para la compra de maíz y leña.  De esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, por lo que sus ingresos serán mejores.
Entre los sueños a futuro de Doña Rosa esta la idea de terminar su casa ya que no esta terminada para que su familia tenga un mejor estilo de vida. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Rosa is a 39 year old wife and mother of 3 children. She lives with her husband in their own home in the Valle department in southern Honduras. Rosa's business is selling tortillas, drinks and nacatamales. She also sells firewood from her house in southern Honduras.
.
Rosa is asking for the amount of 8,000.00 lempiras to buy corn and firewood. This way she will generate more sales for her business and her income will be better. Among Rosa's dreams for the future is the idea of finishing her house so her family will have a better quality of life.
 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood for her business

loans.name: Kenia Isabel

texts.es:
Doña Kenia, esta casada, tiene 35 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos y vive con su esposo en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Doña Kenia es la venta de ropa nueva y golosinas, como ser, camisas, vestidos, blusas de mujer, Shorts, calcetines, faldas, sandalias, entre otros.
Doña Kenia  tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación en la zona sur de Honduras. Doña Kenia esta solicitando la cantidad de 6,000.00 lempiras para la compra de ropa nueva como Camisas, pantalones, ropa interior, ropa de niño y otros.  De esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio por lo que sus ingresos serán mejores.
Entre los sueños a futuro de Doña Kenia esta la de hacer un mejor local para su negocio.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Kenia is 35 years old, married, and has four children.  She lives with her husband in their own home, in Valle department, in the south of Honduras.  Kenia's business is selling new clothing and sweet treats.  She sells shirts, dresses, women's blouses, shorts, socks, skirts, sandals and other products.

Kenia's business is located in her home, in the south of Honduras.  She is requesting a loan for 6,000 lempiras to buy new clothing such as shirts, pants, underwear and children's clothes.  This will enable her to make more sales and her income will improve.

One of Kenia's future dreams is to have better premises for her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - April 2012.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, underwear and children's clothes for her business

loans.name: Gs La Coyotera Group

texts.es:
Doña Cristy es la líder del grupo solidario La Coyotera, esta casada, tiene 36 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos y vive con su esposo en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Doña Cristy es la venta de ropa nueva como ser; pantalones de hombre y de mujer, faldas, blusas, camisas y camisetas de hombre, calcetas, shorts, ropa interior, gorras, y algunos cosméticos.
Doña Cristy esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de faldas, blusas, camisas y camisetas de hombre, calcetas, shorts, ropa interior, gorras, y algunos cosméticos para surtir su negocio  y de esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, por lo que sus ingresos serán mejores.
Entre los sueños a futuro de Doña Cristy esta la idea de terminar su casa ya que no esta terminada y darle una mejor vida a su familia.
La señora Ingris se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva.
El señor Pedro se dedica a la venta de frutas en  varios puntos de su pueblo.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - ABRIL 2012
texts.en:
Cristy is the leader of the La Coyotera community bank.  She is 36 years old, married, and has two children.  She lives with her husband in their own home, in Valle department, in the south of Honduras.  Cristy's business is selling new clothing such as men's and women's pants (trousers), skirts, blouses, shirts, men's t-shirts, shorts, underwear, hats and some cosmetics.

Cristy is requesting a loan to buy skirts, blouses, shirts, men's t-shirts, shorts, underwear, hats and some cosmetics with which to stock her business so that she can make more sales.  This will improve her income.

One of Cristy's future dreams is to finish building her house, as it is not yet finished, and to provide her family with a better life.

Ingris' business is selling new clothing.  Pedro's business is selling fruit in different places in his village.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to buy skirts, blouses, shirts, men's t-shirts, shorts, underwear, hats and some cosmetics

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es: Doña Petronila tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y tiene 8 hijos, su esposo es ganadero y residen en la comunidad del Bijao, municipio de Juticalpa. Inicio su negocio con el ahorro de la venta de nacatamales, es una mujer luchadora y desde hace 25 años tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación que atiende ella y su esposo, el horario de atención es de 5:30 am y cierra hasta las 7:00 pm. Una de las desventajas que tiene doña Petronila en su negocio es la problemática de los delincuentes, ya que la pulpería esta expuesta siendo que su casa no cuenta con la seguridad adecuada. El préstamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar balcones para ampliar su negocio y poder tener mayor seguridad. Con el apoyo del préstamo tendrá más seguro su negocio y su familia podrá estar más confiada. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio para tener mayores ingresos que le ayuden al sostenimiento de su familia. Doña Petronila ha sido cliente de FAMA por cinco años y espera pagar las cuotas de este nuevo préstamo de forma puntual y responsable como hasta en la actualidad.
texts.en: Petronila is 50 years old, married, and has eight children.  Her husband is a cattle breeder.  They live in the community of El Bijao, in the town of Juticalpa.  Petronila started her current business using some savings that she made selling tamales.  She is a hard-working women who has had a grocery store in her home for 25 years now. Both she and her husband serve in the store, from 5.30am to 7.00pm.  One of the problems that Petronila experiences in her business is thieves because her house does not have adequate security.  She needs this loan to buy railings so that she can expand her business and enjoy better security.  The support of this loan will make her business safer and her family will be able to feel more confident.  Her goal is to grow her business in order to make more income with which to help support her family.  Petronila has been a FAMA client for five years and she expects to make the repayments on this new loan punctually and responsibly as she has done up to now.

loans.use: to buy railings

loans.name: Doralba

texts.es:
Doralba es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y esta cualidad le ha permitido superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Doralba se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 13 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación; es por esto que debido a que el salario que ganaba su esposo no era suficiente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar un negocio con el cual pudiera generar ingresos y así contribuir económicamente en su hogar para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Doralba montó un restaurante el cual ya lleva varios años operando y está muy acreditado entre sus clientes gracias a la buena calidad de las comidas que ofrece y el buen servicio que siempre presta. Gracias a que sus ventas vienen aumentando considerablemente, busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar insumos para la preparación de sus comidas como verduras, arroz, entre otros insumos.
De esta manera podrá seguir brindando a sus clientes un buen servicio y seguirá aumentando sus ventas para mejorar sus ingresos, de modo que en su hogar podrán tener una buena calidad de vida y sus hijos seguir accediendo a una educación de calidad. Doralba sueña con poder sacar sus 2 hijos adelante y brindarles las oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Doralba has always been a very hard-working person.  This quality has allowed her to overcome great adversities that have presented themselves in her life.  Doralba is married and has two children who are 6 and 13 years old.  She has always wanted to provide her children with a good quality of life and a good education.

As the salary that her husband earned wasn't enough to cover their household expenses, Doralba decided to set up a business which would make her income so that she could contribute financially towards their household and enjoy a better quality of life.  She set up a restaurant which she has now been working in for a number of years.  She is very well known among her customers owing to the good quality of the food that she sells and the good customer service that she always provides.

As she is experiencing a high increase in sales, Doralba is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy supplies for preparing her meals such as vegetables, rice, etc.  This will enable her to continue providing her customers with a good service and she will be able to continue increasing her sales and improving her income.  This will ensure that the members of her household enjoy a good quality of life and that her children are able to enjoy a good education.   Doralba dreams of being able to get her children ahead in life and provide them with the financial help they need to make progress.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing meals such as vegetables, rice, etc.

loans.name: Emerson Arley

texts.es:
Emerson es una persona muy trabajadora que ha venido luchando fuertemente para sacar su familia adelante, pues proviene de una familia con escasos recursos económicos y ahora ha formado una familia conformada por su esposa y su hijo de 3 años a quienes les debe garantizar unos ingresos para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Con un negocio de venta de prendas de vestir y calzado genera sus ingresos y de esta manera les puede ofrecer a su esposa y su hija una buena calidad de vida y poco a poco ir progresando, es por esto que siempre cuida de su negocio y trabaja fuertemente para que este crezca cada vez más. Gracias a la buena calidad de los productos que ofrece y el buen servicio que brinda a sus clientes, Emerson ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes los cuales le hacen grandes pedidos de sus productos, por lo que ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar prendas de vestir y calzado para responder a los grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.
De esta manera podrá seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar y su negocio seguirá creciendo poco a poco, además de que su familia seguirá teniendo una buena calidad de vida y buenas oportunidades económicas para progresar. Emerson sueña con brindarle a su esposa y su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y en un futuro ofrecerle a su hijo el acceso a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en: Emerson is a very hard-working person who has fought hard to provide for his family as he comes from a family of limited economic means.  He has now formed his own family which consists of his wife and 3-year-old child.  He needs to make regular income so that he can cover his household expenses.  He makes the income he needs from his business selling clothing and footwear.  As a result, he is able to offer his wife and child a good quality of life and gradually make progress.  He always looks after his business and works hard so that he can continue growing it further.  Thanks to the good quality of the products that he sells and the good customer service that her provides, Emerson has managed to attract a large number of customers who place large orders for his products.  He is looking for a loan that will allow him to buy enough clothing and footwear to fill the large orders that his customers have placed with him.  This will enable him to continue making the income his household needs and will allow him to continue growing his business bit by bit.  He will be able to ensure his family continue enjoying a good quality of life and give them the financial support they need to make progress.  Emerson dreams of providing his wife and child with a better quality of life and, in the future, he would like his child to receive a good education.

loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear to respond to some large orders that his customers have made

loans.name: Patricia Eugenia

texts.es:
Patricia es una madre soltera de sus 3 hijos, pues se separó del padre de sus hijos desde hace un largo tiempo y desde entonces tiene la obligación de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar; fue así como decidió montar una tienda general con la cual pudiese garantizar los ingresos para el hogar. Hace aproximadamente 10 años abrió su tienda general en la cual ofrece a sus clientes productos de la canasta familiar y desde entonces viene trabajando fuertemente para sacar su tienda adelante, trabajo que se ha visto reflejado en el crecimiento de su tienda la cual cada vez capta un mayor número de clientes. Gracias a la gran cantidad de clientes que tiene en su tienda, tiene muy buenas ventas, y es por esto que ahora busca un préstamo que le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar para ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante, de modo que sus hijos podrán tener seguro una buena calidad de vida y el acceso a una educación de calidad. Patricia sueña con tener un gran negocio y con poder sacar a sus 3 hijos adelante brindándoles una buena educación universitaria.
texts.en: Patricia is a single mother of three. She separated from the father of her children a long time ago and since then, she has had the obligation of generating the necessary income for the household expenses. This is how she came to decide to set up a general store in order to guarantee money for the household expenses. Approximately ten years ago, Patricia opened her general store where she offers her customers household products. Since then she has been working hard to make her store successful. Her work has been reflected in her store’s growth and the attraction of a larger number of customers. Thanks to the large quantity of customers that she has had in her store, she has very good sales. For this reason, now she is requesting a loan that will allow her to purchase household products in order to offer her customers a greater variety of products. With the loan, she will continue to make progress. Her children will be able to have a good quality of life and have access to a quality education. Patricia dreams about having a large business and offering her three children a good university-level education.

loans.use: purchase household products in order to offer her customers a variety of products.

loans.name: Isroiljon

texts.ru: Исроилчон родился в 1984 году в хорошей воспитанной семье. С ранних лет ему нравилось ухаживать за скотом. Исроилчон трудолюбивый и добрый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Его родители также живут с ними. С 2002 года он начал свой собственный бизнес купле- продажи скота. Он закупает крупный рогатый скот на рынке «Дусти» два раза в месяц и продает после 2- 2,5 месяцев. Ему в бизнесе помогает отец. А также у него имеются другие доходы от услуг мастера. Исроилчон с 2007 года кредитуется в «Имон Интернешнл» и имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Исроилчон запрашивает займ для дополнительного закупа крупного рогатого скота и корма для них. С помощью вашей поддержки он хочет увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Isroiljon was born in 1984 in a well-educated family.  From an early age he enjoyed caring for livestock.  He is a hardworking and kind man, married and the father of three children.  His wife is a homemaker and his parents live with them.  

In 2002, Isroiljon started his own business buying and selling cattle.  He buys his cattle twice a month at the Dusti market and resells it after two or two-and-a-half months.  His father helps him with the business.  He also gets another source of income working as a foreman.

Isroiljon has been taking loans with "Imon International" since 2007 and he has a good credit history.  He is requesting a loan to purchase additional cattle and cattle feed.  With your support, he wants to boost his working capital. He looks forward to your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy cattle and cattle feed.

loans.name: Mónica Cristina

texts.es:
Monica se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 11 años de edad a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer una buena educación, es por esto que siempre ha estado vinculada trabajando para generar ingresos con la intención de contribuir económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, y así tener una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar. Hace aproximadamente 3 años trabajó en una tienda con una amiga donde tenían también la venta de comidas rápidas, posteriormente trabajó en una empresa de floristería y en una empresa de venta de huevos; pero actualmente se encuentra desempleada y es por esto que quiere aprovechar su experiencia de venta de comidas rápidas para montar su propio negocio y así seguir garantizando en su hogar los ingresos con los cuales pueda contribuir económicamente para mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo y su hijo. Es con esta finalidad que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra insumos para la preparación de comidas rápidas y así montar su negocio de venta de comidas rápidas. 
De esta manera podrá seguir teniendo unos ingresos y su familia seguirá teniendo una buena calidad de vida. Además, podrá poco a poco ir cumpliendo su sueño de sacar su hijo adelante y brindarle una buena educación y en un futuro el acceso a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Mónica is married and has one son, 11-years-old, to whom she has always wanted to offer a good education.  This is why she has always been linked to working in order to generate income with the intention of contributing financially to maintaining the household expenses and thus having a better quality of life in her home.  

She has been working for about three years with a friend in a shop where they have also sold fast food, before that she worked for a florist company and in a business that sold eggs. But now she is unemployed and this is why she wants to take advantage of her experience selling fast food in order to set up her her own business and thus continue to guarantee household income with which she would be able to contribute financially to improving the quality of life for her husband and her son.  It is with this purpose that she seeks a loan that will offer her the opportunity to purchase ingredients for preparing fast food and thus set up her business of selling fast food.

In this manner she will be able to continue having income and her family will continue having a good quality of life.  Furthermore, little by little she will be able to accomplish her dream of getting her child ahead in life and offering him a good education and in the future the access to a university education.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for the preparation of fast food and thus set up her business of selling fast food.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Consuelo se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, y con el ánimo de contribuir económicamente en su hogar tiene una papelería donde también ofrece el servicio de café Internet a sus clientes; de esta manera genera ingresos con los cuales su familia puede gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. En su café Internet tiene muy buena clientela, y gracias a esto sus ventas han venido aumentando considerablemente, además, sus clientes la reconocen por ofrecer una muy buena atención en su negocio. Debido a que uno de sus computadores se dañó, busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar un computador con el cual pueda seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes un buen servicio en el café Internet.
De esta manera podrá seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para contribuir económicamente al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar y así poco a poco ir brindando en su familia una buena calidad de vida. Además, Consuelo espera que su negocio le brinde la posibilidad de cumplir su sueño de construir su propia casa donde su familia pueda tener unas mejores oportunidades para progresar.
texts.en:
Consuelo is married and has 2 children, for whom she has always wanted to provide a good quality of life. With the desire to contribute economically to her household, she has a paper goods shop where she also offers Internet café service to her customers. In this way, she generates income with which her family can enjoy a better quality of life and better economic opportunities to get ahead. In her Internet café she has very good customers, and thanks to this her sales have been rising considerably. In addition, her customers appreciate her for the very good service she offers in her business. Since one of her computers has been damaged, she is seeking a loan which will give her the opportunity to buy a computer, so she can continue offering her customers good service in her Internet café.

In this way, she will be able to continue generating the necessary income to contribute economically to paying her household expenses, and thus little by little move toward providing her family with a good quality of life. Consuelo also hopes that her business will give her the possibility to fulfill her dream of building her own house, where her family can have some better opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy a computer so she can continue offering good service in her Internet café.

loans.name: Matias Antonio

texts.es:
Matias desde hace 27 años aproximadamente trabaja en la fabricación de herraduras, actividad que aprendió de su padre y que se la enseñó desde muy temprana edad, por lo que ahora cuenta con una gran experiencia que le permite diferenciarse ante sus clientes y esto le ha permitido cada vez mejorar en su negocio. Con esta actividad, genera los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y su hijo, de modo que les puede brindar una buena calidad de vida en su hogar. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Matias tiene muy buenos pedidos de sus clientes, es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como lámina, hierro y carbón para fabricar las herraduras y responder a los grandes pedidos que le hacen sus clientes.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes y así seguirá generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Además, Matias sueña con ampliar su negocio generando empleo para las personas más necesitadas y también seguir progresando junto a su familia.
texts.en:
For approximately 27 years, Matias has been making horseshoes. He learned this skill from his father who taught him at a very early age. Now he has a lot of experience that allows him to differentiate himself from others for his customers. This allows him improve his business. With the business, he makes the income needed for the household expenses where he lives with his wife and son. The income lets him have a good quality of life at home. Thanks to the good quality of his products, Matias gets very good orders from his customers. He is now requesting a loan in order to obtain raw materials like sheeting, iron and coal for making the horseshoes and responding to his customers’ large orders.
With this help, his business will continue to offer good service to customers. And then, he will continue to generate the income needed for his home. In addition, Matias dreams about expanding her business and creating jobs for people in need. He dreams about continue to make progress with his family.

loans.use: purchase raw materials like sheeting, iron and coal for making the horseshoes and responding to his customers’ large orders.

loans.name: Latifa Group

texts.en:
This group is called Latifa which consists of four members, Samyah, Wafa, Laila and Latifa, who are ladies. They are cooperating to work hard and get more profit from their businesses. They took out a loan of 180,000 YER.

Latifa, the leader of the group, is a married woman who has three children and lives in Taiz, Yemen. She is a beautician who has been working in this field for three years. She was enabled to buy cosmetic materials and other items from her father's money. 

She works hard to provide for her family. Because of her desire to work, she satisfies her clients. She applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy cosmetic and makeup materials for her business. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic and makeup materials for her business.

loans.name: Dunia Isabel

texts.es:
La Señora Dunia tiene 34 años de edad, ella vive con su  familia, tiene 1 hijo, Su actividad principal es la venta de ropa, desde hace más de 2 años Dunia, ella esta solicitando el préstamo a PRISMA para la compra de productos como ser: ropa nueva, cosméticos, lociones, cremas y otros artículos de uso personal para la atención de sus clientes, ella realiza sus ventas de manera ambulante, en algunas comunidades cercanas, Dunia es una persona muy trabajadora y se dedica a su negocio a tiempo completo ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos.
Con el préstamo solicitado Dunia tendrá un mejor negocio, y así obtendrá mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Uno de sus sueños de Dunia es tener un local con vitrinas y estantes para poder atender mejor a sus clientes.
Danlí El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Dunia is 34 years old.  She lives with her family and has one child.  Her main business is the sale of new clothes.  She has been asking for a loan from PRISMA for more than two years, to buy products such as new items of clothing, cosmetics, lotions, creams and other personal items for her customers.  She is a street vendor in some of the local communities.  Dunia is a very hard working person and works full time on her business, as it is her main source of income. 

Dunia will have a better business with the loan, and so will earn a better income to pay her household expenses and to provide a better quality of life for her family.

One of Dunia's dreams is to have premises with a window display and shelves to be able to better attend to her clients.

loans.use: to buy new items of clothing, cosmetics, lotions, creams and other personal items for her business.

loans.name: Danny Ulises

texts.es:
Don Danny, tiene 24 años de edad,  esta soltero, no tiene  hijos y vive con su  madre y su hermana en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Danny es la venta de mariscos como ser pescado y camarón en la zona sur de Honduras, y en el mercado Municipal de Santa Rosa El Salvador. 
Danny esta solicitando la cantidad de 16,000.00 lempiras para la compra de pescado y camarón,  de esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, por lo tanto sus ingresos serán mejores, y que sus clientes encuentren de todo en un solo lugar.
Entre sus sueños a futuro de Danny esta la idea de terminar su casa ya que no esta terminada por falta de recursos económicos, pero con el apoyo de este tipo de créditos el su familia tendrá un mejor estilo de vida.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Danny is 24 years old, single, and has no children.  He lives with his mother and sister in a home of their own located in the Valle department in southern Honduras.  Danny’s business is selling seafood such as fish and shrimp in the southern zone of Honduras and in the city marketplace in Santa Rosa El Salvador.

Danny is requesting a loan of 16,000 Lempiras in order buy fish and shrimp and in this way be able to increase his sales and therefore his income.  His customers will also be able to find everything they need in one place.

Among Danny’s dreams for the future is the idea of completing his home, since it’s not complete because he lacks financial resources, but with support from these types of loans he will have a better lifestyle.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – April 2012

loans.use: to buy fish and shrimp.

loans.name: Om Hamzh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om Hamzh. It consists of five members: Asia, Entsar, Afrah, Alya and Ameera. They are all ladies who live in Aden, Yemen. They are hard workers and have been able to help their families. They applied for a loan of 290,000 YER.

Ameera is the leader of this group. She is a fat woman seated in the center and holding a handbag. She is 32 years old, married, and raising four children. While looking for a source of income for her family, she started her business selling women's accessories six years ago. Because of her steadfastness and hard work, she was able to develop her business and make a profit. 

Today there's not enough variety in her business, and that's why she has come for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to restock additional women's accessories like cosmetic materials. She plans to invest the income from the loan into growth of her business.

loans.use: to restock additional women's accessories like cosmetic materials for her business.

loans.name: Andres Felipe

texts.es:
Andres es un joven emprendedor que desde muy temprana edad viene trabajando, pues proviene de una familia con escasos recursos económicos por lo que trabaja desde hace tiempo para contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Hace aproximadamente 2 años trabajó en una taberna en la cual aprendió el oficio del servicio al cliente, posteriormente trabajó en oficios varios durante un tiempo y ahora que quiere progresar económicamente busca comprar una cafetería para así generar los ingresos con los cuales pueda seguir contribuyendo en su hogar para superar las grandes adversidades que se les presentan en la vida. Debido a que una parte del dinero que cuesta la cafetería ya lo tiene ahorrado, Andres busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a completar el dinero que le hace falta para comprar la cafetería y así poder tener su propio negocio. 
De esta manera podrá progresar económicamente y así también trabajará como independiente, generando mayores ingresos y ofreciendo a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Andres sueña con tener un gran negocio y en este poder generar empleo para las personas que al igual que el no gozan de muchas oportunidades económicas en la vida.
texts.en:
Andrés is a young entrepreneur who has been working since he was very young because he comes from a family with few economic resources.  This is why he has worked for a long time to contribute financially to his household.

Approximately two years ago he worked in a tavern where he learned customer service.  Later he worked for a time in various trades.  Now he wants to get ahead financially and is looking to buy a cafe to generate the income with which he can continue making a contribution in his home to overcome the great adversities that life presents.

Owing to the fact that he already has saved part of the money for the cafe, Andrés is looking for a loan that will give him the opportunity to fill out what he needs to buy the cafe and so have his own business.  In this way he will be able to progress economically and also work on his own, generating more income and giving his family a better quality of life.

Andrés dreams about having a great business and so be able to generate jobs for people like him who don't have many economic opportunities in life.

loans.use: to complete the amount of money he needs to buy the cafe.

loans.name: Maria Elizabet

texts.es:
Dona María, tiene 49 años de edad,  tiene 4 hijos y vive con sus Hijos y esposo en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Dona María es una pulpería que tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación, en la que vende, productos de la canasta básica familiar y granos básicos,  como ser; manteca, margarina, azúcar, café, harina, arroz, frijoles, maíz, refrescos, agua, jugos, productos desechables, entre otra variedad de productos.
Doña María esta actividad la realiza desde hace varios años en su casa de habitación muy cerca de la plaza central de su pueblo en la zona sur de Honduras.
Doña María esta solicitando la cantidad de 12,000.00 lempiras para la compra de manteca, margarina, azúcar, café, harina, arroz, frijoles, maíz, refrescos, agua, jugos y abarrotería de esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, por lo tanto sus ingresos serán mejores.
Entre los sueños de doña María a futuro es sacar adelante su negocio y lograr que crezca cada día más. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
María is 49 years old, has 4 children and lives with them and her husband in her own home in the district of Valle in the south of Honduras. Her business is a small grocery store that is located in her house. She sells basic household food and grain products, such as butter, margarine, sugar, coffee, flour, rice, black beans, sweetcorn, drinks, water, juice, single-use products, and others. María has been in this business for many years, always at her house, which is very close to the central square of her village in the south of Honduras. María asks for a loan of 12,000 lempiras in order to buy butter, margarine, sugar, coffee, flour, rice, black beans, sweetcorn, drinks, water, juice and groceries to increase her sales and thus have a better income. Among María's dreams for the future are staying in business and making her business grow every day.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to buy supplies for her store.

loans.name: Fatima Lourdes

texts.es:
Dona Fátima, tiene 33 años de edad,  tiene 3 hijos y vive con sus Hijos y esposo en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Dona Fátima es la venta de cosméticos y accesorios de mujer como ser cremas, lociones, shampoo, tintes para el cabello, cremas para cara, uñas acrílicas, ganchos para el cabello, colas, peines, cepillos para cabello, etc.; esta actividad la realiza a domicilio en barrios y colonias de su pueblo en la zona sur de Honduras.
Doña Fátima esta solicitando la cantidad de 12,000.00 lempiras para la compra de cosméticos y accesorios de mujer como ser cremas, lociones, shampoo, tintes para el cabello, cremas para cara, uñas acrílicas, ganchos para el cabello, colas, peines, cepillos para cabello, etc. y de esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, por lo tanto sus ingresos serán mejores, y que sus clientes encontraran de todo en un solo lugar.
Entre los sueños de Doña Fátima a futuro es terminar de darles los estudios a sus hijos y graduarlos para que ellos sean personas de bien para la sociedad.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Fátima is 33 years old, has 3 children and lives with them and her husband in her own home in the district of Valles in the south of Honduras. Her business is selling cosmetics and feminine beauty products such as creams, lotions, shampoo, hair dye, face moisturisers, artificial nails, hair accessories, combs, hair brushes, etc. She conducts her business door-to-door in the various neighbourhoods of her village in the south of Honduras. Fátima asks for a loan of 12,000 lempiras to buy cosmetics and feminine beauty products such as creams, lotions, shampoo, hair dye, face moisturisers, artificial nails, hair accessories, combs, and hair brushes in order to increase her sales and thus improve her income. She wants to make sure that her customers are able to buy everything they need from a single source. Among Fátima's dreams for the future are to finish putting her children through school and to see them graduate so that they become useful to society.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Anaam

texts.en:
Anaam is a 47-year-old married lady. Her husband is an electrician. They have three daughters and a son.

With her smile, Anaam welcomes her customers at home to buy the clothes and underwear she sells. 

Now Anaam wants to increase the quantity of clothes she has, and for that she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of clothes she has to sell.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 30-year-old married woman. She has two children.

Iman wants to help her husband, who works in a stone pit, in supporting the family and improving their living conditions.

She stared a small retail business selling bed covers and blankets, and she has applied for this youth loan to increase the quantity she has of those products.

loans.use: to buy more bed covers to sell.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is a 45-year-old married woman.  She is the mother of 2 children, and she lives in Irbid, Jordan.

Aisha is seeking a loan of 500 JOD.  This will allow her to buy more quantities of clothes for trading purposes so her income will increase.

loans.use: to buy more quantities of clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Lubna

texts.en:
Lubna is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo to the internet, so she is represented by a photo of her husband.

Lubna is a 34-year-old married woman.  She is a mother of 2 children and she lives in Irbid, Jordan.

Lubna is seeking a loan of 400 JOD that will allow her to buy missing items for her home.  In the future, she's looking to buy more furniture she needs and to increase her home space.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Laith

texts.en:
Laith is a 25-year-old married man. He is a father of one child. He lives in Madaba, Jordan.

Laith is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so he can improve his home living conditions and repair his house to be more healthy and suitable for his family.

Laith is under 30 years old so his loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to improve his home conditions.

loans.name: Ameen

texts.en:
Ameen is a 40-year-old married man. He has three daughters.

Ameen has recently started selling sweets. He even opened a shop for selling different types of traditional sweets. 

Now he wants to expand by employing more people and buying special equipment to make those sweets so he can increase his productivity to be able to serve all his customers. For that he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy special equipment to make sweets.

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a conservative woman and she is unwilling to upload her photo on the Internet. The photo is of her daughter.

Samar is a 46-year-old married woman. She is a mother of four children. She lives in Irbid, Jordan.

Samar is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so she can buy some missing tools for her home and improve its conditions. In the future, Samar wants to buy new furniture for her home and increase its size.

loans.use: to buy some tools and improve her home conditions.

loans.name: Selvin Josue

texts.es:
El Señor Selvin tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su  familia, es padre soltero tiene 1 hijo, Su actividad principal es la venta de mercadería, desde hace más de 4 años. Selvin esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de productos como ser: pescado, tilapía, camarón, carnes, embutidos, mantequilla y otros productos de consumo para la buena atención de sus clientes, el realiza sus ventas de manera ambulante, en algunas comunidades, es una persona muy trabajadora, su negocio a sido la principal fuente de sus ingresos, El se ha ganado la clientela por su buena manera de atenderlos, con el préstamo que reciba Selvin le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, y así poder salir adelante,
Selvin sueña con tener un local de mariscos en su comunidad.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Selvin, 34, lives with his family and is the single father of one child.  His main job for more than four years has been selling merchandise.

Selvin is requesting the loan to buy such products as fish, tilapia, shrimp, meat, sausage, butter, and other food to give his customers good service.

He makes his sales as a street vendor in a few communities.  He is a very hardworking person.  His business has been his main source of income.  He has gained customers because of his good service.

The loan will help Selvin have a better business and get better income to cover the household expenses and give his family a better quality of life to be able to get ahead.

Selvin dreams about having a shellfish store in his community.

Danli, El Paraíso, Honduras, April 2012

loans.use: to buy fish, tilapia, shrimp, meat, sausage, butter, and other food.

loans.name: Jawahir

texts.en:
Jawahir is a 46-year-old conservative woman. She asked her son, who helps her in the business, to take the photo instead.

Jawahir is a housewife, caring for four sons and one daughter.

She started a small business in farming to support the family so they can meet the increased financial needs. With the USD 1,425 loan she is applying for, Jawahir wants to buy more seeds and fertilizers to enhance the plants she is growing, knowing that she will switch them with every season.

loans.use: to buy more seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.es: Doña Aurora tiene 63 años de edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos, es una familia bien unida, trabajadora y de buenos principios cristianos, ella y su esposo residen en Bonito, Colon. Doña Aura se dedica a la venta de comestibles y abarrotería en general, ella sola atiende el negocio, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 am hasta las 8:00 p.m. el negocio es bien rentable y le deja buenos ingresos que le ayudan al sostenimiento de su hogar. El préstamo que doña Aura solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la pulpería en la compra de productos como ser: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, manteca, refrescos, churros, dulces, vegetales, carnes, etc. Con el apoyo de este préstamo tendrá mayor surtido su negocio y podrá ofrecerles a sus clientes productos de variedad. Una de las metas de doña Aura es tener una pulpería bien surtida que le genere ingresos para poder salir adelante con su esposo. El desafio de doña Aura ha sido mantenerse y poder incrementar la eficiencia de sus actividades.Doña Aura tiene 2 ciclos de recibir el apoyo de FAMA mediante los préstamos obtenidos y ha mantenido un  buen comportamiento de pago.
texts.en: Aurora is 63 years old, married with 5 children. Thogether they form a very united family, who works hard and has good christian principles. She lives with her husband in Bonito, Colon. Aurora sells food products and general groceries. She is the only one who attends customers and she works from 7 am to 8 pm.  Her business is very profitable and gives her a decent income that helps with supporting her household. She asks for a loan to invest in her small grocery store and buy supplies such as rice, sugar, black beans, butter, drinks, churros, jams, vegetables, meat, etc. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to offer a greater variety of items at her store and offer a choice to her customers. One of Aurora's goals is to have a well-stocked grocery store that generates enough income to allow her and her husband to live. Her main challenge has been keeping in business and making her activity more efficient. Aurora is in her second loan cycle with field partner FAMA and has always paid back on time.

loans.use: to buy basic products to sell.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a 40-year-old housewife. Her husband works in a barbershop. They have no children.

For two years now, Mona has been doing a trading business, buying clothes by kilos and reselling them at her house. 

This is her second time applying for a loan. Now she wants to buy more quantity of clothes and more hangers till she makes the required amount of money that will allow her to move into the market and open a small shop of her own.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Wisam

texts.en:
Wisam is a 28-year-old married woman. Her husband is serving in the military. They have two daughters.

Wisam has a small clothing sales business at home. The clothes she sells are only for children and teenagers. 

Wisam wants to expand her business to cover the youth category, so she has applied for this youth loan in order to bring in more clothes.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha es una persona que ha tenido que superar muchas adversidades en su vida, para lo cual el acompañamiento de su esposo y sus 3 hijos ha sido fundamental. Desde hace 4 años aproximadamente viene trabajando en una cafetería como empleada y de esta manera contribuye económicamente en su hogar, sin embargo, debido a que considera que su negocio es muy mal remunerado quiere montar su propio negocio para así poder recibir unos mejores ingresos. Debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder montar su tienda, Martha busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar, gaseosas y snack para así poder iniciar su tienda general.
De esta manera podrá cumplir su sueño de tener su propio negocio y al mismo tiempo poder brindarle a su familia unos mayores ingresos con los cuales puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
