Martha has had to overcome many difficulties in her life, and having her husband and three children at her side has been fundamental. For about four years she has worked as a café employee, and in this way has given financial assistance to her home. However, as she thinks that she is very poorly paid, she wants to start her own business to obtain better income. 


Since she does not have the capital she needs to open her store, Martha has applied for a loan to allow her to buy staple goods, sodas and snacks to start her business. This will allow her to realize her dream of having her own business. She will also be able to provide her family with greater income, meaning that they will have a better quality of life and more financial opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy staple goods, sodas and snacks to start up her general store.

loans.name: Luz Albany

texts.es:
Luz Albany es una persona muy trabajadora que ha logrado superar grandes obstáculos que le ha presentado la vida. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijas de 6 y 9 años de edad, pues el padre de sus hijas los abandonó hace un largo tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, Luz Albany debe garantizar unos ingresos en su hogar con los cuales pueda sostener todos los gastos y brindarles a sus 2 hijas una buena calidad de vida. Hace 4 años aproximadamente tiene un negocio de venta de comidas rápidas, el cual atiende todos los días y en el cual gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ya puede generar un empleo que le colabora en la atención de la gran cantidad de clientes que tiene en su negocio; sin embargo, actualmente presenta la dificultad de que su carro de comidas rápidas se encuentra dañado y es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar un carro de comidas rápidas para poder reemplazar el que tiene actualmente que se encuentra malo y así poder seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes un buen servicio.
De esta manera podrá tener un negocio con una buena atención a los clientes y seguir poco a poco creciendo para generar mayores ingresos para su hogar. Además, Luz Albany tiene el sueño de brindarles a sus 2 hijas una educación de buena calidad y mayores oportunidades económicas en un futuro que les permita progresar.
texts.en:
Luz Albany is a hard-working woman who has managed to overcome the significant obstacles she has faced in life. She is a single mother of two daughters aged six and nine, and head of the household. Her husband left her a long time ago, and does not provide any financial support for the children. Luz Albany has to generate income to cover her household expenses and give her children a good quality of life.

For approximately four years she has had a fast food business. She works every day and, thanks to the good quality of her products, she has been able to hire someone else to help her handle the large number of customers who go to her business. However, her fast food cart is currently damaged. She is therefore requesting a loan to buy another cart to replace the damaged one she currently has, which will allow her to continue offering a good service to her customers.

This loan will allow Luz Albany to have a business with good customer service, gradually increasing her business to generate higher income for her household. She also dreams of providing her two daughters with a good quality education and better financial opportunities for the future, which will allow them to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy a fast food cart to replace the one she currently has, which is damaged, allowing her to continue offering a good service to her customers.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Maria se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 15 años a quien le ha querido siempre ofrecer una educación de calidad, por esto ella y su esposo trabajan fuertemente para poder generar ingresos suficientes con los cuales su hogar tenga una buena calidad de vida. Hace aproximadamente 4 años su esposo se quedó sin empleo, y su empleo era la única fuente de ingresos que tenían para poder sostener todos los gastos que se generaban en su hogar; fue con ese sentido de urgencia de generar los ingresos que se requerían en su hogar que Maria montó un criadero de pollos y así poco a poco con la venta de estos se fueron generando unos pocos ingresos para el sostenimiento del hogar. Debido a circunstancias adversas a su voluntad, se vio en la obligación de cerrar su criadero de pollos y renunciar a esta fuente de ingresos, pero ahora que tiene la oportunidad de retomar la actividad Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de realizar mejoras locativas al galpón de pollos y comprar algunos pollos para su crianza.
De esta manera podrá seguir generando ingresos por medio de esta fuente de modo que su familia siga teniendo unos ingresos que les garanticen una buena calidad de vida. Además, Maria tiene el sueño de que su negocio le brinde la posibilidad de terminar de construir su hogar el cual no han culminado por falta de recursos de dinero.
texts.en:
Maria is married and has a 15-year-old son. She has always wanted to give her son a quality education, so she and her husband work hard to obtain sufficient income to make sure they have a good quality of life at home. 

About four years ago her husband lost his job, and Maria’s job was the only income they had to cover all the household expenses. It was this sense of urgency to generate the income needed at home that Maria set up business raising chickens. The sale of these chickens gradually began to generate income, which was used to support her household. However, due to adverse circumstances beyond her control she had to close this business, losing this source of income.

Now that she has the opportunity to start the business again, Maria has requested a loan to make improvements to her chicken shed and buy chickens to raise. This will allow her to continue generating income from this business, so that her family can have a good quality of life. Maria also dreams of her business giving her the chance to finish building her house, which has not yet been completed due to a lack of funds.

loans.use: To make improvements to her chicken shed and buy chickens to raise.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando junto a su hijo. Como madre soltera cabeza de familia de su único hijo de 13 años, pues su esposo murió hace un tiempo dejándola a cargo de todas las obligaciones del hogar, Luz Marina ha tenido que trabajar fuertemente para poder sostener todos los gastos que se generan en su hogar y así poder salir adelante brindándole a su hijo una buena educación. Para generar los ingresos en su hogar, tiene una cría de pollos y de cerdos, las cuales son reconocidas entre sus clientes por la buena calidad y esto le ha permitido tener muy buena clientela que la hace grandes pedidos; precisamente con el ánimo de poder tener la cantidad de animales que sus clientes le vienen pidiendo, Luz Marina busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de pollos para la crianza y el cuido necesario para su alimentación.
De esta manera podrá seguir saliendo adelante con su negocio preservando la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta, de modo que su hijo podrá seguir accediendo a una educación y oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Luz Marina has had to overcome many difficulties in her life. However, she has always had the strength to get ahead and move forward in life alongside her son. She is a single mother to a 13-year-old boy and head of the household, as her husband passed away some time ago leaving her in charge of the household obligations. Luz Marina has had to work hard to meet all her household expenses and give her son a good education. 

The household income comes from Luz Marina’s business raising chickens and pigs. These animals are well-known among her customers for their good quality, and she therefore has a large number of customers who place large orders. In order to have enough animals to meet her customers’ orders, Luz Marina has requested a loan to buy chickens to raise and chicken feed. This will allow her to get ahead with her business, preserving the only source of income she has. Her son will therefore be able to continue with his education, and they will have financial opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy chickens to raise and chicken feed.

loans.name: Jose Vicente

texts.es:
Jose aprendió la actividad de la agricultura desde muy temprana edad, pues su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y desde muy joven se la enseñó; desde entonces viene desempeñándose en esta actividad y gracias a la experiencia adquirida ha logrado destacarse por tener unos productos de muy buena calidad. Con este negocio genera los ingresos para su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus hijos, y así les brinda una buena calidad de vida. Con el ánimo de sacar sus cultivos adelante Jose busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para sacar su cultivo adelante.
Así podrá seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes productos de buena calidad y sus ingresos mensuales no se verán afectados. Además, espera que con mejores ingresos su familia goce de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Jose learned the agricultural trade from a very young age, as his father worked in this area and taught Jose when he was a young boy. Since then he has worked in this business and, thanks to the experience he has obtained, he now stands out as a person who offers produce of a very good quality. This business generates the income needed by his household, where he lives with his wife and children, allowing him to provide them with a good quality of life.

To progress with his crop-growing business, José has applied for a loan to buy compost, insecticide and fungicide. This will allow him to continue offering good quality to his customers, and his monthly income will not be affected. He also hopes that the increase in income will allow his family to enjoy a better quality of life and better financial opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy compost, insecticide and fungicide to progress with his crop-growing business.

loans.name: Sakhr

texts.en:
Sakhr is a 28-year-old, married man who lives in Ibb, Yemen. He sells womens' accessories at one of the local markets. He always has a great assortment of products, which consistently attract more and more buyers to him. Furthermore, he sells the products at acceptable prices, which interest his customers even more.

Sakhr has been in this business for around 5 years already. His great experience and love for his work helped him to achieve a working capital. He plans to invest the youth loan of 250,000 Yemen Rials (YER) in purchasing additional womens' accessories such as creams, shampoos, and cosmetic materials for resale. He loves his work and he really prefers to work with these types of products. He hopes to invest the income received from his business in its further development.

loans.use: to buy additional womens' accessories such as creams, shampoos, and cosmetic materials for resale.

loans.name: Talal

texts.en:
Talal is a 41-year-old married man caring for four sons and two daughters. 
To be able to support his big family, Talal has to do two jobs, one as a driver and the second as a retail trader. Talal chose to start selling frames and hanging artworks. He has applied for this loan in order to expand his business opportunities by acquiring more goods, such as art and decorative pieces, for resale.

loans.use: to acquire more goods, such as art and decorative pieces, for resale.

loans.name: Jorge De Jesus

texts.es:
Jorge ha tenido que sufrir por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha estado acompañado de su esposa y sus 3 hijos quienes son su mayor motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio todos los días. Desplazado por la violencia de su municipio natal salió en búsqueda de mejores oportunidades para progresar económicamente junto a su familia, y fue así como logro ubicarse y montar una tienda general donde ofrece a sus clientes productos de la canasta familiar. Gracias a este negocio genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar y así brindarle a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Debido a que no cuenta con   suficiente capital en su negocio, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar y así surtir su negocio para ofrecerles a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.
De esta manera su negocio podrá seguir saliendo adelante y así su familia también podrá gozar de mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Jorge has endured many hardships in his life; however, he has always been accompanied by his wife and their three children, who are his biggest motivation to work hard at his business every day. Displaced by the violence of his hometown, he and his family left in search of better opportunities to progress economically, which is how they found their way and opened a general store, offering clients good that make up the basic food basket. Thanks to the business, he can earn all the income he needs to cover the household expenses and offer his family a good quality of life. 

Since his business lacks sufficient capital, he is looking for a loan to buy the basic products that families need, and this way stock his store so that he can offer his clients a larger variety of products. This way, his business will be able to continue advancing forward. His family will able to enjoy a better income, allowing them to have a better quality of life and more economic opportunities to progress.

loans.use: Purchase goods that comprise the basic food basket to stock his business to offer his clients a larger variety of products

loans.name: Guillermo Leon

texts.es:
Guillermo se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena educación, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente en su negocio con el ánimo de generar suficientes ingresos para brindarles una buena calidad de vida en su hogar. Hace un largo tiempo inició junto con su esposa una venta de arepas de chócolo y empanadas, lo cual se fue expandiendo y ahora es una tienda donde ofrece dulces, snack, gaseosa, entre otros productos, y la cual es en la actualidad la fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a la buena ubicación de su negocio ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas, sin embargo, presenta la desventaja de que su negocio es una choza en la cual ya no tiene capacidad para ofrecer más productos a sus clientes, es por esto que Guillermo busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar materiales de concreto para construir su tienda en concreto y así poder aumentar la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.
Guillermo espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y pueda sacarlo adelante. Además, espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y pueda cumplir su sueño de ofrecerle a sus 3 hijos una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Guillermo is married and has three children, whom he has always wanted to give a good education.  For this reason he works hard in his business so he can generate enough income to give them a good quality of life in his home.

A long time ago, Guillermo and his wife started selling cheese "arepas" [corn cakes] and "empanadas" [small pies].  The business expanded and now it is a store where he sells candy, snacks, and soda, among other products, and which is currently his source of income to support the household expenses.  Thanks to the good location of his business he has managed to attract a large number of customers, which has allowed him to have very good sales.  Nevertheless, the disadvantage is that his business is in a stall in which he has no more room to offer more products to his customers.

This is why Guillermo is looking for a loan that will give him the opportunity to buy concrete materials to build his store in concrete and be able to increase the number of products he sells to his customers.

Guillermo hopes that his business will continue to grow and he can keep it going.  He also hopes that with greater income his family can enjoy a better quality of life and he can realize his dream of giving his three children a good education.

loans.use: to buy concrete materials to build his store and expand the products he sells.

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en:
Kholoud is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet, so the photo is of her husband.

Kholoud is a 25-year-old married woman. She is the mother of 1 child and lives in Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan.

Kholoud is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD so she can buy more quantities of mobile recharge cards so her income will be increased.

Kholoud is under 30 years old so her loan is consider as a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone recharge cards for trading purposes

loans.name: Haya'a

texts.en:
Haya'a is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet, so the photo is of her husband.

Haya'a is a 35-year-old married woman. She lives in Sahab, Jordan.

Haya'a is looking to have a loan of 300 JOD so she can cover her high education costs.

loans.use: to pay for her education costs

loans.name: Tofaha

texts.en:
Tofaha is a 39-year-old married woman.  She is a mother of 5 children and she lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Tofaha is seeking a loan of 600 JOD to expand her project in cosmetics and perfume sales.  She will buy more quantities of those products so her income will increase and she can open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to buy more perfumes and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Areej

texts.en:
Areej is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet, so the photo is of her father.

Areej is a 45-year-old married woman. She is the mother of 3 children and lives in Irbid, Jordan.

Areej is looking to have a loan of 800 JOD so she can buy more quantities of clothes to increase her income by selling them.

loans.use: to buy more quantities of clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Hoodi

texts.en:
Hoodi is a 38-year-old married woman.  She is a mother of 6 children and she lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Hoodi is seeking a loan of 300 JOD so that she can repair and fix her home to raise her family's social level.

loans.use: to fix her home

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 37 years old and is from Sana`a, Yemen. He’s married and has two children. He has been operating his bookshop for two years, after he decided to become independent and looked for a way to earn income for his family. This is his first business. He does not have help from anyone else; he runs his business by himself. He also has other income that he generates by himself by running a call center. His plan is to expand his business.

He’s asking for a loan of 100,000 YER to buy books, paper, and other bookshop items. He feels this loan will help him to increase sales as well as his income.

loans.use: to buy books, paper, and other bookshop items for his business.

loans.name: Lama

texts.en:
Lama is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet; the photo is of her brother.

Lama is a 31-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 3 children. She lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan. Lama is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so she can expand her project in shoes sales. She will buy more quantities of shoes. She wants to open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes for sales

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is 49 years old and a housewife. Her husband is a public  employee.

Amal started her small business in trading to support the family to meet their increased financial needs. She sells clothes, blankets, and sometimes electronics at home, depending on what she gets at a good price when going to the wholesale market.

Now Amal has applied for this loan in order to buy more goods and start working on separating her business from home.

loans.use: to buy more clothing and other inventory

loans.name: Nabeela

texts.en: Nabeela is a 53-year-old married woman who has seven adult children. She lives in Aden, Yemen. She has pledged to move ahead in life and to improve her quality of life. To be able to generate the earnings she needs, she decided to make incense at home to sell to her women clients. She is always thinking about how to get more customers and for a long time has been offering them friendly service so they will buy from her again. Nabeela has requested a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB in order to expand her business by buying cooking tools for making incense, which will increase her profit. In the future, she hopes to have a cosmetics shop, in addition to this business.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying cooking tools for making incense.

loans.name: Basima

texts.en: Basima is a 41-year-old married woman. She is caring for two sons and two daughters. Basima started a small retail and trading business almost 4 years ago to help her husband support the family financially. Now she has applied for this loan in order to increase the quantity she has of clothes and blankets.

loans.use: to increase the quantity she has of clothes and blankets

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet; the photo is of her father.

Sawsan is a 30-year-old single woman. She lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan. Sawsan is looking to have a youth loan of 500 JOD so she can buy more quantities of clothes and cosmetics for sales purposes.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and cosmetics for sale

loans.name: Juan Luis

texts.es: Juan tiene 40 años de edad, es casado, y tiene 12 hijos, algunos de sus hijos se dedican al cultivo de granos básicos, son una familia luchadora, unida y sus hijos le colaboran constantemente en el sustento de la familia. Don juan tiene venta de productos de primera necesidad, es caficultor y también se dedica al aserradero de madera, desde hace tres años que inicio la pulpería, trabaja en el negocio apoyado por su esposa y la colaboración de sus hijos, la apertura del negocio es desde las 7:00 am hasta las 7:00 pm. Una de las desventajas es en los meses de julio y agosto que bajan las ventas y en consecuencia sus ingresos. El préstamo que Juan solicita lo necesita  para invertirlo en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como ser: azúcar, arroz, manteca, refrescos, jabón, sal, carnes, detergente, entre otros. El préstamo le ayudaría ya que podrá tener su pulpería bien surtida y así poderles ofrecer a sus clientes todo lo que necesiten. Sus metas es aumentar el inventario de sus productos, para tener mayores ventas y que le genere mayores ingresos. Es el primer préstamo que recibe de FAMA y espera mantener un  buen comportamiento de pago.
texts.en:
Juan, age 40, is married and has 12 children.  Some of his children devote themselves to growing basic grains.  They are a tenacious and united family.  His children continually contribute to supporting the family. 

Juan sells basic needs products, he is a coffee grower, and he also devotes himself to sawing lumber.  He started his grocery store three years ago.  He works in the business supported by his wife and with help from his children.  The business is open from 7:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  One of the disadvantages is that in the months of July and August his sales decrease and consequently his income decrease.

Juan needs the loan he is requesting to buy basic needs products like sugar, rice, lard, soft drinks, soap, salt, meat, and detergent, among others.  The loan will help him be able to have a well-stocked store.  That way he will be able to offer his customers everything that they need.

His goal is to increase his inventory of products in order to have greater sales that will generate greater income.  This is his first loan from FAMA, and he expects to maintain a good payment record.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Enas

texts.en:
Enas is a 23-year-old married woman. She lives in Al-Hashmi-Amman, Jordan.

Enas is requesting a loan of 300 Jordan Dinars (JOD) so that she can improve her home living conditions and afford maintenance for it.

Because Enas is under 30 years old, her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Abdulslam

texts.en:
Abdulslam is 49 years old, married, and has five adult children. He has lived in this community for many years. He’s a responsible, hardworking entrepreneur with a wish for personal self-improvement.

He’s asking for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB for home improvements because that’s his dream and his goal that he’s set for himself. He thanks AMB for providing a loan to buy materials like metal sheeting, cement, lime powder, paint, and lumber, among other things.

loans.use: to buy materials like metal sheeting, cement, lime powder, paint, and lumber, among other things, for his business.

loans.name: Ala'a

texts.en:
Ala'a is a 22-year-old single woman. She lives in Al Khaledieh, AL Mafraq, Jordan.

Ala'a is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so she can buy more quantities of cosmetics and clothes for sales purposes to increase her income and to be able to rent a store in the future.

Ala'a is under 30 years old, so her loan is youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more quantities of cosmetics and clothes

loans.name: Rawiah

texts.en:
Rawiah is a 26-year-old married woman. She lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Rawiah is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so she can improve her home living conditions and do maintenance on it to be more healthy.

Rawiah is under 30 years old so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 50-year-old married man. He is a father of 4 children. He lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan. Mohammed is looking to have a loan of 800 JOD so he can tile his home and improve its living conditions. Mohammed is thinking of building a new floor in the future.

loans.use: to improve his home living conditions and tile his house

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 40-year-old married woman. She is the mother of 3 children and lives in Nao'or, Jordan.

Salam is looking to have a loan of 1,500 JOD so she can expand her work in making and designing home decorations. She want to open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to improve her project in decoration and design

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis Fernando siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador, y esta cualidad le ha permitido superar grandes dificultades que le ha presentado la vida y así poder seguir progresando junto a su familia. Se encuentra casado y tiene un hijo de 2 años de quien manifiesta es su mayor motivación para trabajar fuertemente todos los días en la pesca, actividad que aprendió de su familia, pues su padre y sus hermanos mayores se han dedicado a esta actividad por un largo tiempo y desde muy temprana edad se la enseñaron, por lo que cuenta con una gran experiencia lo que le permite diferenciarse de su competencia. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Luis Fernando tiene un gran reconocimiento y esto le ha permitido que sus pedidos vengan aumentando considerablemente, y es por esto que ahora pide que un préstamo le permita comprar un mejor equipo de pesca, pues con el equipo que cuenta actualmente es insuficiente para poder satisfacer toda la demanda de sus productos. 
De esta manera podrá ser más eficiente en su trabajo diario y así podrá satisfacer los grandes pedidos que le hacen sus clientes. Además, podrá poco a poco ir cumpliendo su sueño de brindarles a su esposa y su hijo de 2 años una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Luis Fernando has always been noted for being very hardworking and this quality has allowed him to overcome great difficulties that have come up in his life and continue to make progress with his family.

He’s married and has a 2-year-old son who he says is his greatest motivator to work hard fishing every day, an activity he learned from his family since his father and his older brothers have been in this occupation for a long time and taught it to him at a very young age which is why he has quite a bit of experience that sets him apart from the competition.

Thanks to the good quality of his products, Luis Fernando is very well-known which has led to his orders increasing considerably and this is why he’s now asking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy better fishing equipment because what he has now is insufficient to be able to meet all the demand for his products.

In this way he will be able to be more efficient in his daily work and be able to fill the large orders his customers place.  In addition, he will be able to gradually reach his dream of providing his wife and two-year-old son with a good quality of life and better economic opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy better fishing equipment.

loans.name: Osan

texts.en: Osan is 24 years old, married, and has one child. He and his family live in Sana`a, Yemen. He started his business by buying a small photocopier, and then he bought many copiers for his store. He has a lot of time to dedicate to his business, and many people prefer his business because he is honest and hard-working. Osan has many ideas for his business that he’s been implementing little by little. He’s been able to keep his business active for many years. Lately, he has been thinking about stocking his store with a larger variety of products to attract more customers and fill demand. This idea was the impetus for requesting a youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB to buy a variety of products like document paper, books and other articles that would bring in customers. He hopes to have a big stationery shop, thus improving his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products like document paper, books and other articles for his business.

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Nisreen, 33 years old and a conservative woman, asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Nisreen is a housewife caring for three daughters. Her husband owns a cafeteria and he turned a small section of it into an internet café, as shown in the photo, to serve  university students.

Now Nisreen want to support her husband in his business and buy new technical equipment and programs  to upgrade the systems they have in the internet café.

loans.use: to buy new technical equipment and programs

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis Enrique se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos, y para generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar para sostener los gastos, trabaja en una finca haciendo las labores de mantenimiento de esta. Gracias a que el dueño de la finca le ha brindado la oportunidad de criar unos peces en unos estanques que hay en la finca, Luis Enrique busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de comprar peces y cuido para iniciar así su negocio de venta de pescado.
De esta manera podrá generar ingresos alternos a su trabajo, lo que le permitirá brindar en su hogar a su esposa y sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Además, espera que con mayores ingresos tengan la posibilidad de superar grandes adversidades que le ha presentado en la vida y que por pocas oportunidades económicas no ha logrado afrontar. Luis Enrique sueña con que su familia salga adelante y con que en un futuro pueda dejar a sus hijos una buena estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Luis Enrique’s married and has two children.  To generate income needed to cover household expenses he works in a farm doing maintenance.  Thanks to the farm owner’s having given him the opportunity to raise fish in some ponds in the farm, Luis Enrique is looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy fish and fish food to start his business of selling fish.

In this way he will earn income in addition to his salary which will allow him to provide in his home for his wife and his two children a better quality of life and better economic opportunities for progress.  In addition, he hopes that with higher income they will be able to overcome the great adversities that life presents and that he’s been unable to overcome because of limited economic opportunities.  Luis Enrique dreams with his family getting ahead and with being able in future to provide his children with good economic stability.

loans.use: to buy fish and fish food.

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Reem, 37 years old and a conservative lady, asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

After Reem's husband retired from the military, he had to look for a job to be able to support their family of five sons and two daughters. That’s why Reem thought that she has to help, too, beside caring for her children. So she opened a small food market in the area to help in improving their living conditions.

She has applied for this loan in order to buy more food products and more grocery products for the store.

loans.use: to buy more food products and more grocery products for the store

loans.name: Kota Wende Group

texts.fr:
Mr MAHAMOUDOU est le représentant du groupe KOTA WENDE. Il est célibataire sans enfant. Il a une (01)  personne en charge.

Il est transporteur de zinc depuis trois (03) ans. Il s’approvisionne à larlé. Ses clients sont essentiellement les orpailleurs.

Il veut s’acheter mille (1000) kg de zinc.

Il veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité. Il ambitionne ouvrir un atelier pour son activité.
texts.en:
Mr. Mahamoudou is the representative of the Kota Wende group. He is single without children. He has one dependent.

He has been transporting zinc for three years. He stocks up in Larlé. His customers are primarily gold  miners.
He would like to buy 1000 kg [2204 lbs] of zinc. He would like to use his revenues to strengthen his business. His goal is to open a shop for his business.

loans.use: to buy 1000 kg of zinc.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar, 50 years old and a married man, is the father of five children.

Omar opened a small store to sell different kinds of food products. Being a friendly man has helped him to obtain a lot of loyal customers.  Now he has applied for this loan in order to buy a juice-making machine. And then buy a freezer to bring in frozen products.

loans.use: to buy a juice maker.

loans.name: Begmurad

texts.ru: Бегмурод живет в Дж. Расуловском районе и занимается откармливанием крупно рогатого и мелкого рогатого скота. Ему 53 года, женат, имеет троих детей. Более 30 лет клиент занимается откармливанием скота. Он покупает скотов с Дж. Расуловского рынка, откармливает и продает их на том же рынке дороже. Жена нигде не работает,она занимается хозяйством и детьми но и помогает своему мужу. Он хочет купить на полученный кредит мелкого рогатого скота, чтобы расширить свой бизнес и улучшить свои условия проживания.
texts.en:
Begmurad lives in the J. Rasulov region and is engaged in fattening cattle, sheep and goats. He is 53 years old, married, and has three children. He has been working with fattening livestock for more than 30 years. He buys livestock at the livestock market in the J. Rasulov region, fattens them and sells them at the same market, for a higher price. 

His wife has never worked, she is responsible for the household and children, but she helps her husband. Begmurad would like to use the loan received to buy sheep and goats to expand his business and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Santos Anibal

texts.es: Don Santos tiene 42 años de edad,  es casado, tiene 6 hijos, su esposa se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos, tres de sus hijos se dedican a la caficultura y agricultura, ellos residen en la comunidad del Plan del Rosario, Trojes. Don Santos comenzó trabajando con su padre a cultivar café, maíz y frijoles, en la actualidad el se dedica al cultivo de café, trabaja en conjunto con sus hijos, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am hasta la 1:00 pm y cuando es temporada de cosecha no tiene horario de entrada ni de salida por el excesivo trabajo que hay en la finca de café. Con la ventaja que cuenta don Santos es que el precio del café es muy bueno por lo que le deja grandes ingresos, la desventaja es en la temporada de invierno que debido a la lluvia el café se cae y esto le trae perdidas. El préstamo que don Santos solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes, abono y para limpiar la finca. El préstamo le ayudaría en mucho ya que mantendrá en buen estado su finca de café, evitando que el cultivo se enferme de plagas y así obtener una mejor cosecha. Una de sus metas es hacer crecer su negocio y tener estabilidad económica. Don Santos es cliente de FAMA desde hace varios ciclos y ha cancelado sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Santos, age 42, is married and has six children.  His wife devotes herself to the household chores.  Three of his children devote themselves to growing coffee and farming.  They live in the Plan de Roasrio community in Trojes.

Santos started working with his father growing coffee, corn, and beans.  He currently devotes himself to growing coffee.  He works together with his children.  His work schedule is from 6:00 a.m. until 1:00 p.m.  When it is harvest time he does not have a schedule for starting or ending work because of the excessive work that there is on the coffee farm.

The advantage that Santos has is the price of coffee is very good, and it produces good income.  The disadvantage is that during the winter, due to the rain, the coffee beans fall off, and this brings losses.

Santos needs the loan that he is requesting to buy chemical and natural fertilizers and to clear the fields.  The loan will help him a lot because it will keep his coffee farm in good condition.  His crops will avoid pest infestation, and that way he will have a better harvest.

One of his goals is to make his business grow and to have financial stability.  Santos has been a client of FAMA for various cycles.  He has made his payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy chemical and natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Juan David

texts.es:
Juan David es un joven de 19 años que gracias a que en la vida se ha dedicado a trabajar fuertemente y esforzarse, tiene una gran experiencia en la actividad de la carpintería, pues su padre se dedica a esta actividad y desde hace aproximadamente 5 años la aprendió y viene trabajando a su lado. Gracias a esto, Juan David ha tenido la oportunidad de destacarse por la buena calidad de sus trabajos y además de esto ha tenido la oportunidad de contribuir económicamente en su hogar para el sostenimiento de los gastos que allí se generan. Actualmente Juan David tiene una pareja y ella se encuentra en el sexto mes de embarazo, por lo que tiene una gran responsabilidad para en un futuro; responsabilidad que busca afrontar montando su propio negocio y así generando mayores ingresos. Antes, Juan David no podía montar su propio negocio porque era menor de edad y las personas no lo podían contratar directamente, pero ahora que ya cumplió su mayoría de edad viene realizando trabajos de manera independiente muy esporádicamente, pues para poderlos realizar tiene que alquilar la herramienta necesaria. Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo para poder realizar los trabajos de carpintería de manera independiente y así poco a poco ir montando su propio negocio.
Juan David espera que así sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente y pueda entonces progresar junto a su pareja y el hijo que viene en camino. Además, sueña con sacar adelante su propia familia y seguir contribuyendo en su hogar para tener una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan David, 19, is a young man who thanks to working hard and making an effort in life now has great experience in carpentry because his father is also in this occupation and he’s been working and learning by his side for about five years.  Thanks to this, Juan David has had the opportunity to stand out because of the good quality of his work and this has given him the opportunity to contribute economically to his home helping to cover costs that arise there.

Juan David currently has a partner and she’s six months pregnant so he has a great future responsibility, a responsibility he seeks to face by setting up his own business to generate higher income.  Before, Juan David was unable to set up his own business because he was a minor and people couldn’t contract him directly but now that he’s become of age he’s been doing work independently very sporadically because in order to do it he has to lease the necessary tools.  This is why he’s looking for a loan that will give him the opportunity of buying the work tools needed to do carpentry work independently to gradually set up his own business.

Juan David hopes that his income will rise considerably this way and he will then be able to make progress with his partner and his child that’s on the way.  In addition, he dreams with moving his own family forward and to continue contributing to his home so that they will have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is 61 years old and a married woman. Her husband is a driver, and they have two sons and a daughter.

Muna likes to draw a smile to kids' faces, so she decided to start selling toys at her house. Now she has applied for this loan to increase her inventory of toys. She is hoping that in the future she can open a toy store in her area.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of toys

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 22-year-old engaged man. He lives in Marka, Amman, Jordan.

Mahmoud is requesting a loan of 600 Jordan Dinars (JOD) so that he can cover his wedding expenses and buy furniture for his home.

Because Mahmoud is under 30 years old, his loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to cover his wedding expenses.

loans.name: Rima

texts.en:
Rima, 26 years old and a married woman, is caring for two daughters and one son. Her husband is serving in the military.

Rima started a retail business at home selling clothes to help in improving their living conditions.
 
Now she has applied for this loan to buy more summer clothes in hopes that she can one day open her own clothing store.

loans.use: to buy more summer clothes

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia, 57 years old and widowed, is living now with her daughter after her son got married.

Nadia started four years ago buying and selling different types of birds. She also sells clothing on the side. 

Now she has applied for this loan in order to expand her clothing sales business and bring in a summer clothing collection in addition to stocking more birds.

loans.use: to buy a summer clothes collection and also stock more birds

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Flor De Cayo Blanco Group

texts.es: Grupo Solidario Flor de Cayo Blanco está integrado por 2 socios (Omar y Luz), los cuales residen en la Aldea de Cayo Blanco y realizan diferentes actividades económicas. El coordinador del grupo es Omar Antonio A., tiene 44 años y su familia está conformada por su esposa y sus tres hijos . Omar se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos. Inició su negocio a raíz de su casamiento porque tuvo que salirse de la casa de sus padres y para poder mantener a su esposa tuvo que buscar una forma de hacerlo, así que comenzó a comprar cerdos para destazarlos y vender la carne a pulperías y carnicerías. Una de las ventajas es que es un negocio muy rentable y eso le ha permitido sostener a su familia, aunque con muchas limitaciones económicas. Una de las desventajas es que el mercado está saturado de personas que se dedican al mismo negocio y algunos para vender su producto más rápido lo hacen a un precio muy bajo con el cual no puede competir.  Con el apoyo de este préstamo espera tener las suficientes ganancias para llevar el sustento al hogar y comprar los útiles, uniformes, zapatos  que sus hijos necesitan para ir al colegio. Su compañera de grupo Luz se dedica a la venta de golosinas, es casada y tiene dos hijos.
texts.en:
The “Flor de Cayo Blanco” communal bank has two members (Omar and Iris) who live in the village of Cayo Blanco and carry out different economic activities.

The group coordinator is Omar Antonio A., 44. His family consists of his wife and his three children. Omar is a pork merchant. He started his business when he got married because he had to leave his parents’ house and had to find a way to support his wife. He started buying pigs to butcher and sell the meat to grocery stores and butcheries.

One of the advantages of the business is that it is very profitable, and this has allowed him to support his family, although with many financial limitations. One of the disadvantages is that the market is saturated with people who do the same kind of work and some of them, in order to sell their products quickly, do so at such low prices that he is unable to compete.

With the support this loan gives him he hopes to have sufficient profits to support his household and to buy school supplies, uniforms and shoes that his children need to go to school.

His fellow group member, Iris, sells snacks. She is married and has two children.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Fatmeh, 20 years old and a single lady, is a university student majoring in hospital management.

Fatmeh has nine siblings that are living with her in the same house. Having a big family is hard on the parents, and for that reason, Fatmeh decided to apply for this loan in order to pay her semester fees.

loans.use: to pay her semester fees.

loans.name: Jesus Hernan

texts.es:
Jesus aprendió desde muy temprana edad la actividad de la agricultura al lado de su padre, y gracias a esto tiene una gran experiencia en la actividad lo que le permite diferenciarse ante la competencia y así obtener unos buenos ingresos para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Tiene un cultivo de verduras bajo invernadero y busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de comprar abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas con el ánimo de sacarlo adelante.
De esta manera su cultivo saldrá adelante y así podrá satisfacer la gran demanda que tienen sus productos, pues gracias a la buena experiencia que tiene en la actividad ha logrado sacar productos de muy buena calidad. Además, Jesus sueña con en un futuro montar un restaurante, pues también le gusta esta actividad y así poder sacar su familia adelante brindándole una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jesús learned to work in agriculture at a very young age alongside his father and thanks to this has great experience in the activity which allows him to stand out from the competition and obtain good income to support his household expenses.  

He grows vegetables in a nursery and is looking for a loan that will allow him to buy manure, insecticide and fungicide to move the crops along.  In this way, his crop will move forward and he will be able to meet the high demand his products have because thanks to the good experience he has in this activity he’s managed to produce very good quality products.  

In addition, Jesús dreams with opening a restaurant in the future because he also likes this activity and be able to move his family forward this way giving them a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Miri

texts.en:
Miri is 23 years old, married, and has one child. She lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Miri is requesting a loan for 400 JOD, which she will use to buy more quantities of sanitary towels and cleaning materials for trading purposes. In the future, she wants to open her own store.

Miri is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy sanitary towels and cleaning materials.

loans.name: Shorouq

texts.en:
Shorouq, 23 years old and a conservative woman, asked her brother to take her place in the photo. Shorouq is a married woman caring for two boys. Her husband works in a furniture store. 

In order to help her husband improve their living conditions, while their sons are still young, Shorouq started to sell different kinds of birds at her house, with  cages and accessories. 

Now she has applied for this youth loan to bring in more birdfood and more birds to increase her revenue.

loans.use: to bring in more bird food and more birds

loans.name: Saddam

texts.en:
Saddam, 22 years old and a single guy, has two brothers and two sisters. They live in a rented house.

Saddam is a university student majoring in business administration. He hopes after graduation to continue and get a Master's degree. Now Saddam has applied for this loan in order to pay his semester fees.

loans.use: to pay his semester fees.

loans.name: Sana'a

texts.en:
Sana'a is 43 years old, married, and has five children. She lives in Al Karak, Jordan.

Sana'a is requesting a loan for 400 JOD, which she will use to improve her home living conditions.  In the future, she want to increase her home's space.

Sana'a is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the Internet. This photo is her husband.

loans.use: to improve his home living conditions.

loans.name: Timoteo

texts.es: Don Timoteo tiene 57 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y en temporada de cosecha le ayuda a la corta de café, el y su familia residen en la comunidad del Diamante, Campamento. Don Timoteo se dedica al cultivo de café, el cual es su único patrimonio, desde hace diez años compro la finca fue aprendiendo por medio de un amigo que le asesoraba como realizar el trabajo, su horario laboral en tiempo de corte de café comienza desde las 5:00 am y termina a las 6:00 pm, trabaja con el apoyo de su esposa, sus hijos y algunos empleados. Una de las desventajas es que no cuenta con una secadora de café y esto hace que el trabajo se le dificulte. El préstamo que don Timoteo solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de abono, planta de café y pagar empleados para limpiar la finca. Con la ayuda de este préstamo tendrá ingresos que le ayuden para el sustento de su familia y su finca la tendrá limpia y obtendrá una mejor cosecha con el tratamiento y el abono que le aplicara a la finca de café. Su sueño es tener una cosecha abundante de café y poder ser el mayor productor de la zona. Es su segundo crédito obtenido en FAMA y espera seguir cancelando sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Timoteo, 57, is married and has four children.  His wife does household chores and during harvest season helps with the coffee harvesting.  He and his family live in the community of Diamante, Campamento.  

Timoteo is a coffee grower which is his only asset.  Ten years ago he bought a farm and learned from a friend who would guide him how to do the work.  His work schedule during harvest time is from 5am until 6pm.  He works with help from his wife, his children and some employees.  One of his disadvantages is that he does now own a coffee dryer which makes his work more difficult.

The loan Timoteo requests is needed to buy manure, coffee plants and to pay the employees to clear the farm.  With help from this loan he’ll have income that will help him support his family and his farm will be cleared and he’ll obtain a better harvest with the treatment and manure he’ll apply to the coffee farm.

His dream is to have an abundant coffee harvest to become the best producer in the area.  This is his second loan from FAMA and he expects to continue to make his installment payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants, manure and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Don Julio tiene 65 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos, su esposa se encarga de los oficios domésticos, son una familia responsable y luchadora. El se dedica al cultivo de café desde hace diez años y es con la fuente de ingreso que ha podido sacar adelante a su familia, comenzó el negocio por su propia iniciativa, trabaja con ayuda de sus hijos y salen al campo desde las 5: am y regresan hasta las 2:00 pm, en temporada de cosecha no tienen horario ya que el trabajo es abundante y necesitan aprovechar el tiempo al máximo. Una de las ventajas de don Julio es que el café se lo pagan a un buen precio, la desventaja es que en temporada de cosecha casi no encuentra mano de obra para la recolección de café, ya que los demás productores buscan empleadores y la mano de obra se vuelve escasa. El préstamo que don Julio solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de abono y una despulpadora de café, siendo que necesita maquinaria para trabajar en la finca de café y poder tener mayor producción. Una de sus metas es tener su propia secadora de café para poder tener mayor producción y vender a un mejor precio. Este es el primer financiamiento que obtiene en FAMA y espera cancelar puntualmente sus cuotas de pago.
texts.en:
Julio, age 65, is married and has three children.  His wife takes charge of the household chores.  They are a responsible and tenacious family.

He has been growing coffee for ten years.  It is the source of income with which he has been able to get his family ahead.  He started the business on his own initiative.  He works with help from his children.  They leave for the fields at 5:00 a.m. and they return at 2:00 p.m.  During harvest time they do not have a schedule because there is so much work that they need to take maximum advantage of the time.

One of the advantages that Julio has is that coffee sells for a good price.  The disadvantage is that during harvest time you can hardly find laborers to gather the coffee.  This is because there are so many producers looking for laborers that labor becomes scarce.

Julio needs the requested loan to buy manure and a coffee pulper.  He needs the machine to work on the coffee farm and to be able to have greater production.

One of his goals is to have his own coffee dryer in order to be able to have greater production and sell for a better price.  This is his first loan with FAMA, and he expects to make his payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy manure, a coffee pulper, and a coffee dryer.

loans.name: Las Llaves Del Exito Group

texts.es: Delmis tiene 37 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Las Llaves del Éxito, tiene 4 hijos, su esposo se dedica a la carpintería, ellos residen en la comunidad de las Llaves, Municipio de Juticalpa, Olancho. Delmis se dedica a la costura, ella aprendió en una academia de confección de ropa y luego decidió comprar una maquina para confeccionar trajes de diferentes estilos, desde hace siete años tiene su propio negocio de costura y su horario de atención es desde las 8:00 am hasta las 6:00 pm, cuando es en temporada navideña, escolar y de independencia no tiene horario ya que  el trabajo es abundante y no se  da abasto. La ventaja es que tiene buena clientela y la desventaja es que da al crédito y en algunas ocasiones no le pagan. El préstamo que Delmis solicita lo invertirá en la compra de telas, entretelas, adornos, elásticos, hilos, botones, zippers, etc. Con la ayuda de este préstamo podrá ofrecer a sus clientes y clientas mayor variedad de telas y con esto espera que sus ingresos mejoren para poder ayudar a sus hijos a cubrir los gastos estudiantiles. Su meta es poder tener un taller de costura mas amplio y que este le pueda generar mayores ganancias. Delmis es clienta de FAMA desde hace diez años y ha cancelado sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Delmis, 37, is a member of the “Las Llaves del Éxito” (The Keys to Success) communal bank.  She has four children and her husband’s a carpenter.  They live in the community of Llaves in the municipality of Juticalpa, Olancho.

Delmis is a seamstress.  She learned in a dressmaking academy and then decided to buy a machine to make outfits in various styles.  She’s had her own sewing business for the last seven years and she works from 8am until 6pm.  During the Christmas season, the start of the school year and during Independence she does not stick to a set schedule because work is abundant and she can barely keep up with it.

Her advantage is that she has a good clientele and her disadvantage is that she sells on credit and sometimes she’s not paid.  The loan Delmis is asking for will be used to buy fabric, lining, decorations, elastic, thread, buttons, zippers, etc.

With help from this loan she will be able to offer her customers a greater variety of fabric and with this she hopes her income will improve to be able to help cover her children’s schooling costs.  Her goal is to be able to have a larger workshop that will generate higher profits.  Delmis has been a FAMA client for ten years and has made her installment payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Tani

texts.fr:
Tani est une femme âgé(e) de 39 ans. Elle est mariée å un  mécanicien. Elle a 01 enfant âgé de 02ans.
Tani travaille comme revendeuse de maïs depuis 2008. Elle exerce seule l’activité à domicile et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Elle est à son second crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des sacs de maïs pour revendre à ses clients.
Dans les prochaines années, Tani voudrait agrandir l’activité et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Tani is 39 years old and married to a mechanic. She has one child, two years old. 
 
Tani has been working at selling maize since 2008. She runs her business alone from home and buys her stock in Lomé. She is on her second loan from WAGES and is requesting this loan to buy sacks of maize to resell to her customers. 

In the coming years, Tani would like to expand her business and ensure the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy maize.

loans.name: Gustavo De Jesus

texts.es:
Gustavo se encuentra casado, tiene 3 hijos y con la finalidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar tiene un cultivo de frutas el cual trabaja fuertemente todos los días y su esposa le colabora en algunos momentos. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenos pedidos y así cada vez ir creciendo poco a poco. La mayor dificultad que ha tenido es el fuerte invierno que ha venido trascurriendo desde hace ya varios meses, sin embargo, con mucha dedicación ha venido sacando su cultivo de frutas adelante pese a las adversidades. Debido a un gran pedido que tiene por parte de uno de sus clientes, busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de comprar abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para sacar adelante su cultivo y así poder tener los productos que requiere para satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes.
De esta manera podrá generar los ingresos para su hogar y seguir creciendo poco a poco en su negocio. Además, Gustavo sueña con tener un gran cultivo donde pueda generar empleo y desde el cual pueda ofrecer a sus hijos una buena estabilidad económica que les permita progresar.
texts.en:
Gustavo’s married and has three children.  In order to generate income needed to support his home he grows fruit.  He works hard every day and his wife helps him occasionally.  Thanks to the good quality of his products he’s managed to win over a large number of customers which has led to a good number of orders that have led to his growing more every time.  His greatest difficulty is the severe winter that’s been in place for several months now.  However, with much dedication he’s been moving his fruit crops forward despite these adversities.

Due to a large order he has from one of his customers, he’s looking for a loan to buy manure, insecticide and fungicide to move his crops forward and have the products he needs to meet customer demand.  In this way he will be able to generate household income and continue to gradually grow his business.  In addition, Gustavo dreams with having a large plantation that will generate employment and from which he can offer his children good economic stability that will allow them to make progress.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 37-year-old married woman and is a mother of 4 children. She lives in Al-Hashmi-Amman, Jordan.

Amal is requesting a loan of 400 Jordan Dinars (JOD) so that she can buy more clothes and print logos on them for trading purposes. With this loan, her financial level will be improved.

loans.use: to buy clothes and print logos on them for trading purposes.

loans.name: Yuri Milena

texts.es:
Yuri es una joven emprendedora que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en la vida, para lo cual el apoyo de su familia ha sido fundamental para poder seguir progresando en su vida. Yuri es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 3 hijos de 12, 10 años y 3 meses de nacido, pues el padre de sus hijos los abandonó hace un largo tiempo haciendo que quedara a cargo de todas las obligaciones del hogar; es con el ánimo de generar ingresos para el sostenimiento del hogar que desde hace aproximadamente 6 años, aprovechando la experiencia que tenía trabajando en un restaurante, que decidió montar su propia cafetería en la cual ofrece una muy buena atención a sus clientes, y gracias a la gran clientela que tiene, una hermana suya le colabora trabajando para poder ofrecer un buen servicio en la cafetería. Gracias a este negocio ha logrado generar los ingresos suficientes para poder brindarles a sus 3 hijos una buena calidad de vida y una educación de buena calidad, es por esto que persevera tanto para que el negocio siga creciendo y así seguirles ofreciendo a sus hijos tan buenas oportunidades. Debido a que en su negocio no cuenta con un gran capital, Yuri busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar un refrigerador para la cafetería y comprar surtido para ofrecerles a sus clientes una mejor variedad de productos.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá ofreciendo siempre un buen servicio y sus clientes irán aumentando poco a poco, permitiendo que sus ingresos aumenten y así cumplir su sueño de tener un gran negocio y de sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos brindándoles una buena educación y una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yuri is a young entreprenuer who has had to overcome great adversities in her life.  Therefore, her family’s support has been essential in order to her to continue making progress in her life.

Yuri is a single mother and head of the family of three children, ages 12, 10, and 3 months.  The father of her children abandoned them a long time ago, which left her in charge of all of the household obligations.

With the motive of generating income to support the household, she took advantage of the experience she had working in a restaurant.  Approximately six years ago she decided to establish her own cafeteria, where she provides very good service to her customers.  Thanks to the great clientele that she has, a sister of hers helps her work in order to be able to provide good service in the cafeteria.

Thanks to this business she has managed to generate sufficient income to be able to give her three children a better quality of life and a good quality education.  She is so perseverant so that the business continues growing.  This way she continues to provide her children with good opportunities.

Because the business does not have a lot of capital, Yuri is looking for a loan to buy a refrigerator for the cafeteria.  She will also buy stock to provide her customers with a greater variety of products.

This way her business will continue to always provide good service, and, little by little, she will get more customers.  This will allow her income to increase, and she will fulfill her dream of having a great business and of getting her three children ahead.  She will be providing them with a good education and a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for the cafeteria and to buy stock to provide her customers with a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Yendoutien

texts.fr:
Yendoutien est une femme âgé(e) de 40ans. Elle est mariée å un  chauffeur. Elle a 03 enfants, tous à l’école. Le premier a 21ans et le dernier 14ans.
Yendoutien travaille comme revendeuse de pagnes  depuis 2003. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et vend à domicile à ses clients et est aidé par 01 personne.
Yendoutien a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes. Elle veut agrandir l’activité, diversifier la marchandise et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Yendoutien, aged 40, is married to a chauffeur. She has three children, all enrolled at school. The oldest is 21 and the youngest is 14.  

Yendoutien has been working selling lengths of African print cloth since 2003. She buys her inventory in Lomé and sells her goods out of her home to her customers. She is aided by one person. 

Yendoutie has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy lengths of African print cloth. She wants to expand her business, diversify her merchandise, and ensure the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy lengths of African print cloth.

loans.name: Al-Zhra Group

texts.en:
Al-Zhra is a group that is composed of three women: Mnal, Samiah, and Amal. They are from Aden, Yemen and work together to help one another. They are hard-working, enterprising women who do not give up easily. Currently they are requesting a loan of 150,000 Yemen Rials (YER) from AMB in order to increase their business levels.

Mnal is the leader of the group (in the photo, she is the woman who is seated in the middle). She is 35 years old and a married woman. She has been selling incenses and perfumes to customers for 3 years, which has enabled her to develop a significant customer base. Her business has helped her to provide for her family.

She is turning to AMB to request a loan of 50,000 YER because she has orders and would like to be able to fill them for her customers. She would like to buy incenses and perfumes, which will increase her profit to offer a good quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy incenses and perfumes for her business.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr:
Mariama est une femme âgé(e) de 43 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 03 enfants tous à l’école. Le premier a 21 ans et le dernier a 15 ans.  
Mariama travaille comme revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale depuis 2002. Elle exerce l’activité avec 01personne au marché et s’approvisionne à Lomé.
Mariama a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale.  Elle veut agrandir l’activité, diversifier les produits et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Mariama, aged 43, is married to a chauffeur. She has three children, all in school. The oldest is 21 and the youngest is 15. 

Mariama has been working at selling groceries since 2002. She runs her business in the market with one other person  and she restocks her merchandise in Lomé.

Mariama has requested her first loan from WAGES so as to buy grocery items. She wants to expand her business, diversify her inventory, and ensure the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba es una persona muy trabajadora que ha venido luchando fuertemente desde hace mucho tiempo para sacar su familia adelante. Anteriormente tenía una venta de comidas en el centro de la ciudad, pero debido a circunstancias adversas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de trasladar el negocio para su casa y ahora desde allí ofrece su servicio de comidas a todas las personas del sector. Gracias a que ofrece muy buen servicio, y a que sus comidas son de muy buena calidad, Rosalba ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes que le han permitido tener muy buenas ventas, y es por esto que ahora que con las herramientas que cocina no tiene suficiente capacidad para atender a todos sus clientes, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una fritadora e insumos que requiere para la preparación de sus comidas, y así poder responder a la gran demanda que tiene por sus productos.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante y así seguirá generando los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar; además de que podrá ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a las personas en su hogar y seguir progresando a pesar de las fuertes adversidades que se ha encontrado en su vida. Hace un tiempo, la violencia le arrebató a dos de sus hijos, por lo que desde entonces viene buscando que su negocio le brinde las posibilidades económicas para buscar mejores condiciones de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en: Rosalba is a very hard-working person who has fought hard for a long time in order to get her family ahead in life.  She used to sell meals in the city center but, owing to circumstances beyond her control, she had to move her business into her home.  This is where she now offers her food service to people in her area.  Thanks to the fact that she offers very good customer service and her meals are very good quality, Rosalba has managed to attract a large number of customers.  As a result, she enjoys very good sales.  However, the tools that she uses in her cooking are no longer up to the job of serving all her customers.  She is looking for a loan so that she can buy a deep fat fryer and supplies that she needs for making her meals in order to meet the high level of demand that she has for her products.  This will enable her to keep making progress in her business and she will be able to make the income she needs to support her household.  She will also be able to provide the members of her household with a better quality of life and continue making progress, in spite of the difficulties that she has encountered in her life.  Some time ago, violence snatched two of her children from her.  Since that time, she has been working hard so that her business provides her with the money she needs to improve her own living conditions as well as those of her family.

loans.use: to buy a deep fat fryer and supplies that she needs to make her meals so that she can meet a high level of demand

loans.name: Al-Fairoz Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Fairoz and consists of four members: Fairoz, Samah, Arwa, and Shroq. They live in Aden, Yemen. All of them are responsible and honored to get better life for their family. They requested a loan of 220,000 Yemen Rials (YER).

Fairoz is 30 years old (in the photo, she is the woman who wears a handbag on her shoulder), and is married with five children. All of her children still attend school and are supported by their parents. She lives in Aden, Yemen. She works untiringly to provide sustenance for her family.

Fairoz's business is Henna, which she uses to work for ladies for their weddings. She would like to improve her business and stock more merchandise to sell and be able to increase her earnings. She is now borrowing a youth loan of 70,000 YER from AMB to buy mobile recharging cards to sell to her customers. She hopes to expand her business to open phone accessories to get more profit.

loans.use: to buy mobile recharging cards to sell to her customers for her business.

loans.name: Fabio De Jesus

texts.es:
Fabio se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de 2 años y 7 meses de nacido, y para generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar presta el servicio de mototaxi, actividad que le permite tener buenos ingresos para su familia. Sin embargo, Fabio ha tenido que pasar por grandes adversidades económicas en los últimos tiempos, por lo que hace un tiempo se vio en la obligación de vender su moto, por lo que estuvo un tiempo rebuscando sus ingresos en diferentes actividades que no le generaban los ingresos suficientes para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Es por esto que ahora que logró ahorrar una parte del capital que cuesta la moto, busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de completar el dinero que le hace falta para comprar de nuevo una moto con la cual vuelva a ofrecer el servicio de transporte.
De esta manera logrará genera de nuevo los ingresos que requiere su familia y así seguir superando las adversidades que le presenta la vida. Fabio sueña con tener un buen negocio con el que pueda brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y con el que en un futuro pueda ofrecer a sus 2 hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Fabio’s married and has two children; one is two-years-old and the other is 7-months-old.  To generate needed household income, he works providing mototaxi service, an activity that allows him to have good income for his family.   However, Fabio has undergone severe economic adversities lately which forced him to sell his mototaxi some time ago.  He spent time looking to earn income in other activities but they did not generate sufficient income to cover household costs.  

This is why now that he’s managed to save up part of  the capital needed to buy a mototaxi he’s looking for a loan to cover the difference he still needs to buy a new mototaxi to start providing this transportation service once more. In this way he will once again generate the income his family needs and continue to overcome the adversities that life presents.  Fabio dreams with having a good business with which he can provide his family with a better quality of life and in future be able to provide his two children with a good education.

loans.use: to make up the total amount he needs to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Taher Group

texts.en:
This group called Taher consists of three members: Maisa, Entsar, and Laila.  They live in Aden, Yemen. They are requesting a loan for 190,000 YER.
 
Maisa is 41 years old, married, and has one child (she is in the center of the photo). She plans to work very hard in order to provide a better life for her family. She makes a living selling women's fabrics, which she has been doing for three years. Many people prefer to buy her goods because she is hard-working, positive, responsible, and honorable. She has always kept her business well-stocked, which has allowed her many customers to visit and request products. 

Given that many people make requests, and each one is for a new style, Maisa is requesting a loan for 70,000 YER from AMB, which she will use to purchase a variety of new styles of fabrics, blouses, and skirts to stock her business. She hopes tol increase her income, which will in turn improve her and her child's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of new styles of fabrics, blouses, and skirts.

loans.name: Hernan De Jesus

texts.es:
Hernan es una persona muy trabajadora que se esfuerza diariamente junto con su esposa para poder generar los ingresos que requiere para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Hernan se dedica a la venta de mazamorra, que es una comida típica de Colombia, y la cual en su municipio tiene muy buena acogida, por lo que diariamente prepara y distribuye para sí generar sus ingresos. Dado que esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde hace un tiempo, y no cuentan con mucho capital, Hernan busca que un préstamo le permita comprar insumos como una freidora, un molino, un cilindro de gas, entre otros utensilios de cocina que requiere para preparar con mayor productividad la mazamorra.
De esta manera podrá preparar diariamente lo que sus clientes le demandan, pues actualmente por la falta de una buena productividad pierde una gran cantidad de clientes que demandan su producto. Además, de esta manera podrá generar mayores ingresos con los cuales puedan superar las difíciles condiciones económicas, y así brindarle a su esposa y a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en: Hernan is a very hard-working person who works hard every day alongside his wife in order to make the income they need to cover their household expenses.  Hernan's business is selling 'mazamorra', a traditional Colombian dish that is very popular in their town.  Every day he prepares and sells 'mazamorra' in order to make income.  As he has been in this business for some time and doesn't have much capital, Hernan is looking for a loan that will allow him to buy a deep fat fryer, a grinder, a gas cylinder and other cooking utensils that he needs to prepare his 'mazamorra'.  This will enable him to prepare what his customers are requesting every day.  Currently, as his productivity is not good enough, he loses a large number of customers who would like to buy his product.  This loan will enable him to make more income which he can use to overcome his difficult economic situation and provide his wife and son with a better quality of life and better opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy a deep fat fryer, a grinder, a gas cylinder and other cooking utensils that he needs for preparing 'mazamorra'

loans.name: Milena Patricia

texts.es:
Milena es una persona muy trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante junto con su esposo y su hijo de 3 años de edad. Tiene experiencia de aproximadamente 13 años en la venta en almacenes, lo cual ha hecho que adquiera una gran experiencia y así también pueda conocer los proveedores y clientes para su negocio, el cual abrió hace un tiempo y por falta de capital no tiene un gran surtido. Con su negocio, ha logrado generar ingresos con los cuales puede contribuir económicamente al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, lo que le ha permitido tener en su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Con el ánimo de poder sacar su negocio adelante y aspirando a que en un futuro este sea el que impulse su progreso económico, Milena busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos como bolsos, accesorios para dama, prendas de vestir, ropa interior, entre otros, para surtir su almacén y así poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.
De esta manera podrá surtir su almacén sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectados, además, podrá tener unos mejores ingresos y así ofrecer en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida. Milena sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo y así mejorarles la condición de vida a personas diferentes a su familia.
texts.en:
Milena is a hardworking person who, with a lot of effort, has managed to get ahead with her husband and their 3 year-old son.  She has been working in stores for about 13 years, which has given her a great deal of experience, and also has enabled her to get to know the suppliers and customers in her line of work.  She opened up her business a while ago, but due to a lack of capital, it is not well-stocked.  With her business, she has managed to generate income to contribute financially to the household expenses.  This has allowed her family to have a better quality of life and better economic opportunities.
