Wanting to make progress with her business, and aspiring to have this business create economic progress for her, Milena is seeking a loan that will allow her to purchase products such as: purses, women's accessories, garments, underwear and other items, so that she can stock up her store and offer her customers a greater variety of products.  In this way, she will be able to stock up her store without affecting her monthly income.  Furthermore, she will have a better income, and so will be able to offer her household a better quality of life.  Milena dreams of having a big business where she could generate jobs, and in this way improve living conditions for people outside of her family.

loans.use: to buy purses, women's accessories, garments, underwear, and other items to stock up her store

loans.name: Hermegildo

texts.es: Hermegildo tiene 40 años de edad, es casado y tiene  8 hijos, su esposa es ama de casa y le ayuda constantemente en el negocio, y en menor escala también tiene cría de pollos y gallinas. EL carácter de don Hermegildo es de semblante serio sin embargo es un hombre social y muy educado, es trabajador, emprendedor, responsable y de reconocida honestidad en la comunidad. El inicio con el negocio de producción de café y granos básicos desde hace 13 años y desde hace 3 años comenzó con una pulpería, aprendió del negocio a prueba y error, le costo ya que no tenia mucho capital ni la experiencia para realizarlo, trabaja en la pulpería apoyado por su esposa y la colaboración de sus hijas, apertura el negocio a las 6:00 a.m y cierra a las 7:00 p.m. La ventaja de don Hermegildo es que el negocio le produce utilidades para el sostén familiar y pagar los compromisos, aparte que me permite educar y brindar salud cuando lo requiere toda la familia, además de poder servir a los vecinos vendiéndoles productos de primera necesidad. El préstamo que solicita lo necesita para la compra de fertilizantes, limpiar el café y fumigación de la finca. Con la ayuda de este préstamo le facilitara el poder contar con recursos a bajos costos y hacer la inversión oportuna. Sus metas es avanzar en el aumento del inventario y hacer más grande el espacio físico de la pulpería y de la finca de café. Ha recibido 4 créditos en FAMA y los ha cancelado puntualmente.
texts.en:
Hermegildo, 40, is married and has eight children.  His wife is a housewife and constantly helps him in his business and, to a lesser degree, also raises chickens and hens.  Hermegildo has a serious countenance but is a social and very polite man.  He is hardworking, enterprising, and responsible, and he is recognized in the community for his honesty.

He started with the business of growing coffee and basic grains 13 years ago, and three years ago he started his general store.  He learned about the business through trial and error.  It was difficult for him because he didn't have a lot of capital or the experience to do it.  His wife and daughters help him in the store, opening the business at 6:00 a.m. and closing at 7:00 p.m.  Hermegildo's advantage is that the business produces profits to support his family and pay for his commitments.  It also allows him to raise his whole family and give them good health when they need it, as well as serve his neighbors by selling them convenience items.

He needs the loan he is requesting to buy fertilizer, weed the coffee, and fumigate the farm.  The help of this loan will enable him to have low-cost resources and make an opportune investment.

His goals are to increase his inventory and enlarge the size of his general store and his coffee farm.  He has received four loans from FAMA and has paid them back punctually.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to fumigate the farm.

loans.name: Cesar Gonzalo

texts.es:
Cesar trabaja en la actividad de la agricultura hace aproximadamente 25 años, pues de su padre aprendió a cultivar verduras y desde entonces viene trabajando a su lado. Con este negocio, genera los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 14 y 4 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, principalmente dada la experiencia que ha tenido, Cesar tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de abonos y semillas para su cultivo y así poder sacar buenos productos con los que pueda responder a los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.
Cesar espera que su negocio siga creciendo y en un futuro tenga la oportunidad de brindarle a su familia mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Además, sueña con brindarles a sus 2 hijos el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad y una mejor estabilidad económica para progresar.
texts.en:
Cesar has worked in agriculture for approximately 25 years because he learned from his father how to grow vegetables and has been working alongside him ever since.  With this business he earns the income needed to cover expenses in his home where he lives with his wife and two children who are 14 and 4 years old and who he’s always wanted to provide with a good quality of life.

Thanks to the good quality of his products due primarily to the experience he’s had, Cesar has large customer orders so he’s looking for a loan to be able to buy manure and seeds for his crops to produce good products and be able to fill pending customer orders.

Cesar hopes that the business will continue to grow and in future have the opportunity to give his family better economic growth opportunities.  In addition, he dreams with providing his two children with access to a better quality education and better economic stability to make progress.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Elsa De La Cruz

texts.es:
Elsa es muy trabajadora y con gran esfuerzo ha sacado su propio negocio adelante, lo que le ha permitido tener en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas. Elsa prepara y vende morcilla a las personas de su sector, y de esta manera contribuye económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar; sin embargo, debido a que su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar insumos como ollas y demás implementos de cocina para la preparación de la morcilla. 
De esta manera podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor atención y un mejor servicio, aunque gracias al buen servicio que ha venido ofreciendo Elsa sus ventas han incrementado considerablemente. Elsa espera que con mayores ingresos su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y sueña con que en un futuro pueda diversificar la variedad de comida que ofrece a sus clientes y así poco a poco vaya creciendo su negocio.
texts.en:
Elsa is a very hardworking woman and by making a great effort has managed to make a success of her business. This has allowed her have a better standard of living and improved economic opportunities. She makes and sells blood sausages to people in her community, and with the income she earns she pays for household expenses. However, because she has little capital, Elsa is now seeking a loan to buy supplies such as pots and other items for preparing the sausages.

With these new items, Elsa will be able to offer better service to her customers even though it is thanks to the good service she has always offered that sales have increased considerably. She hopes that by earning more money her family will have a better standard of living. Her dream is to diversify into different types of food and thereby gradually grow her business.

loans.use: to buy pots and other items for preparing sausages

loans.name: Erica Maria

texts.es:
Erica es una persona muy trabajadora que ha logrado superar grandes adversidades en su vida, pues es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 6 años, a quien su padre abandonó desde hace un par de años sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Erica trabaja desde hace varios años como mercaderista en una empresa, pero debido a que su salario no es suficiente para sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, tiene un negocio alterno donde ofrece el servicio de confección. Con los 2 trabajos puede generar los ingresos que son necesarios para su hogar y así poder ofrecer a su hijo una buena calidad de vida. Dado a que no cuenta con mucho capital y a que tiene su máquina de coser en muy mal estado, Erica busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de comprar una máquina de coser para reemplazar la que tiene actualmente, pues ya se encuentra en muy mal estado.
De esta manera podrá seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes un buen servicio y así irá creciendo poco a poco en este negocio. Erica sueña con tener un buen negocio que le genere grandes ingresos y en un futuro sueña con poder tener su propio almacén para vender su mercancía.
texts.en:
Erica is a very hardworking person who has managed to overcome great adversities in life for she’s a single mother, head of household with a six-year-old son whose father abandoned him a couple of years ago without making any economic contribution towards his support.

Erica has worked for several years as a saleswoman in a firm but because her salary is insufficient to cover all her household expenses, she has an alternate business making clothes.  With the two jobs she’s able to generate the income necessary for her home and to offer her son a good quality of life.

Because she does not have much capital and because her sewing machine is in poor shape, Erica is looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy a sewing machine to replace the one she has currently because it’s in very bad shape.  In this way, she will be able to continue offering her customers good service and her business will gradually grow.

Erica dreams with having a good business that generates large income and in future dreams with having her own store to sell her merchandise in.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Maria proviene de una familia con muchas dificultades económicas, pero gracias a sus ganas de trabajar y a su esfuerzo diariamente en su negocio tiene la posibilidad de brindarles una buena calidad de vida y poco a poco superar las grandes adversidades que se le presentan en la vida. Maria tiene 24 años, y desde hace aproximadamente 5 años viene trabajando en el servicio de la confección, más específicamente confeccionando billeteras; la actividad se la enseñó una amiga suya y es con este negocio que se genera los ingresos para su hogar y pueda sostener todos los gastos que de allí se derivan. La principal ventaja, que a su vez se presenta como dificultad para María es la gran cantidad de trabajo que le surge, pero debido a las condiciones precarias de su hogar no tiene el dinero suficiente con el cual comprar otra máquina y brindar empleo para otra persona, por lo que a menudo trabaja extensas horas de trabajo y esto le ha generado un gran desgasto físico. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta condición, y gracias a que una hermana suya comenzará a trabajar a su lado, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana y así poder brindar la herramienta que necesita para generar un empleo a una familiar suya.
De esta manera podrá trabajar en mejores condiciones y poco a poco irá haciendo su negocio más productivo. Además, podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y poco a poco su familia irá progresando y superando las adversidades que les presenta la vida.
texts.en:
Maria comes from a family that has faced many financial difficulties, but thanks to her desire to work and strive each day in her business, she has the opportunity to provide a better quality of life and gradually overcome the tremendous adversities she faces. She is 24 years old and has been providing sewing services for approximately five years, especially the production of change purses. A friend taught her this skill and now she has a business that generates household income for covering all of the expenses.

The main advantage that she has, which is a difficulty for Maria at the moment, is the large amount of work that she has been given. Due to the financial difficulties at home, she does not have sufficient funds to purchase another machine and provide employment for another person. Therefore, she often works long hours to the point of physical exhaustion. Encouraged by the chance to improve her condition, and with the help of a sister who started working with her, Maria is seeking a loan in order to purchase an upright machine. This will provide the equipment she needs to employ another family member. As a result, she will be able to work under better conditions and gradually develop a more productive business. In addition, Maria will enjoy a better quality of life and help her family gradually make progress in overcoming life's adversities.

loans.use: to buy an upright sewing machine.

loans.name: Feryal

texts.en:
Feryal is 38 years old and married; her husband is a driver. They have five girls and two boys.

To help her husband pay the household bills and to help in paying their kids’ school fees, Feryal started a small home-based trading business, buying and selling clothes and ladies' head covers and scarves. Now Feryal wants to increase her stock of clothing goods in order to increase her revenue.

loans.use: increase her stock of clothing goods for sale.

loans.name: Blanca Rubiela

texts.es:
Blanca tiene un taller de confección en el cual actualmente puede generar empleo y así mejorarles la condición de vida a muchas personas, además de que con este negocio contribuye económicamente en los ingresos de su hogar y de esta manera puede brindar a su esposo y sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. En su taller, Blanca es reconocida por la buena calidad de los productos que ofrece, y gracias a esto ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes que le hacen grandes pedidos; precisamente un cliente viene pidiendo a Blanca que incorpore en su taller una nueva máquina con la cual le pueda confeccionar algunas prendas que requieren de especial fabricación, y es por esto que Blanca busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una máquina plana de dos agujas para poder confeccionar prendas que requieren de una especial fabricación y así seguir creciendo en su taller.
De esta manera además de que podrá generar mayores ingresos para su hogar, tendrá la oportunidad de en un futuro genera empleo para una persona más, de modo que así seguirá aportando para mejorar la condición de vida de distintas personas. A Blanca se le reconoce por su gran carisma y es esta cualidad la que le ha permitido salir adelante por encima de sus adversidades, y es esto lo que la impulsa a que en su familia tengan la posibilidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y sus 2 hijos el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Blanca has a sewing workshop through which she can generate jobs and improve the quality of life for many people. Her business has contributed financially to her household income providing her husband and two children with a better life and economic opportunities to get ahead. 

In her workshop, Blanca is known for good quality products and this has helped to garner a large number of clients with large orders. A new client has asked her to add a new machine to her workshop so that she can make clothes that require special stitching. This is why Blanca is requesting a loan to buy a double needle straight stitch sewing machine - to make clothes that require special manufacturing and thus continue expanding her business. 

By moving ahead with the order, she can generate more income for her home and have the opportunity to employ one more person in the future - helping to improve other people's lives. 

Blanca is known for her immense charisma and it is this quality that has allowed her to get past adversity and provide her family with a better quality of life with access to education for her two children as well.

loans.use: buy a double needle straight stitch sewing machine to make clothes that require special manufacturing and will help to expand her business.

loans.name: Caminando Con Jesus Group

texts.es: Doña Raimunda es miembro del Banco Comunal Caminando con Jesús, tiene 63 años de edad, es casada y madre de cinco hijos, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotería y reside en la ciudad de Juticalpa. Desde hace 4 años atrás doña Raimunda tiene una pulpería, y esta abierta al publico desde las 6:00 am hasta las 6:00 pm, trabaja en conjunto con una empleada que le ayuda atender la clientela cuando ella tiene que salir a comprar la mercadería para suministrar la pulpería también le ayuda por las mañanas ya que doña Raimunda trabaja de aseadora en una institución del gobierno. El préstamo que solicita doña Raimunda lo necesita para la compra de arroz, frijoles, manteca, jabón, aceite, pastas, salsas, condimentos, churros, refrescos, pan, carnes, embutidos, pollo, entre otros productos de consumo alimenticio. Con el apoyo de este préstamo ella podrá surtir su negocio y su clientela no se ira a otro lugar a comprar porque tendrá de todo un poquito en productos. Su sueño es hacer su negocio de bloque ya que actualmente es de madera y apoyar a sus hijos para que puedan terminar sus estudios académicos. Doña Raimunda tiene varios ciclos en FAMA y ha sido una clienta puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Raimunda is a member of the “Caminando con Jesús” (Walking with Jesus) communal bank.  She’s 63-years-old, married and the mother of five children; her husband works in agriculture.  She sells groceries and lives in the city of Juticalpa.

Raimunda has had a grocery store for the last four years and it’s open to the public from 6am until 6pm.  She works alongside an employee who helps her take care of customers when she has to go out to buy merchandise to stock the store and also helps her during the morning because Raimunda also works as a cleaning lady at a government institution.

The loan Raimunda is asking for is needed to buy rice, beans, lard, soap, oil, noodles, sauces, condiments, snacks, soft-drinks, bread, meat, cured meats and chicken among other food items.

With help from this loan she will be able to stock the store and her customers won’t have to go somewhere else to buy because she’ll have a little bit of everything.  Her dream is to build her store with blocks since it’s currently made of wood and to support her children so that they can complete their academic studies.

Raimunda has been in several FAMA cycles and she’s been a punctual client with respect to the payment of her installments.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit to offer to his customers and an umbrella, so that the winter weather will not affect his sales

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Reem is 38 years old and married. She is the mother of four children, and she lives in Madaba, Jordan.

Reem is applying for a loan of 1,000 JOD so that she can improve her home living conditions to be more healthy for her family.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Elquin Mario

texts.es:
Elquin es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, nunca se ha dado por vencido y cada vez afronta junto con su trabajo todas las dificultades. Desde hace aproximadamente 16 años vende dulces y snack en una chaza, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a su buena atención y la buena calidad de sus productos, sus ventas han venido aumentando considerablemente, es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar dulces y snack para surtir su negocio y así ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.
De esta manera podrá seguir creciendo junto con su negocio y generará mayores ingresos para su hogar, lo que le permitirá brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Elquin sueña con algún día poder tener un local propio para la venta de sus productos, por esto trabaja fuertemente todos los días para alcanzarlo.
texts.en:
Elquin is a very hardworking man who has always had what it takes to overcome life’s problems. However, he has never been given any opportunities and is always faced with difficulties in his work. For approximately sixteen years he has been selling candy and snacks, and this work has provided him with the income necessary to pay for household expenses. 

Because he provides good service and quality merchandise, sales have increased considerably so Elquin is now seeking a loan to buy more candy and snacks so he has a greater variety of items to offer his customers. He hopes to grow his business in this way and earn more money so he can provide his family with a better standard of living. 

Elquin’s dream is to have his own store one day so he works very hard in order to fulfill his dream.

loans.use: to buy more candy and snacks

loans.name: Liliana Andrea

texts.es:
Liliana es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 2 años de edad a quien siempre le ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, por esto trabaja fuertemente en su negocio el cual es una papelería para poder generar los ingresos suficientes con el ánimo de poder tener una buena estabilidad económica en su hogar. Gracias a la buena atención que allí ofrece, su negocio ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, lo que le garantiza muy buenas ventas y esto se ha visto reflejado en la mejora de la calidad de vida en su hogar. Con el ánimo de afrontar la temporada de estudio, Liliana busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de papelería para ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.
De esta manera hará de su negocio más atractivo para los clientes lo que le permitirá tener mejores ventas. Además, así podrá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así cumplir su sueño de generar empleo y también de poder sacar adelante a su hijo brindándole una buena calidad de vida y en un futuro el acceso a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en: Liliana is a single mother and head of household.  She has a two year-old son to whom she has always wanted to provide a good quality of life.  To do this she works very hard in her business, which is a stationery store, to generate enough income so that she can have good economic stability for her household.  Thanks to the good service she offers, her business has managed to attract a large number of customers, guaranteeing her very good sales.  This has been reflected in an improved quality of life in her home.  To prepare for the school season, Liliana seeks a loan that will allow her to purchase stationery products so that she can offer her customers a greater variety of products.  In this way, she will make her business more attractive for the customers, so she will have better sales.  In addition, she will be able to continue to grow her business and accomplish her dreams of generating jobs, and of being able to get ahead with her son, providing him with a better quality of life and, in the future, access to a good quality education.

loans.use: to buy stationery products

loans.name: Los Llanos El Tablon Group

texts.es: Gladis es miembro del Grupo Solidario Los Llanos El Tablón, tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos, reside en la comunidad del Tablón en el municipio de Danli, El Paraíso. Es una mujer luchadora y tiene una pequeña pulpería desde hace tres años, que funciona en una pequeña parte de su casa de habitación, la cual atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m. La ventaja es que tiene excelente ubicación de venta y por lo tanto tiene muy buenas ganancias, la desventaja es que tiene competencia por lo que necesita surtir el negocio para mantener a sus clientes satisfechos. El préstamo que está solicitando Gladis lo necesita para comprar abarrotería en general como ser azúcar, arroz, refrescos, manteca, carnes, huevos, pollo, embutidos, pan, queso, mantequilla, cubitos, cafe, entre otros productos. Con el apoyo del préstamo tendrá más y mejor surtido su negocio y sus clientes podrán encontrar todo lo que necesitan para preparar sus alimentos y así ella podrá cubrir los gastos de la casa y los de sus hijos. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y llegar a tener un mini mercadito. Gladis tiene dos ciclos de ser cliente de  FAMA y espera pagar las cuotas de este nuevo préstamo de forma puntual y responsable como hasta en la actualidad.
texts.en:
Gladis is a member of the “Los Llanos El Tablón” communal bank.  She’s 32-years-old, married and has three children.  She lives in the community of El Tablón in Danli municipality, El Paraíso.

She’s a tenacious woman who has had a small grocery store for the last three years that operates in a small section of her house; it’s open from 7am until 8pm.  The advantage it has is its excellent location for sales so it earns good profits; the disadvantage is that she has competition so she must stock the store to keep her customers satisfied.

The loan Gladis is taking out is to buy groceries in general like sugar, rice, soft-drinks, lard, meat, eggs, chicken, cured meats, bread, cheese, butter, bullion cubes and coffee among other products.  With help from the loan she’ll have more and better stock in the store and her customers will be able to find everything they need to prepare their meals and she will be able to cover her household’s and her children’s expenses.

Her goal is to make her store grow until it becomes a mini-market.  Gladis has been a FAMA client for two cycles and she expects to pay the installments for her new loan punctually and responsibly like she’s done to date.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es:
Jose es un joven emprendedor que al no encontrar oportunidades de trabajo decide montar su propio negocio y así poder generar sus propios ingresos. Anteriormente Jose tenía su propia venta de mercancía, pero debido a circunstancias ajenas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de dejarlo a un lado y así paso a ser un empleado en una empresa de venta de mercancía a domicilio. Debido a que sus ingresos como empleado eran muy bajos y no alcanzaban para cubrir todas sus necesidades y contribuir en su hogar, Jose desea reiniciar su negocio de venta de mercancía y así poder tener unos mejores ingresos, contribuir con los gastos en su hogar y así tener una mejor calidad de vida. Es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos como juguetes, prendas de vestir y productos de uso personal para reiniciar su negocio y tener mejores ingresos en su hogar.
De esta manera su calidad de vida mejorará considerablemente, pues podrá tener unos mayores ingresos y así tener una mejor estabilidad económica, además de que en su hogar podrán beneficiarse de esto gracias al aporte económico que Jose hace a su familia. Jose sueña con tener un gran negocio de venta de mercancías para bebes y así también generar empleo para las personas que al igual que el no encontraron oportunidades de trabajo dignas.
texts.en:
Jose is a young entrepreneur. As there are no job openings, he has decided to start his own business to generate an income. In the past he used to have a business selling merchandise but due to circumstances outside his control, he had to put that aside and become an employee selling goods from his house. As his earnings from this were very low and he couldn’t pay for necessities and household expenses, Jose wants to start his business again and earn more money to pay for household expenses and a better standard of living. His quality of life will improve considerably because he will have more money and more financial stability. His family will also benefit from this economic support.

Jose’s dream is to have a large business selling merchandise for young children such as toys, clothing, and personal products. He would be able to provide employment for many people who, like him, have not managed to find decent work.

loans.use: to start his own business selling merchandise for young children such as toys, clothing, and personal products

loans.name: Many

texts.en:
Many is a 38-year-old lady. She is conservative and single; she has asked her father to take her place in the photo.

Many is an employee who works in the private sector and she has four younger siblings. Being the oldest puts a lot of pressure on her to be a good role model and she feels the need to help her parents financially. That’s why she decided to start a livestock business. In addition to buying and selling sheep and goats, the family uses the animals' milk for themselves, usually to make yogurt.

Now Many has applied for this loan in order to increase the number of sheep she has.

loans.use: to increase the number of sheep in her livestock business.

loans.name: Basma

texts.en: Basma, 37 years old, is a housewife caring for three boys and two girls. She has changed a room in her house into a tailoring workshop where she started her business. She bought a sewing machine, different colors of threads, and a few fabrics to start with. She tailored shirts, skirts, and traditional dresses with unique embroidery designs. Now people sometimes bring their own fabric and ask her to tailor it into a piece of clothing. Basma has applied for this loan in order to buy new raw materials to start sewing colorful summer dresses.

loans.use: to buy new raw materials to start sewing dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to make it easier to provide home service.

loans.name: Unidas Por El Amor Group

texts.es: Rosalía tiene 27 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos, reside en la comunidad del Rusio en el municipio de Juticalpa y se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano. Rosalía inicio a vender ropa usada desde hace 5 años atrás, trabaja ella sola y lo hace de forma ambulante. Todos los días muy temprano por las tardes como a eso de las 1:00 p.m sale a las comunidades mas cercanas a realizar sus ventas y luego regresa a casa como a las 7:00 p.m. Rosalía gracias a Dios es una persona sana, amable y muy conocida por sus vecinos. Las ventajas es que tiene muchos clientes y la ropa se le vende rápido pero se le dificulta tener que ir a comprar los fardos de ropa hasta la ciudad, ya que esto le proviene gastos porque tiene que pagar transporte. Ella solicita este préstamo para comprar varios fardos de ropa usada y así surtir su negocio de estilos actuales y acordes a la temporada. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá llamar la atención de más clientes y seguirá teniendo una actividad económica que le permita cubrir los gastos para la manutención de sus hijos. Su sueño es tener un local propio y ayudar a sus hijos a realizarse profesionalmente. Rosalía es cliente de FAMA desde hace 10 años y ha cumplido puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Rosalía is 27 years old and a single mother with two children. She resides in the community of Rusio in the town of Juticalpa and sells second hand clothing. Rosalía started selling used clothing five years ago. She works alone and is a street vendor. Every day very early in the afternoons from about 1:00 p.m. she goes out into the nearest communities to make her sales and then returns home at about 7:00 p.m.

Rosalía, thank God, is a healthy person who is friendly and very well known among her neighbors. The advantages are that she has many customers and her clothes are rapidly sold, however the difficulty is that she has to go to the city to buy bundles of clothes and this entails expenses because she has to pay for transportation. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase several bundles of used clothing so that she can stock her business with current seasonal styles. With the help of this loan she will be able to attract more customers and will continue having a business that allows her to cover the expenses of maintaining her children. Her dream is to have her own shop and to help her children become professionals. Rosalía has been a FAMA client for the past ten years and has punctually made all of her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy bundles of used clothing.

loans.name: Andres Giovanni

texts.es:
Andres es una persona muy emprendedora que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado su negocio adelante y así poder generar ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecer en su familia una buena calidad de vida. Hace aproximadamente 5 años estudió en una institución del estado que se llama SENA en la cual capacitan a las personas para el empleo; allí aprendió la actividad de la herrería y desde entonces viene trabajando en esta actividad. En un principio trabajaba en el taller de un amigo, y ahora gracias a la experiencia adquirida viene trabajando de manera independiente y así puede progresar económicamente. El principal valor que ofrece a sus clientes es el servicio a domicilio, y gracias a esto ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes para su negocio, y es por esto que ahora que su negocio viene creciendo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una motocicleta para realizar sus trabajos a domicilio en mejores condiciones y así ser más productivo.
De esta manera ofrecerá un mejor servicio y también podrá atender a más clientes en el día, de manera que su negocio seguirá creciendo cada vez más y así seguirá progresando económicamente. Su sueño es poder tener un gran negocio que se encuentre posicionado y sea muy rentable, y así poder generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Andrés is a very enterprising person who with much effort has moved his business ahead thus being able to generate income to offer his family a good quality of life.  

About five years ago he studied in an institution called SENA where they train people for work.  He learned metal working there and since then has been working in this activity.   At the beginning he worked in a friend’s shop but now thanks to the experience he’s acquired he works independently and is able to make economic progress that way.

The main value he offers customers is home service and thanks to this he’s managed to win over a large number of customers for his business and this is why he’s now looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy a motorcycle to be able to do in-home jobs in better condition thus being more productive.

In this way he will offer better service and will also be able to take care of more customers per day so that his business will continue growing more each time and he will continue to make economic progress.  

His dream is to be able to have a well-positioned business that’s very profitable to generate employment for people most in need.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: Ibrahim is a 25-year-old single guy who has five brothers and sisters. He owns a small barbershop, which he opened six years ago. He took a few courses to learn the profession. Now Ibrahim has applied for this youth loan to buy more equipment for the shop and more cosmetics products. In the near future he is planning to open a beauty salon for ladies too.

loans.use: to buy more equipment and cosmetics products

loans.name: Navideño Group

texts.es: Luis es miembro del Grupo Solidario Navideño, tiene 31 años de edad, es casado y tiene 1 hija, el y su familia reside en la colonia 1º de mayo de la ciudad de Juticalpa. Su esposa trabaja de enfermera en una clínica privada. Luis se dedica a la repostería donde hace diferentes tipos de  horneado de pan como ser molletes, donas, galletas, etc., aprendió cuando trabajo en una repostería y le surgió la idea de poner su propia empresa de venta de pan. Trabaja con dos jóvenes y les paga de acuerdo a la producción, lo hace todos los días comienza a elaborar el pan desde las 2:00 am hasta las 8:00 am, luego sale a vender el producto a sus clientes. La ventaja es que a sus clientes les gusta mucho su producto y le encargan pedidos grandes por lo que tiene muy buenas ventas. El único inconveniente es que tiene que pagar alquiler, ya que no tiene un local propio para la elaboración del pan. El préstamo que Luis solicita es para surtir su negocio en la compra de productos como ser: harina, huevos, soda, sal, leche, azúcar, entre otros y en la compra de un horno ya que lo necesita para hacer mayores cantidades de pan. Con la ayuda de este préstamo el nivel de vida de su familia cambiaria, ya que podrá elaborar mayor cantidad de pan para ofrecerle mas a sus clientes. Su sueño es tener su propio local y poder hacer su casa. Luis tiene dos ciclos de ser cliente de FAMA y ha podido cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Luis is a member of the “Navideño” solidarity group.  He’s 31-years-old, married and has one daughter.  He and his family live in the city of Juticalpa’s 1º de Mayo neighborhood.

His wife works as a nurse in a private clinic and Luis works as a pastry baker making all types of baked goods like muffins, donuts, cookies, etc.  He learned when he worked in a pastry shop and he got the idea of establishing his own bakery.

He works with two young men he pays according to production.  He works every day starting to make bread from 2am until 8am and then goes out to sell it to his customers.  The advantage is that his customers like his products very much and place large orders so his sales are good.  The only inconvenience is that he has to pay rent since he does not have a place of his own in which to bake bread.

The loan Luis is requesting is to stock the business with products like flour, eggs, baking soda, salt, milk and sugar, among others and to buy an oven because he needs it to make larger amounts of bread.

With help from this loan his family’s standard of living will change because he’ll be able to make larger amounts of bread to offer more to his customers.  His dream is to have his own locale and to be able to build his house.

Luis has been a FAMA client for two cycles and he’s been able to make his installment payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy an oven, flour and sugar, among others.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa es una joven emprendedora de 21 años de edad que desde muy temprana edad decidió aprender al lado de su madre la actividad de la venta de mercancía, y gracias a esto decidió montar su propio negocio de venta de prendas de vestir para generar sus propios ingresos, contribuir económicamente en su hogar y progresar económicamente en su vida. Siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora, y esto le ha permitido superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en su negocio, y gracias a todas las experiencias adquiridas hoy es reconocida por ofrecer a sus clientes una muy buena atención en su negocio. Debido a que se acerca la temporada del día de las madres, Luisa busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para poder estar preparada con una buena variedad de productos para la temporada del día de las madres.
De esta manera podrá sacar adelante su negocio y así podrá tener unos mejores ingresos tanto para su hogar como para ella. Además, Luisa espera que su negocio siga creciendo poco a poco para así cumplir su sueño de tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo y desde el cual pueda brindarles a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en: Luisa is an enterprising youth of 21 years, who from an early age decided to learn how to sell merchandise at her mother's side.  Thanks to this, she decided to start up her own business selling clothing so that she could generate her own income, make a financial contribution to the household, and make economic progress in her life.  She has always been known for being very hardworking, and this has allowed her to overcome some great adversities that have come up in her business.  Thanks to all of these experiences, she is now known for offering her customers very good service in her business.  Because mother's day is approaching, Luisa is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy more garments so that she will be prepared with a good variety of products for the mother's day season.  In this way, she will be able to get ahead with her business, and will have more income for herself and for her household.  In addition, Luisa wants to continue to grow her business each day so that she can accomplish her dream of having a big business from which  she can generate jobs, provide her family with a better quality of life, and have a better opportunity to make economic progress.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Badran

texts.en: Badran, a 44-year-old married man, supports a family of six. He does this from his own barbershop that he has been working at for the past 20 years. Now Badran has applied for this loan in order to replace the machines he has at the shop and improve the internal decor.

loans.use: to replace the machines he has at the shop

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.ru: Улугбек занимается предоставлением услуги такси в городе. Он добросовестный и трудолюбивый человек, женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Старшему 17 лет, среднему 13 лет, а младшему 11 лет. Жена занимается домохозяйством. У него автомашина марки «опель- вектра». Улугбек общается  своими клиентами вежливо и обслуживает их на высоком уровне. Улугбек хотел бы получить займ для покупки запчастей для ремонта своего автомобиля. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарит вас за вашу поддержку и поощрение.
texts.en: Ulugbek is involved in providing a taxi service in the city.  He is a conscientious and hardworking person, who is married and raising three children.  His oldest is 17, middle is 13 and the youngest is 11 years old.  His wife is involved in household work.  Ulugbek has an Opel Vectra car.  He treats his customers politely and provides a high quality of service to them.  Ulugbek wants to obtain this loan to buy spare parts in order to repair his car.  He relies on your help and thanks you in advance for your support and encouragement.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and repair his car

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is a 27-year-old single lady who has an older sister and a younger brother. Four years ago she opened a small food store to be able to support herself. Now she has applied for a youth loan to add more shelves and bring in more food products. Her goal is to fill up the store in order to increase her revenue from it.

loans.use: to bring in more food products and fill up the store

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is a 19-year-old single lady. She has five siblings. Alaa is a university student majoring in Biology Sciences. She has applied for this loan to pay for her semester fees in order to reduce the financial pressure on her parents.

loans.use: to pay for her semester fees

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам добрый и трудолюбивый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка, ему 2 годика. Жена занимается домохозяйством и присматривает за ребенком. Рустам занимается предоставлением услуги такси по городу. В этом бизнесе он уже более 4 года. Имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Рустам запрашивает займ для покупки шин для автомобиля и его ремонта. Рустам надеется на вашу помощь, который позволит ему починить свой автомобиль и продвинуть его бизнес вперед.
texts.en: Rustam is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and has one child, who is two years old.  His wife is involved in household work and looks after the child.  Rustam is involved in providing a taxi service within the city.  He has been in this business for over four years.  He has regular customers.  Rustam is requesting this loan to purchase tires for his car and to repair it.  Rustam relies on your help, which will allow him to repair his car and move his business ahead.

loans.use: to purchase tires for his car

loans.name: Julian Eduardo

texts.es:
Julian es un joven emprendedor que a pesar de su corta edad ha tenido la oportunidad de tener grandes logros y progresar en su vida contribuyendo en su hogar para que sus padres tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Hace aproximadamente 3 años Julian aprendió la actividad de la barbería y durante 2 años trabajó en un salón de belleza donde ejercía la actividad. Debido a circunstancias adversas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de dejar su trabajo y posteriormente consiguió trabajo en otra barbería en el oficio de servicios generales. Con su salario, Julian genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, el cual ha construido con su pareja y su hijo de 1 año de edad; sin embargo, sus ingresos a menudo no son suficientes para sostener todos los gastos que se generan, por lo que ahora que se le ha presentado una gran oportunidad no la quiere desaprovechar. Su jefe, le ha propuesto que Julian tenga su propio puesto para realizar el oficio del corte del cabello en el salón de belleza, y es por esto que Julian busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una silla y un espejo para montar su puesto en la barbería de su jefe y así dejar el oficio de servicios generales y sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente.
De esta manera podrá seguir progresando en su vida realizando el oficio que siempre le ha gustado y así podrá también generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Además, su pareja y su hijo tendrán la oportunidad de acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y poco a poco ir progresando superando las adversidades que le presenta la vida.
texts.en:
Julian is a young entrepreneur. Despite his young age, he has taken the opportunity to achieve great things and progress on his own by contributing toward his household so that his parents can have a better quality of life. Julian learned the barbering trade approximately three years ago and utilized his skills by working in a beauty salon for two years. Due to adverse circumstances beyond his control, Julian was obliged to leave his job and afterwards secured a position at another barber shop providing general services. With his salary he earns the income that he needs to maintain the expenses of his household, which includes his partner and their one-year-old son. However, his earnings are not enough to cover all of the expenses. Julian now has an opportunity that he does not want to miss.

His boss proposed that Julian should have his own station in the salon for cutting hair. For this reason, he is seeking a loan in order to purchase a barber chair and mirror so that he can set up his own station in his employer's establishment. Julian will be promoted from his general services position and his income will increase considerably. By utilizing this opportunity to progress in life, Julian will be to pursue the career that he has always enjoyed. He will also be able to generate more income for maintaining the household expenses. In addition, his partner and his son will have the opportunity to experience a better quality of life and gradually overcome the adversities in their lives.

loans.use: to purchase a barber chair and mirror.

loans.name: Om Wajdy Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om Wajdy. It consists of four members who are all females: Khadigh, Faizh, Huda, and Asia. All of them are friends and from Aden, Yemen. They have primarily worked together in a small business selling varieties of goods for several years. The entire group took a loan of 200,000 Yemen Rials (YER).

Khadigh is 65 years old and lives in Aden, Yemen (in the photo, she is the woman with the uncovered face). She has been selling food products for 4 years. Her main goal is to attain steady growth and to be recognized as a seller of high-quality products. Her main goals are to gain customers that order in greater quantities and to have enough capital to respond to a potentially increasing demand. This is why she asks for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy flour, sugar, canned food, and water materials products in greater quantities, which will net her a discount. She wants the range of goods she offers to make an impression on her customers, which will help her sell more.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, canned food, and water materials products for her business.

loans.name: Turakhon

texts.ru: Турахон имеет большую дружную семью, на воспитании имеет семерых детей, шестеро девочек и один мальчик. Так как у него большая семья у него расходы. Чтобы содержать свою семью он начал занимается купле- продажей женской одежды и сумок. Занимается данным бизнесом уже более 3 лет. Бизнес начал собственными средствами. Имеет собственную  точку на  рынке Корвон, которую приобрел три года назад. Товар закупает на оптовом  рынке  города.  На рынке он работает пол дня так как покупатели посещают его только в первую половину дня. Остальные пол дня он проводит время с семьей и занимается домашними делами. Турахон запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Turakhon has a large and friendly family of seven children - six girls and one boy.  Because he has a large family, he has expenses.  In order to support his family, he became involved in buying and selling clothing and purses.  He has been in this business for over three years.  Turakhon started this business with his own money.  He owns a retail outlet, which he bought three years ago, at the Korvon market.  He buys his merchandise at the city's wholesale market.  He works half days at the market because customers visit him only during the first half of the day.  He spends the rest of the day with the family and does household work.  Turakhon is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy clothes in order to expand his business

loans.name: Billy Giovana

texts.es:
Billy es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecer a su esposo y sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida, es por esto que desde hace aproximadamente año y medio con el ánimo de generar ingresos que mejores la calidad de vida en su hogar, decidió montar su propio almacén donde ofrece accesorios para dama. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece en su negocio, ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes que le han permitido tener muy buenas ventas; es por esto que ahora que su negocio sigue creciendo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de accesorios para dama para surtir su negocio y así ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.
De esta manera espera que sus ventas aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá satisfacer mayores necesidades de sus clientes y así generará mejores ingresos en su hogar. Su sueño es poder tener un gran negocio en el que pueda generar empleo y también poder sacar sus 2 hijos adelante brindándoles una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Billy’s a person who has always stood out for being very hardworking and for always wanting to offer her husband and two children a better quality of life.  This is why about a year and a half ago approximately with the goal of generating income to improve her home’s quality of life she decided to open her own store selling women’s accessories.

Thanks to the good service she offers in her store she’s managed to win over a good number of customers that make good sales so now her business continues to grow and she’s looking for financing to be able to buy women’s accessories to stock the store and offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

In this way she hopes sales will increase considerably because she’ll be able to meet greater customer need thus generating better income for her home.  Her dream is to be able to have a great business in which she can generate employment and also move her two children forward providing them with a good quality education.

loans.use: to buy women's accessories.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos destes 3 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como serralheiro mecânico, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (portas, ferro, cimento, blocos, areia, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, montar uma oficina mecânica em sua casa e oficializar o seu matrimónio, para tal vai pagar devidamente o empréstimo e solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar a sua renda mensal para poder realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Antonio is married and has 5 children, 3 of whom are still in school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he does not support anyone else.  

He is a metalworker and plans to use this loan to purchase construction material (doors, iron, cement, blocks, sand, etc.) in order to continue construction on his home. In the future he hopes to complete his home, set up a mechanic's shop in his home, and formalize his marriage.  He will therefore pay his loan on schedule and request additional loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to increase his monthly earnings in order to carry out his plans.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (doors, iron, cement, blocks, sand, etc.)

loans.name: Yorali

texts.ru: Ёрали добрый и трудолюбивый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет одну дочку и двух сыновей. Ёрали занимается куплей продажей продуктов питания. Занимается данным бизнесом 3 года. Начал бизнес с собственными деньгами. Имеет одну арендованную точку на  рынке Дехкан. Товар закупает на оптовом  рынке  Фаровон.  Ёрали усердно работает с 08:00 до 19:00 часов  в своем магазине. Ёрали раньше кредитовался в МДО «Финка» и досрочно погасил займ. Имеет положительное кредитное досье, бизнес семейный жена и дочка помогают ему в бизнесе. Ёрали запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Yorali is a kind and hardworking person, who is married and raising one daughter and two sons.  Yorali is involved in buying and selling food products.  He has been in this business for three years.  He started this business with his own money.  He has one leased retail outlet at the Dehkan market.  He buys his merchandise at the Farovon market.  Yorali works hard from from 08:00 in the morning until 19:00 in the evening in his store.  He previously obtained financing from MDO "Finka" and repaid his loan early.  He has a positive credit history, family business, with his wife and daughter helping him in the business.  Yorali is requesting this loan to purchase merchandise in order to expand his business.  He relies on your kindness and help.

loans.use: to purchase products in order to expand his business

loans.name: Akramjon

texts.ru: Акрамчон женат и на воспитании имеет двух сыновей и одну дочь. Он занимается куплей продажей продуктов питания. Занимается данным бизнесом 2 года. Бизнес начал собственными деньгами. Имеет одну арендованную точку на  участке Гулбутта. Товар закупает на оптовом  рынке. Акрамчон  работает с 08:00 до 19:00 часов. Акрамчон раньше нигде не кредитовался. Бизнес семейный жена помогает ему в бизнесе. Теперь Акрамчон запрашивает займ для расширения оборотного капитала, а именно для закупа товара. Он надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Akramjon is married and raising two sons and one daughter.  He is involved in buying and selling food products.  He has been in this business for two years.  Akramjon started this business with his own money.  He has a retail outlet at the Gulbutta place.  He buys his merchandise at a wholesale market.  Akramjon works from 08:00 until 19:00 hours.  He has never obtained financing before.  This is a family business, and his wife helps him with it.  Currently, Akramjon is requesting this loan to increase his working capital, and specifically to buy merchandise.  He relies on your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: to buy food products in order to expand his business

loans.name: Moises

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos destes 1 já frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe enviando algum valor monetário para despesas alimentares. 	
Trabalha como oficial de campo e como pedreiro em tempos livres, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vitaminas e vacinas para aumentar a quantidade do seu produto e responder a demanda.
No futuro deseja ter uma loja comercial e melhorar a sua casa, para tal vai pagar devidamente o empréstimo e solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a redução das receitas devido a subida de preços dos produtos onde compram a grosso.
texts.en:
Moises is married and father to two children, one of whom attends school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he also supports his mother by sending her money for food expenses.  

He is an agricultural worker and works as a mason when he has free time.  With this loan he plans to purchase chicks, feed, vitamins, and vaccines to increase his stock and respond to demand.  In the future, he would like to have a store and to make improvements to his home.  For that reason he will make his payments on time and request additional loans from Hluvuku.  

His greatest challenge is his decrease in earnings due to the increases in wholesale prices.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed, vitamins, and vaccines to raise chickens.

loans.name: Faisal

texts.en:
Faisal is a 25-year-old single guy. He lives with his mother and two brothers after their father passed away.

Faisal has a very independent personality; he started his own business by opening a clothing store almost three years ago. From the profit he made he was able to bring in more clothes and change the interior decorations.

Now Faisal has applied for this youth loan to prepare the store for the summer season and bring in the new collection.

loans.use: to prepare the store for summer season and bring in the new collection

loans.name: Margarida

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Provincial de Maputo, de 35 anos é divorciada mãe de 3 filhos. Responsabiliza se pelo seu sobrinho e Irmã que vivem com ela em sua casa.
E negociante a mais de 10 anos tem vendido roupas e sapatos usados no Mercado informal shoprite, ao ar livre, duas vezes por semana (quartas e sábados). Trabalha das 7h as 15h não têm empregados e conta somente com ajuda da sua filha.
Este é seu Segundo empréstimo na Hluvuvku no valor de 10.000.00mt com o qual pretende aumentar o seu volume de mercadoria nomeadamente (sapatos e roupas usadas. O anterior no valor de 8.000.00mt foram para a mesma finalidade. futuramente ser uma grande empresaria e esta prestes a assinar um contracto com a empresa da Darling para fornecer mecha (Cabelos ao nível do Distrito. O maior desafio é lutar e não deixar levar se pela emoção.
texts.en:
Margarida was born in the province of Maputo.  She is 35 years old and has 3 children.  She also supports her nephew and sister who live with her in her home.  

She has been a businesswoman for more than 10 years.  She sells used clothing and shoes in the Shoprite open air informal market, two times for week (Wednesdays and Saturdays).  She works from 7am to 3pm and does not have employees.  Her daughter helps her.   

This is her second loan with Hluvuku, in the amount of 10.000.00mt, which she will use to increase her inventory (used shoes and clothing).  The previous loan was for 8.000.00mt for the same purpose.  In the future she will be a large businessowner as  she is about to sign a contract with the Darling company to sell hair color throughout the district.  

Her greatest challenge is to fight to not let herself be carried away by emotions.

loans.use: to buy used clothes and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Dineira Del Socorro

texts.es:
Dineira se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 11 y 3 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, es por esto que al ver que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio el cual es un puesto donde vende dulces y snack a sus clientes, y con este negocio genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Desde que tiene su negocio la calidad de vida en su hogar ha mejorado considerablemente, es por esto que siempre quiere conservar su negocio y hacerlo crecer captando mayor cantidad de clientes. Gracias a que sus ventas vienen creciendo, Dineira busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de dulces y snack para así poder ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y satisfacer la demanda por sus productos.
De esta manera sus ventas mensuales se incrementarán considerablemente, pues podrá brindarles a sus clientes lo que le vienen pidiendo desde hace algún tiempo. Además, espera que así pueda tener mayores ingresos con los que pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Dineira is married and has two children who are 11 and 3 years old who she’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life and a good education for.  It’s because of this that seeing that her husband’s income was insufficient to cover all household expenses she decided to open her own business which is a stand where she sells snacks and candy to her customers.  With this business she generates income with which she contributes economically to cover her household expenses.

Since she’s had her business the quality of life at home has improved considerably which is why she always wants to keep her business and make it grow winning over a larger number of customers.  Thanks to her sales growth, Dineira is looking for financing to be able to buy candy and snacks to be able to offer a wider variety of products to her customers and to meet demand for her products.

In this way her monthly sales will increase considerably because she’ll be able to offer her customers what they’ve been requesting for some time now.  In addition, she hopes this way to earn higher income that will lead to a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy candy and snacks.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is a 24-year-old conservative lady; she asked her mother in law to take her place in the photo.

Zainab is married to a military man and they have a two-year-old daughter. 

Zainab started a farming business with the help of her mother-in-law's experience. Now she wants to buy new plants and seeds to start planting different fruits and vegetables, and it is for that purpose that she has applied for this youth loan.

In the future, Zainab wants to produce a lot to distribute to the fruits and vegetables market.

loans.use: to buy new plants and seeds

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 23-year-old single guy who has three sisters and two brothers.

Ibrahim is a university student majoring in Business Administration. He has applied for this loan in order to pay for his semester fees so he can graduate as soon as possible and find a job in his field.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma, a 44 years old married woman, is caring for six sons and daughters.

To help her husband in uplifting their living conditions, Asma chose to start a small retail business selling used and secondhand clothes. Now she has applied for this loan to get more summer clothes and is hoping in the future to add a new section for selling new clothes.

loans.use: to get more summer clothes

loans.name: Neftali

texts.es:
Neftali se encuentra casado y tiene 4 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que se esfuerza diariamente en su trabajo para poder generar los ingresos suficientes con los cuales su familia pueda gozar de unas buenas condiciones de vida. Neftali se dedica a la actividad de la compra y venta de ganado, la cual aprendió gracias a que su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y desde muy temprana edad se la enseñó, permitiendo que a la fecha Neftali tenga una gran experiencia en la actividad y esto le permita diferenciarse de su competencia. Hace poco tiempo tuvo un incidente en el cual le robaron una gran suma de dinero, la cual estaba destinada al pago de unos animales que había comprado para su negocio, y debido a que tenía que responder por este dinero se vio obligado a descapitalizar en gran medida su negocio y así poder responder con la obligación. Gracias a su esfuerzo ahora tiene la posibilidad de seguir creciendo y progresando en el negocio, por esto busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de ganado de levante para poder tener animales con los cuales pueda responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante pese a las adversidades y su familia tendrá la posibilidad de seguir obteniendo una buena calidad de vida gracias a los ingresos que su negocio le genera.
texts.en:
Neftali is married and has four children, whom he always has wanted to give a good quality of life.  This is why he works hard every day in his job, to be able to generate the necessary income for his family to enjoy good living conditions.

Neftali buys and sells cattle, which he learned thanks to his father, who also did this work and taught it to Neftali from a very young age.  This has allowed Neftali to have excellent experience in this job up to the present, and this allows him to be different from his competition.

A short time ago there was an incident in which he was robbed of a large sum of money that was to be used to pay for some animals he had bought for his business.  Because he had to account for this money he found it necessary to take a lot of capital out of the business to answer for his liability.

Thanks to his effort, it is now possible for him to keep growing and progressing in his business.  This is why he is looking for a loan to allow him to buy cattle to raise, to have animals to respond to his customers' orders.

This way his business will continue to get ahead despite adversity, and his family will have the possibility of continuing to have a good quality of life thanks to the income his business generates for them.

loans.use: to buy cattle to raise.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Gaza tem 34 anos e vive maritalmente na casa própria com sua família, é pai de 2 filhos e responsabiliza se pelos seus 3 irmãos que vivem com ele em sua casa.
E docente a mais de 10 anos, funcionário permanente das 6h as 15h tendo um valor mensal que aplica nas despesas da casa. Para além do ordenado faz negócio da venda de peixe a grosso, não tem empregados e conta com ajuda da sua esposa.
Este é seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuvku no valor de 17.000.00mt com o qual pretende adquirir mais ainda no peixe na perspetiva de satisfazer a demanda dos seus clientes. Os anteriores no valor de 6.500.00mt e 15.000.00mt foram para habitação. Pretende futuramente engrenar na faculdade dar continuidade dos estudos. Esta confiante que vai pagar antes do tempo apesar da oscilação da energia que afecta o seu negócio.
texts.en:
Jose was born in the Gaza province.  He is 34 years old and lives with his wife in a home he owns, along with his family.  He has 2 children and also supports his 3 brothers who live with him.  

He has been a teacher for more than 10 years.  He has a fixed contract from 6am from 3pm and earns a monthly salary that he uses for household expenses.  He also has a business selling fish wholesale.  He does not have employees but his wife helps him.  

This is his third loan with Hluvuku, in the amount of 17.000.00mt, which he will use to purchase more fish in order to meet customer demand. The prior loans were for 6.500.000mt and 15.000.00mt for housing.  

In the future he plans to enroll in the university and continue his education.  He is confident he will pay off the loan early despite the electricity cuts that affect his business.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1filho já maior de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta um neto que vive com eles. 	
É polícia e quadro do Ministério do Interior, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, cimento, chapas, areia, pedra e outros) para concluir a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende mobilar a sua casa e oferecer melhor conforto a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de material de construção para poder concluir totalmente a sua casa.
texts.en:
Joaquim is married and has 1 child who is already an adult.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports a grandson who lives with them.  

He is a police officer in the Interior Ministry.  With this loan he plans to purchase construction materials (metal bars, cement, metal panels, sand, stones, etc.) to finish construction on his home.  In the future he plans to furnish his home to offer greater comfort to his family.  He promises to make his payments on time in order to request more loans from Hluvuku. 

The challenge he faces is the high cost of construction materials to totally finish his home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (metal bars, cement, metal panels, sand, stone, etc.)

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es:
John Jairo es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de salir adelante lo han impulsado para salir adelante y continuar progresando al lado de su familia. Casado y padre de 1 hijo, John Jairo tiene la responsabilidad de generar los ingresos en su hogar, y es con este cometido que hace aproximadamente 6 años decidió montar su propio negocio el cual era una tienda general donde vendía productos de la canasta familiar que por circunstancias adversas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de cerrar. Hace aproximadamente 2 meses se le presentó la oportunidad de volver a montar su negocio y con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado surtirlo y posicionarlo en sus clientes, y por esto hasta el día de hoy su negocio viene creciendo en ventas poco a poco y así genera los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Debido a que su negocio lo reabrió con muy bajo capital, John Jairo busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar un refrigerador para ofrecer a sus clientes productos que requieran de refrigeración, y así poder ofrecer una mejor variedad de productos de la canasta familiar.
De esta manera podrá seguir creciendo su negocio y poco a poco mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposa y su hijo. Además, espera que con mejores oportunidades económicas pueda superar las grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida.
texts.en:
John Jairo is a person who has had to go through many adversities in life.  However, his drive to get ahead has pushed him ahead and to continue making progress alongside his family.

He’s married and the father of a son.  John Jairo has the responsibility of generating household income and with this duty he decided six years ago to open his own business which was a general store where he sold basic staple items but which due to adverse circumstances beyond his control he had to close.  

About two months ago he was presented with the opportunity of once again opening his business and with much effort he’s managed to stock it and set it up for his customers.  To date, it’s sales are growing gradually and he’s generating income needed to cover household expenses.  

Because he reopened his business with very little capital, John Jairo is looking for financing that will make it possible for him to buy a refrigerator so that he can offer customers items that require refrigeration thus having a better variety of basic staple items available to offer.

In this way, he will be able to continue growing in business and gradually be able to improve his wife’s and his son’s quality of life.  In addition, he hopes that with better economic opportunities he will be able to overcome the great adversities life has presented him.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Erika Lorena

texts.es:
Erika es una joven emprendedora de 20 años que decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos y así poder contribuir económicamente en el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Desde hace aproximadamente 5 años aprendió de una tía la actividad de la confección, y desde entonces viene trabajando fuertemente en esta actividad lo que le ha permitido tener muy buena experiencia. En un principio Erika trabajaba en un taller de confección donde perfeccionó su trabajo y así montó su propio taller de confección donde ofrecía el servicio de confección a terceros; luego, gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos logró tener muy buenas ventas y así poder tener el capital suficiente con el cual montó su línea propia de prendas de vestir. Actualmente, Erika trabaja únicamente su línea propia gracias a que tiene muy buenas ventas y su capacidad de producción se encuentra totalmente dirigida a la confección de los pedidos de su línea propia; sin embargo, cuenta con la dificultad de que no ha tenido el capital suficiente con el cual pueda comprar una máquina resortadora, por lo que le toca dirigirse hasta otro barrio de la ciudad donde le prestan este servicio y así debe incurrir en gastos extras en su producción. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Erika busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina resortadora y así poder tener todo lo necesario para la producción de sus prendas de vestir y no tener que incurrir en gastos extras en su producción.
De esta manera Erika podrá ahorrar una gran cantidad de dinero en desplazamiento y en pagar por el servicio que le prestan con la máquina resortadora, por lo que sus ingresos mensuales se verán en aumento y así su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante. Erika sueña con tener un gran taller donde pueda generar empleo para más personas y así cumplir su sueño de ser una gran empresaria, para lo cual ha trabajado fuertemente.
texts.en:
Erika, 20, is a young entrepreneur who decided to open her own business aimed at generating her own income to be able to contribute economically to her household’s expenses.  

About five years ago she learned dressmaking from an aunt and since then has been working hard at this activity leading to her having very good experience.  At the beginning, Erika worked at a dressmaking shop where she honed her skills and then set up her own shop where she’d sew for third parties.  

Later, thanks to the good quality of her products she managed to have very good sales and gather enough capital to start her own line of clothes.  Currently, Erika works exclusively in her own line because she has good sales and her production capacity is totally directed to filling orders of her own line.  However, she has the difficulty that she’s not had sufficient capital to buy a double stitch machine which means she has to go to a different neighborhood in the city where she can avail herself of this service thus incurring extra production costs.

Aiming to improve this situation, Erika is looking for financing to be able to buy a double stitch machine to be able to have everything needed for the production of her articles of clothing and not incur additional production costs.

In this way Erika will be able to save a large amount of money in transportation costs and in paying to be leant a double stitch machine so her monthly income will increase and her business will continue getting ahead.

Erika dreams with having a large shop where she can generate employment for other people thus reaching her dream of becoming a great businesswoman for which she’s been working so hard.

loans.use: to buy a double chain stitch machine.

loans.name: Tuhfa

texts.ru: Тухфа замужем и заботливая мать троих детей. Муж работает охранником, а Тухфа занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Вначале Тухфа получила займ в групповом кредитовании, а затем получила индивидуальный займ. Займ помог ей продвинуть её бизнес. Она начала данный бизнес с 2-х голов крупного рогатого скота и увеличила до 3-х голов. Она является владельцем бизнеса и очень хорошо знает свою работу. В бизнесе помогают её любящий сын и добрый муж. Тухфа имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Тухфа намерена получить займ и использовать его для покупки 4 голов крупного рогатого скота и корма с целью расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Tuhfa is married and is the loving mother of three. Her husband is a security guard. Tuhfa buys and resells cattle. At first she obtained a group loan, and later an individual loan. This allowed her to grow her business. She started with two heads of cattle and now has three. She owns her business and knows her work very well. Her caring son and her kind husband help out in the business. Tuhfa has a good credit history. She intends to obtain another loan and to use it for buying four heads of cattle as well as feed, in order to expand her business. She is hoping for your kind help.

loans.use: to buy cattle and feed for them.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda con gran esfuerzo ha sacado su propio negocio adelante, el cual inició desde hace aproximadamente 30 años con el ánimo de brindar en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida. Casada y madre de 2 hijos, Yolanda se dedica a la confección de su línea propia de lencería, cojines, cortinas, entre otros productos de decoración, y gracias a esto genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente al sostenimiento de los gastos en su hogar y así brindarles a sus 2 hijos de 8 y 10 años de edad, una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad. Gracias a que sus ventas han venido aumentando considerablemente, Yolanda busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una máquina de coser para poder brindar la herramienta de trabajo necesaria para un empleo que generará en su taller.
De esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida una persona ajena a su hogar y también podrá seguir creciendo con su taller, lo que le permitirá tener mejores condiciones económicas para que su familia siga progresando. Yolanda sueña con tener un gran negocio y montar un almacén donde pueda vender todos sus productos y así poder seguir generando empleo y progresar económicamente.
texts.en:
With much effort Yolanda has moved her own business forward.  She started it approximately 30 years ago aiming at providing her home with a better quality of life.  She’s married and has two children.  

Yolanda works making her own line of lingerie, cushions and drapes, among other decorative products.  Thanks to this she generates income with which she contributes economically to cover her household’s expenses and to provide her two children who are 2 and 8 years old with a better quality of life and access to better quality education.

Thanks to the considerable growth in her sales, Yolanda is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy a sewing machine to be able to have a work tool she needs in order to generate employment in her workshop.
