In this way she will be able to improve the quality of life of a person from outside of her household and also be able to continue growing with her workshop which will allow her to have better economic conditions so that her family can continue making progress.

Yolanda dreams with having a great business and with setting up a store where she can sell all her products thus continuing generating employment and progressing economically.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Marly Carolay

texts.es:
Marly es una joven emprendedora que ha montado su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos, contribuir económicamente en su hogar y así también progresar económicamente en su vida. Proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos, por lo que desde muy temprana edad se vio en la obligación de conseguir un empleo; fue así como le dieron la oportunidad de trabajar en una miscelánea y hace 6 años que venía trabajando como empleada. Al ver que su trabajo era muy mal remunerado, decidió con unos ahorros montar su propio negocio, y fue así como hace aproximadamente 5 meses tiene su propia miscelánea donde ofrece a sus clientes toda clase de productos. Actualmente, con 18 años de edad, Marly espera que su negocio pueda ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de papelería, piñatería, de uso doméstico y demás, para surtir su miscelánea y así poder ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.
De esta manera podrá tener su propio negocio bien posicionado y así poder tener mejores ingresos con los cuales pueda seguir contribuyendo en su hogar a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Marly sueña con que su negocio crezca, con algún día poder generar empleo y también con vender al por mayor a los almacenes del sector para tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Marly is a young, entrepreneurial woman who has started her own business in hopes of increasing her income, contributing financially to her household expenses, and advancing her general financial situation. She comes from a family of scarce financial resources, which has led her, from a young age, to seek work and consistent employment. She began working six years ago at a small general store, but was not paid very well. In hopes of earning a decent wage, she decided to save up as much money as possible to open her own business. Five months ago, she opened her own general store, where she offers customers a wide range of products. Marly is 18 years old, and she hopes to increase the variety of products she can offer to her clients, a goal that has led her to request his loan. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase paper products, party products, sweets and other items to further stock her store. 

She hopes that this support and product variation will allow her to strategically position her business and increase her net income, which she will put toward household expenses and towards improving her family’s quality of life. Marly’s dream is to grow her business and eventually offer employment for others, as well as sell products in bulk to grocery stores and general stores as she grows and develops her business.

loans.use: to purchase paper and party products, sweets, and other items to further stock her general store and offer a wider variety of products to customers.

loans.name: Rigoberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Rigoberto se formó como mecánico industrial y desde hace aproximadamente 8 años viene ejerciendo esta actividad. Empezó trabajando en una empresa la cual quebró y se vio en la obligación cerrar y despedir a todos sus empleados, por lo que Rigoberto quedó sin empleo y sin la fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Sin embargo, como toda una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que se ha caracterizado, aprovechó los ahorros que tenía y compró la maquinaria que estaban vendiendo a muy bajos costos por la razón de la liquidación de la empresa, y así comenzó con su propio taller de máquinas. Desde que montó su taller ya han pasado aproximadamente 2 años, y gracias al esfuerzo que le pone diariamente a su trabajo ha logrado posicionarlo y captar cada vez un número mayor de clientes. Dado que un cliente le ha hecho el pedido de unas máquinas ablandadoras de carnes, Rigoberto busca que un préstamo le permita comprar los insumos y la materia prima que requiere para la fabricación de las máquinas ablandadoras de carne que le ha pedido un cliente suyo. 
De esta manera espera seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes y seguir creciendo en su taller para que cada vez pueda tener unas mejores condiciones de vida. Su sueño es poder brindarles a su esposa y sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida mayores oportunidades económicas que le permitan progresar.
texts.en:
Rigoberto trained as an industrial mechanic and for the last 8 years has been working in this field.  He started out working for a firm that went bankrupt and had to close dismissing all its employees so Rigoberto was left unemployed and without a source of income to support his home.  However, like the hardworking, enterprising person he’s always been, he availed himself of savings he had and bought a machine that was being sold at a very low price because of his firm’s liquidation and thus started his own machine shop.

Since he set up his shop about two years have gone by and thanks to the effort he puts into his work daily he’s managed to position it and to win over a larger number of customers every time.  Given that a customer has placed an order for some meat tenderizing machines, Rigoberto is looking for a loan to buy supplies and raw materials he needs to manufacture the meat tenderizing machines his customers has ordered.

In this way he hopes to continue meeting customer needs and continue growing in his shop so that each time he can attain better living conditions.  His dream is to be able to offer his wife and children a better quality of life with better economic opportunities that will allow them to make progress.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies.

loans.name: Bessy Roxana

texts.es:
La señora Bessy, se dedica a la Venta de Mercadería como ser bolsos, peines, pulseras, ganchos, colas, brasier, blúmers entre otros, desde hace Once años y  las ventas son en su mayoría por encargo  ya que también trabaja como Impulsadora en un Supermercado Grande  de la ciudad, donde le vende a sus compañeras y ellas también le hacen algunos pedidos de otros productos, cuando Bessy  tiene día libre vende de manera ambulante en su colonia y en otras colonias aledañas,   gracias a su negocio ella ha logrado salir adelante con sus dos hijos que están pequeños a quienes deja al cuidado de su mama, su esposo labora como motorista, con las ganancias que ha recibido de su negocio ha mejorado su calidad de vida ya que compro un televisor y una refrigeradora.
Doña Bessy esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 10,000.00 para invertirlo en la compra de bolsos, ropa, pulseras brasier  y otros,  su sueño es poder tener un local bien acondicionado  donde vender sus productos
Tegucigalpa, Honduras – Abril 2012
texts.en:
Ms. Bessy has been selling merchandise such as bags, combs, bracelets, hangers, pony tails, braziers, and bloomers, among other things for the past eleven years. Most of her sales are through customer orders, as she also works as a product promoter in a large supermarket in the city.  She sells her own products to her co-workers and they also request other products from her.  When she is off from her regular job, she sells on foot on her street and other adjacent streets.  She has managed to get herself and her two small children, whom she leaves with her mother, ahead, thanks to her business.  Her husband works as a driver.  She has managed to improve her quality of life thanks to the earnings from her business and has been able to buy a refrigerator and a television.

Bessy is asking for a loan of L. 10,000.00 to buy bags, clothing, bracelets, braziers, and other things.  Her dream is to have a well set-up location from which to sell her products.

Tegucigalpa, Honduras – April 2012

loans.use: to buy inventory items.

loans.name: Gs El Shadai Group

texts.es:
La señora Ana, tiene 36 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos y cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja en los gastos familiares, Su actividad principal es la venta ropa de niño, ropa americana, zapatos de niño, suéteres, ella tiene 10 años de experiencia en el manejo de su negocio, Ana esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de venta ropa de niño, ropa americana, zapatos de niño, suéteres y otros producto, para la atención de sus clientes
Ana es una persona muy trabajadora, y su negocio esta ubicado en su casas de habitación, en algunas ocasiones ella vende de manera ambulante en las comunidades cercanas, eso le ayuda a tener mejores ventas,  con el apoyo del préstamo que reciba Ana, le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Ana sueña con tener, vitrinas y aparadores algunos maniquís para tener ropa nueva de venta y tener el mejor negocio de la zona.
El Señor Santos, se dedica a la elaboración de estructuras metálicas, El  cuenta con 16 años de experiencia.
La Señora Mariana, se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de cosméticos, ropa, productos por catalogo.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras -  Abril 2012
texts.en:
Ana is 36 years old, has four children, and counts on her husband for the family expenses.  Her main activity is selling children’s clothing, American clothing, children’s shoes, and sweaters.  She has ten years’ experience in managing her business.  Ana is asking for a loan to buy children’s clothing, American clothing, children’s shoes, and sweaters among other things in order to meet her customers’ demands.

Ana is a very hardworking woman and her business is located in her home.  Sometimes she sells on foot in the nearby community.  This helps her have better sales.  With help from this loan, Ana will be able to build a better business and in this way increase her income with which to cover the household expenses and improver her family’s quality of life.

Ana would like to have some display cases and dressers, hutches, and a few mannequins so she can have some new clothing for sale and have the best business in the zone.

Mr. Santos makes metal structures and has 16 years’ experience.  Ms. Mariana sells cosmetics and clothing products via catalog.

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras – April 2012

loans.use: to buy inventory for her business.

loans.name: Fayza

texts.en:
Fayza is 50 years old and widowed. She has a daughter and a son.

To be able to support herself and her family, Fayza started to make a living by making different type of pickles at her home to sell. Now she has applied for this loan to buy more vegetables and more plastic jars of different sizes.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and more plastic jars.

loans.name: Khaldoon

texts.en:
Khaldoon is a 20-year-old university student, who is majoring in accounting. He is currently in his second year.

Khaldoon has five brothers and sisters. Being in a big family was not easy for him, or on the family, in terms of registering at a university. For that, Khaldoon started to work in a women’s accessories shop, besides studying at the university.

Khaldoon has applied for this loan in order to pay for his semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for his semester fees

loans.name: Sami

texts.en:
Sami is a 39-year-old married guy. He has a one-year-old boy.

Sami is a plumber. He has his own small store where he keeps all of his equipment and tools.

He has applied for this loan in order to buy more pipe pieces and other plumbing spare parts to start selling them in addition to running his plumbing business.

loans.use: To buy more pipe pieces and plumbing spare parts

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Con 5,300 pesos Lidia podrá comprar más ropa de segunda mano y así aumentar el inventario de su tienda. Además de vender ropa, Lidia tiene un "display case" donde vende productos de cuidado personal y perfumes.
Lidia tiene 42 años, es casada y su esposo es un electicista que tiene su propio taller de reparación. Tiene tres hijos de 28, 11 y 8 años, el mayor trabaja y los más pequeños son estudiantes en la escuela primaria. 

Lidia desea aumentar su inventario para vender más y poder ahorrar, ella sueña con que su negocio crezca y que le permita con el tiempo ahorrar lo suficiente para tener su casa propia .
texts.en:
With 5,300 DOP Lidia will be able to buy more second-hand clothing and increase the inventory in her store.  In addition to selling clothes, Lidia has a display case where she sells personal care items and perfume.

Lidia is 42 years old and married.  Her husband is an electrician, and he has his own repair shop.  She has three children, ages 28, 11, and 8.  The oldest works, and the younger two go to elementary school.

Lidea wishes to increase her inventory in order to sell more and be able to save.  She dreams of her business growing and allowing her, in time, to save enough to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her store.

loans.name: Johana Patricia

texts.es:
Johana es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 8 años, pues el padre de su hijo los abandonó hace un largo tiempo y sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Con la finalidad de generar los ingresos que requiere para sostener los gastos de su hogar, Johana se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 9 años a la actividad de la confección, actividad que aprendió gracias a su madre y con la que trabajó durante un largo tiempo. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos Johana tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero presenta la dificultad de que no cuenta con una máquina que requiere para terminar la confección de sus productos, por lo que le toca pagar para que le realicen este trabajo y así sus costos se incrementan considerablemente. Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una máquina fileteadora con la cual pueda realizar totalmente la producción de sus prendas y así sus costos bajen considerablemente, de modo que su margen de ganancias se incremente y así pueda generar mayores ingresos para su hogar. 
Johana sueña con tener un gran taller de confección donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas, además de que sueña brindarle a su hijo el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Johana is a single mother and head of her family with one 8-year-old child, as her child's father abandoned them a long time ago without making any financial contribution for his support.  With the goal of generating the income that she needs to cover her household expenses, Johana has been working in sewing for approximately the last 9 years.  She learned this activity thanks to her mother, with whom she worked for a long time.  Thanks to the good quality of her products, Johana has many good orders from her customers.  However she is facing a difficulty as she doesn't have a machine that she needs to complete the sewing of her products, so she needs to pay for it in order to be able to do this work, and so her costs are increasing considerably.

It is for this reason that she is looking for a loan that will allow her to purchase an industrial sewing machine with which she can make all her clothing production.  Her costs will go down considerably in a way that will increase her profit margin, and so she can earn greater income for her household.

Johana dreams of having a large sewing workshop where she can generate employment for those who most need it.  In addition, she dreams of providing her son with access to a better quality of education and better financial opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial sewing machine with which she can make all her clothing production.  Her costs will go down considerably in a way that will increase her profit margin, and so she can earn greater income for her household.

loans.name: Gloria Emilsen

texts.es:
Gloria se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que como el salario de su esposo no es suficiente para poder sostener todos los gastos que se generan en su hogar, decidió aprender y montar su propio taller de confección con el cual pueda generar ingresos con los que contribuya económicamente a los gastos de su hogar y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida en su familia. Aprendió hace 4 años cuando hizo un curso en una entidad del estado llamada SENA y gracias a esto logró adquirir los conocimientos necesarios para el montaje de su taller de confección. En su taller tiene unas máquinas con las cuales realiza su trabajo, pero debido a que no cuenta con una máquina indispensable para culminar la elaboración de las prendas, debe pagar altos precios a un tercero para que le realice este trabajo; es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina fileteadora con la cual pueda culminar la elaboración de sus prendas y así pueda ahorrarse los altos costos de la producción, aumentando su margen de ganancias y así generando mayores ingresos para su hogar. 
Gloria sueña con sacar su taller adelante, brindar empleo para los más necesitados y brindar en su familia una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en: Gloria is married and has 2 children for whom she has always wanted to provide a good quality of life.  Since her husband's salary is not sufficient to support all of the household expenses, she decided to learn how to sew and set up her own dressmaking workshop.  This way she could generate income to make a financial contribution to the household so that her family could have a better quality of life.  Four years ago, she learned this trade when she took a course from a state entity called SENA.  Thanks to this training, she was able to get the knowledge she needed to start up her own dressmaking business.  In her workshop she has some sewing machines with which she does her work, but as she lacks a machine to do the finishing work on the garments, she must pay high prices to a third party to do this work.  For this reason she is now seeking a loan that will allow her to buy a serging machine  that can do the finishing work on her garments; this way she can save on production costs.  This will increase her profit margin, and in this way increase the earnings that she can bring home.  Gloria dreams of making progress with her dressmaking workshop, of providing work for those who need it the most, and of providing her family with a good quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to buy a serging (specialized sewing) machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a welding machine.

loans.name: Ketty Isabel

texts.es:
Ketty siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora, y gracias a esto ha logrado salir adelante con su familia pese a las adversidades que le presenta la vida. 

Con el ánimo de contribuir económicamente en su hogar, surgió la idea de ofrecer en su municipio el servicio de lavadora, el cual ha tenido muy buena acogida, y gracias a los constantes pedidos ha logrado generar ingresos con los que su familia puede tener mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.

Ketty busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una lavadora para poder aumentar su capacidad de producción y así poder responder a la gran demanda que hay por su servicio.
texts.en:
Ketty has always been known for being very hardworking, and thanks to this she has been able to get ahead with her family in spite of the adversities that life presents.

Wanting to contribute financially to her household, she got the idea of offering a laundry service in her town.  This business has been very well accepted, and thanks to her constant orders, she has managed to generate income so that the family is able to enjoy a better quality of life and have more opportunities for economic progress. 

Ketty is seeking a loan to buy a washer so that she can increase her productive capacity, and in this way respond to the great demand that exists for her services.

loans.use: to buy another washer to expand her productive capacity

loans.name: Elver De Jesus

texts.es:
Elver es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido el acompañamiento de su esposa y así poder superar las dificultades que se le presentan. En la actualidad Elver se encuentra desempleado, pues por circunstancias adversas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de salir de la empresa donde estaba trabajando, aunque de igual forma el salario que allí ganaba no era suficiente para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Buscando aprovechar la oportunidad que le da su cuñado, el cual tiene una legumbrería muy bien posicionada y en la cual hacen el mercado muchas personas, Elver quiere montar una carnicería y así poder tener una fuente de ingresos más estable con la cual pueda ofrecer en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida. Con el ánimo de hacer el montaje de su negocio, Elver busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar un refrigerador y una mesa de acero inoxidable y así poder tener lo necesario para el montaje de su carnicería en la legumbrería de su cuñado.
Así, Elver podrá aprovechar el espacio que su cuñado le esta brindando en la legumbrería, además de que podrá generar mejores ingresos para su hogar permitiéndose ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Elver sueña con tener un gran negocio, con poder generar empleo y con sacar su familia adelante pese a las dificultades que se le han presentado.
texts.en:
Elver has had to pass through many adversities in his life. However, he has always had his wife's support to help him get past life's difficulties. Currently, Elver is unemployed due to unforeseen circumstances that forced him leave the company where he was working. Even so, his salary was insufficient to cover the household expenses.

Elver has an opportunity through his brother in law's legumes shop, which is in a very good location where many clients do their shopping. Elver wants to set up a butcher shop and have a stable source of income to improve the quality of life in his home. With the objective of setting up his shop, Elver will use the loan to buy a fridge and a stainless steel table to have enough to set up a meat shop in his brother's legume shop.

In this way, Elver will be able to take advantage of his brother-in-law's market location to increase his household income, thus improving their quality of life. Elver dreams of having a big business, generating jobs and getting his family ahead in spite of the difficulties presented to him.

loans.use: to buy a fridge and a stainless steel table to set up a meat shop in his brother-in-law's legume shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit and the supplies that he needs to be well-stocked to face the vacation season.  This will increase his sales considerably.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a special sewing machine.

loans.name: Nohelia

texts.es:
Nohelia es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena educación y una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que desde que el padre de sus hijos los abandonó ha venido trabajando fuertemente para poder generar suficientes ingresos con su negocio de modo que pueda tener en su hogar mejores condiciones económicas. Nohelia aprendió por parte de una amiga la actividad de la venta de productos naturales, y en la sala de su casa montó una exhibición de estos productos. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que ofrece sus ventas se han incrementado considerablemente en los últimos meses, por esto ahora que va a ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una vitrina para poder exhibir sus productos a sus clientes y así hacer el negocio más atractivo.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y ofreciendo una buena calidad de productos. Además, Nohelia espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda tener mejores condiciones económicas, de modo que puedan tener mayores oportunidades de progreso y una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Nohelia is a single mother and head of her family of two children, to whom she has always wanted to provide a good education and a good quality of life. It is for this reason that since her children's father abandoned them, she has been working hard to be able to generate sufficient income with her business so that she can have a better financial situation in her household. 

From a friend, Nohelia learned the business of selling natural products, and set up a display of these products in the living room of her home. Thanks to the good quality of her products and the good service she provides, her sales have grown considerably in the last months. This is why she is going to offer a greater variety of products. She is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy a display case for showing her products to her customers, and this way make the business more attractive.

In this way her business will continue growing and offering good quality products. In addition, Nohelia hopes that with greater income her family can have a better financial situation, so that they can have greater opportunities for progress and a better quality of life in their household.

loans.use: To buy a display case for showing her products to her customers, and this way make the business more attractive.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es nacido en Colombia, pero a sus pocos años de vida fue adoptado por una familia norteamericana, quien lo crió y le dio el sustento necesario durante los primeros años de vida. Posteriormente Gustavo creció, consiguió un empleo y formó su hogar allí, pero motivado por conocer a su madre y familia biológica regresó hace aproximadamente 1 año a Colombia. Para poder sostener sus gastos Gustavo montó una venta de fritos como empanadas, pasteles, entre otros, y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha tenido muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de poder tener unas mejores condiciones de trabajo, Gustavo busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una fritadora e insumos para la preparación de sus comidas.
De esta manera podrá tener mejores condiciones en su trabajo y así seguir generando los ingresos para su hogar. Gustavo sueña con poder encontrar su familia biológica y también con poder encontrar un mejor trabajo como profesor de ingles.
texts.en: Gustavo was born in Colombia, but at an early age he was adopted by a North American family who raised him and supported him during the first years of his life.  Later Gustavo grew up and got a job and formed his own family there, but motivated to get to know his mother and his biological family, he returned 1 year ago to Colombia.  In order to pay his bills, Gustavo started up a business selling fried foods such as empanadas, cakes, and other items.  Thanks to the good quality of his products, he has had very good sales.  Because he wants to have better working conditions, Gustavo is seeking a loan to buy a deep fat fryer and some supplies he needs to prepare his dishes.  In this way, he will have better working conditions and will be able to continue to generate income for his household.  Gustavo dreams of being able to find his biological family, and also of being able to find a better job as an English teacher.

loans.use: to buy a deep fat fryer and some supplies for preparing his dishes

loans.name: Maria Patricia

texts.es:
Maria ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido una gran fortaleza para seguir progresando junto a su familia. Hace un largo tiempo su esposo murió a causa de la violencia que había en su municipio, por lo que se desplazó hasta otro municipio en busca de mejores oportunidades de progreso. Allí consiguió empleo en una cafetería la cual no tardo mucho tiempo para que su dueño decidiera venderla, y fue así como Maria logró comprar la cafetería donde trabajaba y tener su propio negocio. Con esta cafetería genera los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar donde convive con sus 4 hijos, y en busca de ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de realizar mejoras locativas a la cafetería y comprar algunos herramientas de cocina que requiere para empezar a ofrecer desayunos en su cafetería.
De esta manera su negocio crecerá y sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente, haciendo que sus ingresos aumenten y sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Maria sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y también sueña con poder brindarles a sus hijos una educación universitaria de calidad.
texts.en:
Maria has had to endure many adversities in her life, but she has always possessed great strength in order to continue progressing alongside her family. A long time ago, her husband died as a result of violence that broke out in her town. For this reason, she moved to another town in search of better opportunities. Maria secured a job at a cafeteria, but shortly thereafter, the owner decided to sell it. She managed to buy the cafeteria where she worked and now has her own business.

The cafeteria generates the income she needs to maintain the expenses at home, where she lives with her four children. Maria is looking for ways to offer better service to her customers, so she is seeking a loan as an opportunity to make improvements to the cafeteria and to buy some cooking equipment that she needs for preparing breakfast in her establishment. This will help her business grow and increase her sales considerably. By earning more income, her children can have a better quality of life. Maria dreams of having a successful business that creates jobs for people who need them the most. She also wants to provide her children with a quality college education.

loans.use: to pay for improvements to her cafeteria and to buy some cooking equipment.

loans.name: Oliver De Jesus

texts.es:
Oliver se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos, y anteriormente vivía con su familia en la ciudad donde tenía un empleo como vendedor en una tienda. Debido a circunstancias ajenas a su voluntad, se vio en la obligación de trasladarse a vivir a una vereda y con el ánimo de generar los ingresos para su familia allí, montó junto con su esposa una tienda general que poco a poco con mucho esfuerzo han venido posicionando. La tienda ya lleva aproximadamente 4 años y gracias a la buena atención que ofrece ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, aunque aún tiene grandes dificultades como el transporte de los productos, pues no los pude transportar directamente hasta su tienda por la lejanía, sino que el transporte los deja en un punto donde a Oliver le toca llevarlos al hombro hasta su tienda. A pesar de esto, su familia ha logrado mejorar su calidad de vida y han logrado acceder a mejores oportunidades económicas, es por esto que siempre cuida que su tienda crezca y poder ofrecerle a sus clientes un mejor servicio. Es por esto que ahora que sus ventas han venido creciendo, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas. 
De esta manera su negocio podrá seguir creciendo y así sus ingresos también aumentarán. Su sueño es tener una tienda muy bien surtida de modo que los habitantes de su vereda no se tengan que trasladar hasta los municipios para mercar, sino que encuentren en su negocio todo lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Oliver is married and has two children.  He used to live with his family in the city when he had a job as a salesman in a store.  Due to circumstances beyond his control, he was forced to move to live in the countryside and wanting to generate family income he and his wife opened a general store that gradually with much effort has been gaining positioning.  

The store has been in operation for about four years now and thanks to the good service provided has managed to secure a good number of customers although he has great difficulties, like transport of products, because due to the great distance involved products cannot be delivered directly to the store but rather to an intermediate point where Oliver then has to carry them on his shoulder the rest of the way to his store.  

Despite this, his family has succeeded in improving its quality of life and has managed to access better economic opportunities.  Because of this he always watches over the store so that it will grow and he will be able to offer his customers better service.

This is why his sales have been increasing now and he’s looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy basic staple items to increase the variety of products he offers his customers thus increasing his sales.

In this way his business will be able to continue to grow and his income will increase too.  His dream is to have a very well-stocked store so that residents of his rural neighborhood won’t have to travel to the cities to shop but rather will find everything they need in his store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Jairo

texts.es:
Jairo es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre ha querido brindarle a su familia una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente en su negocio todos los días para brindarles unos ingresos con los cuales puedan sostener todos sus gastos. 


Tiene una miscelánea en el parque de su municipio la cual ha sido reconocida por sus clientes por la buena atención que presta, y gracias a que tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes, Jairo busca que un préstamo le permita comprar surtido de productos de uso doméstico, papelería, entre otros, para poder ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.


De esta manera sus ingresos aumentarán considerablemente y su familia podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Jairo is a very hard-working person who has always wanted to provide his family with a good quality of life.  This is why he works hard in his business every day, so that he can make the income he needs to cover all their expenses.

Jairo has a general store in the park in his town.  His business is well known among his customers because of the good customer service he provides.  He has a lot of orders from his customers.  Jairo is looking for a loan that will allow him to buy a stock of household products, stationery, etc. so that he can offer a wider range of products to his customers.  This will significantly increase his income and his family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and be better able to make financial progress.

loans.use: to buy household products, stationery, etc. so that he can offer a wider variety of products to his customers

loans.name: Elva Nury

texts.es:
Elva es una persona muy trabajadora que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para continuar progresando junto con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 10 y 17 años de edad. Con el ánimo de contribuir económicamente en su hogar, desde hace aproximadamente 20 años decidió aprender la actividad de la peluquería, y desde entonces viene desempeñando esta actividad. La principal dificultad que presenta Elva es la falta de capital para invertir en su negocio, pues pese a que tiene muy buenos clientes, los gastos en su hogar se incrementan debido a la educación de sus hijos; es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar un lavacabezas para su peluquería y así poder ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.


Elva espera que con un mejor servicio sus clientes aumenten y así aumenten también sus ventas, de modo que su familia pueda gozar de mejores oportunidades económicas y una mejor calidad de vida. Elva sueña con tener una gran peluquería y una tienda de venta de artículos de peluquería donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Elva is a very hard-working woman who has had to overcome major adversity in her life.  However, she has always had the strength to continue moving ahead, together with her husband and two children aged 10 and 17.  

Approximately 20 years ago, with the intent of contributing financially to her household, she decided to learn hair-dressing, and since then she has been performing this activity.  The main difficulty that Elva faces is lack of capital to invest in her business, but in spite of this she has many good customers.  Her household expenses are increasing due to her children's education, which is why she is looking for a loan that will allow her to purchase a hair washing basin for her hair salon, and in this way be able to provide her customers with better service.

Elva hopes that with better service she will increase her number of customers and also increase her sales, in a way that her family will be able to enjoy better economic opportunities and a better quality of life.  

Elva dreams of having a large hair salon and a store selling hair-dressing items where she can generate employment for those who need it most.

loans.use: to purchase a hair washing basin for her hair salon, and in this way be able to provide her customers with better service.

loans.name: Saulo De Jesus

texts.es:
Saulo se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente en su negocio todos los días con el ánimo de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Desde hace aproximadamente 30 años viene ofreciendo frutas y verduras de manera ambulante en la plaza de mercado de su ciudad, y gracias a esto puede generar los ingresos que se necesitan en su familia. Con la buena calidad de sus productos, y el buen servicio que ofrece, Saulo ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenos pedidos y muy buenas ventas; por esto, con el ánimo de responder a los grandes pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar frutas y verduras para surtir su negocio y así pueda responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.
De esta manera, su negocio podrá seguir creciendo y así seguirá generando los ingresos que requiere en su hogar. Además, podrá tener un negocio más grande, con mayor cantidad de clientes que le permitirán seguir creciendo económicamente. Su mayor sueño es poder tener un local propio donde se pueda ubicar y donde pueda ofrecer a sus clientes sus productos en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Saulo’s married and has three children he’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life for which is why he works hard every day in his business aiming at generating the necessary income to cover household expenses.

For about 30 years he’s been selling fruit and vegetables in an ambulatory way in his city’s market square and thanks to this is able to generate the income needed by his family.  With the good quality of his products and the good service he offers, Saulo has managed to secure a good number of customers which has led to good orders and sales.  Because of this, aiming at responding to the large orders his customers place, he’s looking for financing to buy fruit and vegetables to stock his business and be able to fill customer orders.

In this way his business will be able to continue growing and he will continue generating income needed by his home.  In addition, he’ll be able to have a larger business with more customers that will lead to his continued economic growth.  His greatest dream is to be able to have his own locale to set himself up in to offer products to his customers under better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Gs 21 De Febrero Group

texts.es:
El  Señor Santos, tiene 57 años de edad, Su actividad principal es la agricultura el siembra 2 manzanas de maíz, frijoles y ajonjolí cuenta con mas de 15 años, el vive con su esposa, Don Santos esta solicitando el préstamo para la siembra de maíz y frijoles y compra de fertilizantes, plaguicidas y pago de empleados  para la mejorar la productividad de sus cultivos ya que por la falta de financiamiento no logra tener mejor producción , con el apoyo solicitado del préstamo que reciba Don Santos, le contribuirá a tener una mejor producción, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, y ayudarla a salir adelante.
Don Santos uno de sus sueños es tener sus propias tierras ya que donde el cultiva son alquiladas y poseer un sistema de riego para tecnificar y sembrar variedad de productos durante todo el año, junto a sus compañeros se asociaron para formar un grupo con el fin de solicitar el  crédito ya que no cuenta con las garantías suficientes que les exigen los bancos.
El Señor Olman se dedica a la caficultura, el cuenta con 5 años de experiencia.
El Señor José, Práxedes, Darlin, José, Isidro se dedican a la caficultura ya que tienen fincas en la parte montañosa y José se dedica a la agricultura.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Abril 2012
texts.en:
Santos is 57 years old.  His main business activity is farming and he sows 2 'manzanas' (just under 3.5 acres) of land with corn, beans and sesame.  He has been in this business for more than 15 years.  He lives with his wife.  Santos is requesting this loan so that he can sow corn and beans, buy fertilizers and pesticides, and hire laborers to improve his productivity because, owing to a lack of money, he hasn't been able to improve his production.  The support of this loan will help Santos to enjoy better production and thereby make more income so that he can cover his household expenses, provide his family with a better quality of life, and help them to make progress.

One of Santos' dreams is to own his own land as he currently grows his crops on rented land.  He would also like to have an irrigation system so that he can use modern technology in his work and sow a variety of products year round.  He joined together with his companions to form a group so that they could request a loan because he doesn't have the collateral required by the banks.

Olman's business is growing coffee.  He has five years experience.  José, Práxedes, Darlin and José Isidro also grow coffee.  They have farms in the mountains.  José works in agriculture.

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to grow corn and beans, to buy fertilizers and pesticides, and to pay laborers

loans.name: Ilham

texts.en:
Ilham is a 25-year-old conservative woman. She asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Ilham and her husband have a two-year-old girl. Her husband works as a taxi driver to make a living. Ilham wanted to help her husband, so she opened a small store for selling toys and gift wrapping paper.
 
She has applied for this youth loan in order to add more items to her store and register it officially.

loans.use: To add more items to her store and register it officially

loans.name: Basma

texts.en:
Basma, a 49-year-old married woman, has three sons and two daughters, one of whom is married.

Basma’s husband has his own livestock business, so Basma decided to start her own business making a special type of yogurt using the milk from the sheep and goats, that is used for cooking Jordanian food.

Now Basma has applied for this loan in order to prepare a special room in the house for making yogurt instead of doing it inside the house. She will also be able to buy more tools that are needed to make yogurt.

loans.use: to prepare a special room in the house for making yogurt.

loans.name: Rubiela Amparo

texts.es:
Rubiela es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre le ha querido ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, es por esto que como el salario de su esposo no es suficiente para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio para contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Fue así como inició desde hace aproximadamente 3 años con la venta de productos de uso doméstico, y gracias a la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes puede tener muy buenas ventas, las cuales cada mes se han venido incrementando. Con los ingresos que posee de su negocio, ha logrado brindarles a sus hijos de 5 y 8 años de edad una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una mejor educación, es por esto que siempre cuidad de su negocio y busca que crezca a pesar de las adversidades. Gracias a que tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, Rubiela busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de uso doméstico para responder a los pedidos que han hecho sus clientes.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y así podrá seguir generando los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Además, podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar y su esposo y sus 2 hijos gozarán de mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Rubiela is a hardworking individual who always wants to provide a better quality of life for her family. Since her husband's salary is not enough to cover the household expenses, she decided to start her own business so that she could contribute financially. Approximately three years ago, Rubiela began selling household goods. Thanks to the excellent service she provides to her customers, she has been able to generate good sales, which continue to increase each month. With the income generated from her business, Rubiela is able to provide her children (ages 5 and 8) a better quality of life and access to a better education. This explains why she always takes care of her business and looks for ways to grow in the face of adversity.

Since she has many orders from her customers, Rubiela is seeking a loan in order to buy household goods so that she can respond to those orders. In this manner, her business will continue to grow and generate needed income for the household expenses. In addition, her husband and two children will have a better life at home and enjoy better financial opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to buy household goods that have been requested by her customers.

loans.name: Yslm

texts.en: Yslm is 27 years old, single, and lives in Aden, Yemen. For the past year, he has been working hard to manage his grocery store. To help expand his business, Yslm has requested a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. The loan will be used to buy more essential commodities like soap, salt, canned goods, and soft drinks for resale, and will help him to generate greater profits and expand his business. Yslm hopes that in the future he will be able to increase his stock and profits.

loans.use: to buy more essential commodities like soap, salt, canned goods, and soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
Ernestina se dedica a la actividad de la agricultura, la cual aprendió por medio de su esposo y con la cual ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para contribuir económicamente en su hogar y así poder tener mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. En su cultivo tiene principalmente verduras, las cuales las ofrece en la plaza de mercados de su municipio donde es ya reconocida gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos. Debido a la falta de capital, Ernestina busca que un préstamo le permita comprar abonos, riegos, insecticidas y fungicidas para poder sostener su cultivo del fuerte invierno que esta haciendo, y así poder sacar su cultivo adelante.


De esta manera su familia podrá gozar de unos buenos ingresos, con lo que podrá tener una buena calidad de vida y oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Ernestina is a farmer.  She learned this trade from her husband, with whom she has worked for a long time, so that she could contribute financially to their household and in this way have more opportunity to make economic progress.  She mainly grows vegetables, which she offers for sale in the market plaza in her town where she is well known because of the good quality of her products.  Because she lacks capital, Ernestina is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy fertilizers, irrigation equipment, insecticides and fungicides so that she can sustain her crops through the severe winter weather that they are getting, and make progress with her crops. 

In this way, her family will enjoy a better income, with which they can have a better quality of life and greater opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, irrigation equipment, insecticides and fungicides

loans.name: Wilson Dario

texts.es:
Wilson es un padre soltero cabeza de hogar de su hija de 9 años, pues su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo y sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, lo que hizo que Wilson quedara con la responsabilidad de sostener todos los gastos que allí se generaran. Gracias a una hermana suya que tenía un taller de confección en ese entonces, pudo conseguir un empleo mejor remunerado y así aprendió la actividad de la confección. Posteriormente su hermana se vio en la obligación de cerrar el taller de confección y fue así como Wilson inició con su propio taller de confección donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros y en épocas de poca producción a terceros confecciona su línea propia de tendidos, acolchados, entre otros. Con la actividad ya lleva aproximadamente 6 años, y con su negocio un tiempo mucho menor, pero gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado tener muy buenos pedidos, tanto por la confección a terceros, como pedidos por su línea propia. Es por esto que ahora que tiene grandes pedidos de sus tendidos y acolchados, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar insumos y materias primas como telas, hilos, entre otros, para la confección de sus tendidos y acolchados y responder a los grandes pedidos que le hacen sus clientes.
De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y así podrá seguir generando ingresos con los cuales podrá ofrecer a su hija una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Wilson is a single father, head of household; he has a nine-year-old daughter whose mother abandoned them some time ago without making any economic contribution toward her support which left Wilson with the responsibility of covering all expenses generated there.

Thanks to a sister of his who had a sewing workshop back then, he was able to get a well-paying job and learned clothes making.  Later on his sister was forced to close her sewing workshop and this is how Wilson started his own sewing shop where he provides sewing services to third parties and during low production periods manufactures his own line of bedspreads and quilts, among others.

He’s been in this activity for about 6 years now and with his own business a much shorter time but thanks to the good quality of his products he’s managed to get very good orders both in sewing for third parties as well as for his own line.  Because of this he has large orders at present for his bedspreads and quilts and is looking for a loan to buy supplies and raw materials like fabric and thread, among others to manufacture his bedspreads and quilts and respond to the large orders his customers have placed.

In this way his business will continue to grow and he will be able to continue generating income to offer his daughter a better quality of life and access to a better quality education.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan, a 30-year-old conservative woman, asked her husband Omar to take her place in the photo.
Hanan and Omar care for a family of five. Their only source of income is their small restaurant that was established in an area that has no other restaurants. That's one of the reasons it is successful, along with the fact that Hanan and Omar make delicious local food such as hummus, fowl, and sandwiches.
Now Hanan has applied for this youth loan to help her husband improve the restaurant and start making new kinds of sandwiches.

loans.use: to start making new kinds of sandwiches.

loans.name: Aristides

texts.es:
Aristides aprendió de su esposa la actividad de la confección, pues ella durante muchos años se dedicó a esta actividad y cuando comenzó a trabajar desde su casa enseñó la actividad a su esposo. Posteriormente, Aristides comenzó a trabajar a su lado, y desde hace aproximadamente 8 años que se separó de su esposa quedó a cargo del taller de confección y con este es que genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar donde convive con sus 2 hijos.

En su taller confecciona principalmente los uniformes de los colegios y escuelas de su sector, y gracias a esto puede tener una gran cantidad de pedidos, al mismo tiempo que debe transportar gran cantidad de prendas. Debido a que su gasto en transporte viene en aumento, Aristides busca que un préstamo le permita comprar un vehículo de segunda que sea económico para poder transportar todas sus prendas y evitar el alto costo del transporte que esta pagando ahora.

De esta manera su negocio se hará más eficiente y así podrá tener unas mayores ventas. Además, espera que con un aumento de sus ingresos sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Aristides learned the trade of dressmaking from his wife.  She had spent many years in this line of work, and when she began to work from home she taught this trade to her husband.  Afterwards, Aristides began to work alongside her, and ever since he separated from his wife 8 years ago, he has been left in charge of the sewing workshop.  With this business, he has generated the income needed to support the expenses of his household, where he lives with his 2 children.

In his workshop, he mainly produces school uniforms for the schools in his area.  Thanks to this work, he is able to have a large quantity of orders, requiring him to transport a large quantity of garments.  Because of this, his transportation expenses have been mounting.  So Aristides is seeking a loan that will allow him to purchase a used vehicle to economically transport his garments and avoid the high shipping costs that he is currently paying.

In this way, his business will become more efficient and he will be able to increase his sales.  Also, he hopes that with a higher income, his children will be able to have a better quality of life and greater opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle to transport his garments

loans.name: Baheera

texts.en:
Baheera is a 50-year-old housewife. Her husband has a fruits and vegetables store. Using her husband's business, Baheera started to take few of his vegetables to  trim, pack, and sell, mostly to working mothers who have no time to prepare their own vegetables. 
For six years, she has been helping her husband bring more income to the family by adding new services to his shop. Baheera also has another business selling kitchen and home products. Now she has applied for this loan in order to enlarge this business by adding more inventory to what she sells.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of home products to sell.

loans.name: Maria Albertina

texts.es:
Maria se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace más de 36 años, pues desde muy joven le interesó aprender la actividad y así consiguió un empleo. Posteriormente con unos ahorros logró comprar su primera máquina para confeccionar desde su casa y así recibir algunos trabajos a terceros; de esta manera fue montando su propio taller de confección en su casa y así fue como empezó a ofrecer el servicio de confección a terceros.



Gracias a su experiencia sus clientes cada vez aumentan, lo que hace que su negocio se consolide y cada vez le genere más ingresos para su hogar. Además, en búsqueda de diversificar los productos que ofrece a sus clientes, Maria busca que un préstamo le permita comprar medias y sandalias y así ofrecer variedad de productos a sus clientes atrayendo más ventas a su negocio.




Su sueño es llegar algún día a tener un almacén de ropa y desde allí poder generar empleo para los más necesitados. Además, de poder brindar mejores oportunidades económicas en su hogar con lo que pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María has been working sewing for more than 36 years because she was interested in learning this activity from a very young age and got a job that way.  Later, with some savings she managed to buy her first sewing machine to work from home and take on jobs for third parties.  In this way she started to set up her own home-based sewing shop and how she started to offer sewing services for third parties.

Thanks to her experience her customers increase more each time which makes her business stronger and generates more household income each time.  In addition, seeking to diversify the products she offers, María is looking for a loan to buy stockings and sandals to offer a variety of products to her customers thus attracting more sales to her business.

Her dream is to someday have a clothing store to generate employment there for those most in need.  In addition, to be able to provide better economic opportunities for her home to provide better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy stockings and sandals.

loans.name: Hayjar

texts.en:
Hayjar, 37, is a single lady. She lives with her mother after her father passed away.

Three years ago, Hayjar started a small retail business selling cosmetic products and cleaning products so she can support herself and her mother. Now she has applied for a loan in order to add more products of different brands as requested by from some of her customers.

loans.use: to add more products of different brands.

loans.name: Khaldiya

texts.en:
Khaldiya is a 43-year-old single lady.
To make a living, Khaldiya opened a small goods store where she sells food products, detergents, and some kitchen tools. She has applied for this loan in order to buy more food products and cleaning products for the store and to install some more shelves.

loans.use: to buy more food products and cleaning products for the store.

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is a 42-year-old married woman. Her husband works in a construction business. They have six sons and daughters.
To help her husband in supporting their big family, Samia started doing more than one business: making cheese, buying and selling birds, and sewing embroidery. Her main business is making embroidered clothes and dresses.
Now she has applied for this loan to buy more threads and fabric to make more dresses to distribute and sell in the local market.

loans.use: to buy more threads and fabric.

loans.name: Encarnación

texts.es:
Encarnación es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora, y gracias a esta cualidad ha logrado salir adelante en su vida pese a las adversidades que se le presentan. Casada y madre de 4 hijos, Encarnación decidió montar una tienda general en su casa hace aproximadamente 8 años, motivada principalmente porque los ingresos que generaba su esposo estaban siendo insuficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a su tienda, su calidad de vida y la de su familia ha mejorado considerablemente, es por esto que siempre la trabaja con mucho esfuerzo para que siga creciendo cada vez más. Con el ánimo de brindar a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos, Encarnación busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar con los cuales pueda surtir su negocio y así pueda ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.
De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, pues podrá ofrecer productos que antes sus clientes le demandaban. Además, espera que con mayores ingresos su familia goce de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Encarnación is a person who has always been known for being very hard-working.  Thanks to this quality she has managed to get ahead in her life in spite of the adversities that life has presented her.  She is married and has four children.

Approximately eight years ago Encarnación decided to set up a general store in her house.  She did this primarily because the income that her husband generated was not enough to be able to support the household expenses.  Thanks to her store, her quality of life and that of her family has improved considerably.

That is why she always works with great effort in order to continue growing more every day.  With the intention of providing her customers with a greater variety of products, Encarnación is looking for a loan.  She will use the loan to buy basic needs products to stock her business.  This way she will be able to offer her customers a greater variety of products.

In this manner her sales will increase considerably.  She will be able to offer her customers products that they previously requested.  Also, she hopes that with greater income her family will enjoy a better quality of live and greater financial opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products to stock her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Rubialba

texts.es:
Rubialba ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y superar las dificultades que se le presentan en el camino. Hace un largo tiempo su padre tenía una tienda general en la cual Rubialba le colaboraba con la atención a los clientes en diferentes momentos, pero debido a la situación de violencia su padre murió y toda la familia se trasladó hacia otro sector de la ciudad. Hace ya 3 años, dado que las condiciones de violencia mejoraron, que regresaron al lugar donde tenían su vivienda y la tienda, y fue así como Rubialba se hizo cargo de la tienda y ahora es una fuente de ingreos con la cual contribuye económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de hogar donde convive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 10, 14 y 16 años de edad.

Debido a que no cuenta con mucho capital, Rubialba busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar y gaseosas para surtir su negocio y así poder ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Además así podrá tener un negocio más atractivo lo que hará que sus ventas aumenten considerablemente.

Su sueño es poder ampliar la tienda y ofrecer mayor variedad de productos, incluyendo en sus ventas los productos de papelería que tanta falta hacen en el sector. Rubialba también sueña con que su familia tenga acceso a una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Rubialba has had to go through many adversities in her life.  However, she’s always had the strength to go forth and overcome the difficulties that have cropped up along the way.

A long time ago her father had a general store where Rubialba helped out taking care of customers occasionally but due to the violence her father died and the entire family moved to a different part of the city.  Three years ago due to the improved situation with regard to the violence, they returned to the place where they had their store and their home and this is how Rubialba took over running the store and now it’s a source of income with which she contributes economically to cover household expenses where she lives with her husband and three children who are 10, 14 and 16 years old.

Because she does not have much capital, Rubialba is looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy basic staple items and soft-drinks to stock her store and be able to offer better customer service.  In addition, she will be able to have a more attractive store which will cause her sales to increase considerably.

Her dream is to be able to enlarge the store and to offer a wider variety of products including stationery supplies that are in short supply in the sector.  Rubialba also dreams with her family having access to a better quality of life and better economic opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Los Chicharrones Group

texts.es: Doña Damaris es miembro del Grupo Solidario Los Chicharrones, tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y madre de 5 hijos,  su esposo se dedica a la venta de arena y cal. Doña Damaris desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de chicharrones y golosinas, comenzó vendiendo en la casa ya que los clientes iban a visitarla porque era la única casa con televisión y ella aprovechando la oportunidad decidió vender golosinas y poco a poco hizo crecer su negocio de comidas, ella es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora. Su horario de atención es desde las 3:00 p.m y culmina a las 9:00 p.m. Su mayor ventaja es que tiene poca competencia y muy buena demanda de clientes. El préstamo lo necesita para surtir su negocio de carne y lonja para hacer los chicharrones, vegetales, harina, plátanos, etc. para invertirlo en la elaboración de golosinas. Ella espera que con el apoyo de este préstamo pueda tener su negocio surtido y así poder ayudarle a su esposo al sostenimiento de su familia. Una de sus metas es tener un local más amplio con espacio suficiente para atender a sus clientes. Este es el primer financiamiento que obtiene doña Damaris en FAMA y espera cumplir puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Damaris is a member of Los Chicharrones Solidarity Group.  She is 38 years old, married, and the mother of five children.  Her husband sells sand and lime.

Damaris has sold "chicharrones" [fried meat rinds] and sweets for 10 years.  She began selling at home when the customers were visiting her because she had the only house with a television.  She decided to sell sweets to make the most of the opportunity, and gradually she made her food business grow.

She is very hardworking person and a fighter.  Her hours of service are from 3:00 p.m. until 9:00 p.m.  Her greatest advantage is that she has very little competition and good customer demand.

She needs the loan to stock her business with meat and strips of meat to make chicharrones, vegetables, flour, bananas, etc., and to invest in making sweets.  She hopes that with the help of the loan she can stock her business and be able to help her husband support the family.

One of her goals is to have a bigger store with enough space to wait on her customers.

This is Damaris's first loan from FAMA and she hopes to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy meat for "chicharrones" [fried meat rinds].

loans.name: Faridun

texts.ru: Фаридун трудолюбивый и добрый человек, который занимается купле- продажей DVD дисков, сим-карты, а также продуктов питания. В этом бизнесе он уже более 10 лет. Закупает товар из оптового рынка Корвон и Саховат. В бизнесе помогает ему его брат. Фаридун хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. С этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки холодильника на хранения продуктов и мороженного для первого и второго магазина, чтобы сохранить их свежими, а также хочет открыт третью точку, и купить холодильник для витрины. Фаридун надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Faridun is a hardworking and kind person, who is involved in buying and selling DVDs, SIM cards and also food products.  He has been in this business for over ten years.  He buys his merchandise from the Korvon and Sahovat wholesale markets.  His brother helps him with the business.  Faridun wants to expand his business in order to make a good profit.  This is why he is requesting this loan to buy a refrigerator to store products and ice-cream for his first and second stores in order to keep the products fresh.  He also wants to open a third store and buy a refrigerator for the display.  Faridun relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is a conservative woman, and because she is unwilling to upload her photo on internet, the photo is of her son.

Khadija is a 54-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 2 children and lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan.

Khaidja is requesting a loan of 800 Jordan Dinars (JOD) so that she can pay her son's high educational costs.

loans.use: to pay for her son's educational costs.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal is a 36-year-old single lady. Both of her parents have passed away. She has an older sister who is married and she is living with her younger brother. To be able to support herself and her brother, Amal has opened a tailoring workshop where she sews and designs clothes. She has applied for this loan to buy a new sewing machine specialized for the finishing process.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.
